programme.title: The Adventures of Rocky and Bullwinkle
programme.sub-title: Amazamoose and Squirrel Wonder: Chapter Four
programme.desc: In an attempt to reverse Fearless Leaders goop-induced evil powers, Rocky and Bullwinkle travel to an alternate reality to get an "anti-goop." Once there they discover opposite versions of everyone they know from the real world, including a NICE Boris and Natasha!

programme.title: The Adventures of Rocky and Bullwinkle
programme.sub-title: Amazamoose and Squirrel Wonder: Chapter Five
programme.desc: It all comes down to this! With anti-goop in hand from the opposite dimension, Rocky and Bullwinkle set out to take away Fearless Leaders super powers and save the world.

programme.title: DreamWorks Dragons: Defenders of Berk
programme.desc: Snotlout is concerned when his dragons flame goes out and the kids have to figure out how to reignite it before its too late.

programme.title: Archibalds Next Big Thing
programme.sub-title: Chicken at Sea The Key Master
programme.desc: Archibald hits the high seas to help out endangered turtles. Its Archibald to the rescue when the citizens of Crackridge report a series of thefts.

programme.title: Madagascar: A Little Wild
programme.desc: When a snowstorm blocks Kate from accessing the zoo, Melman decides to become "substitute Kate" and make sure the animals are cared for. But when the animals go wild in the snow, Melmans future-paramedic skills are put to the test during an outbreak of stubbed toes and boo-boos. A series of stumbles makes Melman question whether hes cut out to be a paramedic - until he learns that mastering a goal takes grit!

programme.title: Madagascar: A Little Wild
programme.desc: When Gloria meets a shy hermit crab, named Starlene, with a secret talent of tap dancing, Gloria plans a flashy production for Starlenes debut so she can share her talent with the world! But Gloria doesnt ask Starlene what she wants, and pushes the crabs introverted self too far, ultimately learning you have to respect your shy friends comfort levels they may be different than yours.

programme.title: Dew Drop Diaries
programme.sub-title: Tooth on the Loose That Thing You Dew
programme.desc: When Phoebe convinces the Tooth Fairy to visit before Marcus has actually lost his tooth, the Dew Drops do everything in their power to make sure the tooth is out before she arrives! The Dews decide to hold a concert in the park for their animal friends, but cant find the time to practice.

programme.title: Gabbys Dollhouse
programme.desc: The Gabby Cats put their own spin on the classic fairytales "Rapunzel," "The Princess and the Pea," and "Little Red Riding Hood." For the Cat of the Day Segment, CatRat sings a song!

programme.title: Doug Unplugs
programme.sub-title: Kicking and Botting/Bot on the Case
programme.desc: Emma asks Doug if he and the other robots would like to form a soccer team, knowing that all of their unique robo skills would make them invaluable team members. But when its game time, they quickly realize that what wins games isnt individual skill, but the ability to work as a team./When the last piece of Doug and Emmas puzzle goes missing, Emma dubs them detectives and they try to solve the mystery together.

programme.title: Gabbys Dollhouse
programme.desc: Its Cat-O-Ween in the dollhouse, and all the Gabby Cats are in the holiday spirit. Gabby and Pandy dress up and go trick-or-treating around the dollhouse, where they make cat-o-lanterns with Baby Box, search for hidden treats with MerCat, and make Banana ghosts with Cakey. Along the way, CatRat plays silly tricks on them, but in the end Floyd manages to trick them all! For the Cat of the Day segment, all the Gabby Cats sing a special Cat-O-Ween song.

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal
programme.desc: Leroy must learn to let go when his caterpillar friend turns into a butterfly. When Pixie loses her spark, Kelp and Juniper look for the plant they think will cure her. Meanwhile Pixie wonders whether she can be cured at all!

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go!
programme.sub-title: The Itch To Switch Mismatched Socks
programme.desc: When Tag is frustrated living in a crowded house, and Scooch is bored in a quiet house, the two friends switch houses for the day. At first they both love their new lives. But as Scooch gets overwhelmed by all the activity at The Barker house, and Tag gets bored by the quiet life at the Poochs, they eagerly switch back before the day is done. When the Pawston Get Sox go on a losing streak, Tag and Scooch come up with the idea to have a team mascot. And Frank and Beans are the perfect fit! But when the two mascots start to clash over who gets the spotlight, Tag has to help save their friendship, and the big game!

programme.title: Madagascar: A Little Wild
programme.desc: Alex is mistaken for a Maine Coon and takes over that cats life in the penthouse. At first, VERY comfortable with his shmancy new life, Alex grows to miss his old life and learns that its lonely at the top.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws of Destiny
programme.desc: On the Volcano Island, Po and the Kids are reunited with Li, Grandma, Ping, Rooster, Wing, and Wong, and work together to find out whats really going on the island. Xiao becomes suspicious of some of her royal workers.

programme.title: Abominable and the Invisible City
programme.desc: A wish-granting toad drops into Yi and the crews life just as the dumpling shop is being reviewed by a food magazine writer. Overwhelmed by her efforts to help her mom and NaiNai in the shop, Yi asks the toad to spit up helpful items - but Jin and Peng arent so selfless. As a result of granting an abundance of wishes for the whole crew, the toad becomes too weak to continue. Realizing the error of their ways and why the toad appeared in the first place, Yi and Everest use their magic to reverse the toads magic onto himself so he can wish himself home.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back In Business
programme.desc: When the crowded bathroom situation at the local museum threatens baby love;Boss Baby leads his new team of playgroup babies on their first mission...and then their SECOND mission after a klepto baby in their group swipes a priceless artifact. In a continued attempt to avoid homework;Tim joins Boss Baby on his mission.

programme.title: The Croods: Family Tree
programme.desc: When Eep wants alone time with her new friend Dawn, Guy seeks a new friend of his own and finds an unlikely companion in Thunk.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.sub-title: Captain Underpants and the Angry Abnormal Atrocities of the Astute Animal Agressors
programme.desc: Stuck in separate camps, Harold and George unleash a hyperintelligent talking possum to scare the pants off of Krupp. What could possibly go wrong?

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight
programme.desc: There is more epic action and intrigue as Po and the Dragon Knights continue their quest to destroy the Tianshang weapons, but find themselves in treacherous waters when they are captured by pirates, one of which is out for revenge against Mr. Ping! The adventures lead them to London, where they are wanted by the Knights. Old enemies resurface and Blade will have to face one of her most challenging opponents-her mom. And somehow, Po finds himself in a chess tournament against the Queen of England!

programme.title: Dragons: The Nine Realms
programme.desc: Tom has to keep his mom, Olivia, distracted while Jun, Alex, and DAngelo use a new dragon to close off a cave leading to the Crystal Realm, and prevent her from discovering the dragons.

programme.title: Fast and Furious: Spy Racers
programme.desc: Tony was right; Dann is back and shes been spotted all around Los Angeles! The Spy Racers get back together on an unofficial mission to bring her down! Meanwhile, Ms. Nowhere, Palindrome and Roscoe run their out bounty hunter operation.

programme.title: Jurassic World: Camp Cretaceous
programme.desc: Darius and Sammy lead the hunters to the Main Street of the park in order to stage an escape from them. Meanwhile, Brooklyn, Ben, Kenji, and Yaz stumble upon an Emergency Control Center and realize they may be able to help from afar. Darius and Sammy nearly escape, but the rest of the kids "helping" actually ends up hindering them, and now they must figure out how to escape the hunters AND the T-Rex...again.

programme.title: Jurassic World: Camp Cretaceous
programme.desc: Its a race against the clock for the kids as they try to stop the hunters from enacting their plan to kill all the dinosaurs at the watering hole. Through the power of friendship, they manage to get the dinosaurs away from the watering hole... until they realize theyve actually started a stampede, putting their lives in danger too!

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back In Business

In a continued attempt to avoid homework;Tim joins Boss Baby on his mission.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free
programme.sub-title: Lucky and the No-Good Outlaw Butch Lepray
programme.desc: Lucky gets into trouble when the circus picks up a stranded woman who isnt what she seems.

programme.title: Fast and Furious: Spy Racers
programme.desc: Tony was right; Dann is back and shes been spotted all around Los Angeles! The Spy Racers get back together on an unofficial mission to bring her down! Meanwhile, Ms. Nowhere, Palindrome and Roscoe run their out bounty hunter operation.

programme.title: Dragons: The Nine Realms
programme.desc: Tom has to keep his mom, Olivia, distracted while Jun, Alex, and DAngelo use a new dragon to close off a cave leading to the Crystal Realm, and prevent her from discovering the dragons.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib
programme.desc: Our teams startup company and their rivals at Baby Corp get in a "Space Race", competing to see who can make the cutest kiddie-pretend "moon landing" for a baby - a spectacle sure to bring in a bounty of Baby Love. With both companies pouring their resources into a simulated space take off, tempers and sabotage are running hot, and the scrappy little startup is in danger of getting crushed by their big business competitor.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib
programme.desc: JJ reluctantly lets Tina take over her assistant duties for the day, but a Tina slip-up leads to an outbreak of town adults drinking diluted special formula that makes them all baby-brained. When JJ discovers this, she works with R and D Baby Simmons and Security Baby Katja to antidote the wobbling "Adult Babies" before Tina can find out and blame herself.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib
programme.desc: Crispin Biscuits frames Boss and Tinas startup company for exploding baby Iggys favorite stuffed animal, and Tina is forced to the sidelines to avoid any more bad press. As Crispin expands his plan to burst all the plush toys in the neighborhood, Tina discovers she can stop this by breaking open and rewiring a single toy doll. Unfortunately that doll is Baby Corps current head honcho, Pull-String CEO Baby.

programme.title: Jurassic World: Camp Cretaceous
programme.desc: The kids attempt to create a watering hole, as part of their plan to protect dinosaurs from Kon. Sammy, left on her own, must realize her own strength to complete the watering hole. Yaz confides in Ben about her growing feelings for Sammy.

programme.title: Jurassic World: Camp Cretaceous
programme.desc: Disillusioned Mae must break free from Daniels control, while recapturing her love of dinosaurs. Kenji hides his suspicions as he tries to investigate his father.

programme.title: Jurassic World: Camp Cretaceous
programme.desc: Yazs perfect moment to confess her feelings to Sammy is delayed by the Nothosaurus, and an energy core malfunction. Darius fears that needing to fight against Kenji is turning him into someone he doesnt like.

programme.desc: Yazs perfect moment to confess her feelings to Sammy is delayed by the Nothosaurus, and an energy core malfunction. Darius fears that needing to fight against Kenji is turning him into someone he doesnt like.

programme.title: The Adventures of Rocky and Bullwinkle
programme.desc: When Rocky and Bullwinkle travel to Paris to enter a cooking competition, Fearless Leader sends super spies Boris and Natasha after Bullwinkle to steal his secret recipe.

programme.title: The Adventures of Rocky and Bullwinkle
programme.desc: While Boris and Natasha continue their mission and Bullwinkle tries to overcome his stage-fright to advance in the cooking competition, a secret government agency begins tracking Rocky and Bullwinkles movement.

programme.title: DreamWorks Dragons: Defenders of Berk
programme.desc: Once every 10 years, a mysterious glowing dragon visits Berk and this year Hiccup and Astrid are determined to find out where its coming from - and stop it from reaching the village.

programme.title: Archibalds Next Big Thing
programme.sub-title: Best in Show Bot The Secret of Madame Baroness
programme.desc: Archibald hides inside Loys robot after accidentally breaking it. A lost boomerang leads to a job working for a fancy singer.

programme.title: Madagascar: A Little Wild
programme.desc: When Lala announces shes moving out of the habitat, Gloria feels sad. But instead of admitting it, she puts all her energy into throwing the "happiest" goodbye party for her tank mates last day in the habitat. But when things dont go as rosily as planned, Glorias friends help her understand you dont have to feel all happy or all sad; sometimes you feel both- and its okay to have conflicting feelings.

programme.title: Madagascar: A Little Wild
programme.desc: When the gang goes camping in vacant part of the zoo, Melman is nervous for his first ever sleepover away from the habitat and relies on his friends to scare-proof the experience for him. But when he gets separated from his friends, Melman must learn that the best way to cope with fear is to face what scares you... and you might find that what you thought was scary is actually a whole lotta fun.

programme.title: Dew Drop Diaries
programme.sub-title: Wheres The Party? The Noisiest Night
programme.desc: When Marcus loses an invitation to a birthday party and doesnt know where it will take place, the Dew Drops set out to find the location and get Marcus to the party on time. When Harper cant sleep because of a strange noise in her room, the Dews must figure out the source.

programme.title: Gabbys Dollhouse
programme.desc: Its Christmas time in the dollhouse! After putting the final topper on the Christmas tree, Figgy the Elf calls and says that Santa Kitty needs help in his workshop, its up to Gabby and Pandy to go help her out. After some toy fixing and boxing fun, Gabby and Pandy get to meet Santa Kitty and his Kitty reindeer and join him delivering presents to all their friends in the dollhouse.

programme.title: Doug Unplugs
programme.desc: Doug and his family go on a camping trip with the Pines, arriving with a teched out RV. But when they lose access to their technology, they have to figure out how to rough it in nature./Emma invites Doug and Uncle Forkrick with her to the library to help her on the hunt to find the next installment of her favorite book series. But when they get there, Doug and Uncle Forkrick find out about all the different ways that you can find stories at a library, and all the different kinds you can explore!

programme.title: Gabbys Dollhouse
programme.desc: The Gabby Cats have set up a puzzle hunt in the dollhouse! Gabby and Pandy solve riddles, look for clues and complete puzzle challenges in order to find puzzle pieces that come together to form a doorway to a special room in the dollhouse. For our Cat of the Day segment, Baby Box shows us how to make our very own puzzle.

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal
programme.desc: The kids scare away a swarm of bees. But when they realize bees make the flowers happy, they hatch a plan to get them back! When Scallop makes a bad choice, Kelp helps her learn from her mistakes.

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go!
programme.sub-title: New Hat, New Tag! Furry Tail Ending
programme.desc: When Tag worries that shes no longer a "Go" dog, Lady Lydia helps her find a new persona by helping Tag try on a bunch of different hats. Luckily, when a runaway puppy needs to be wrangled, and only the speedy Tag can catch him, Tag realizes she was a Go dog all along. Sergeant Pooch reads Scooch, Tag and Kit a story book during their sleepover. But when the last pages are missing, the three kids work together to make up their own ending to the story.

programme.title: Madagascar: A Little Wild
programme.desc: On Junior Marshals Day at the fire station, Melman gets stuck in a firetruck on its way to a real emergency. With Alexs help, Melman must overcome his fear of heights to help save a stuck cat, and learn that even heroes get scared sometimes.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws of Destiny
programme.desc: The whole gang escapes pursing Guards, battles flowing lava, and survives crumbling caves and pillars to finally make it back to the Forbidden City. Xiao is ready to escape the palace, but Shi Long has other plans for her.

programme.title: Abominable and the Invisible City
programme.desc: Its Chinese New Year! With Yi and Jin tied up in their respective CNY festival performances, Peng and a semi-disguised Everest hit the festive streets, eating and enjoying everything in sight. Meanwhile, while paying respects to her late father at a temple, Yi panics when an accident breaks her magical violin strings. She hurries back to find her friends, only to spot Peng and Everest and watch them get snatched up by a menacing, mysterious creature!

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back In Business
programme.sub-title: Ga Ba Goo Ba Ga (The Babblist)
programme.desc: Theres a new "babblist" in town- someone who claims to understand baby talk. Boss Baby spots this fraud right away;and must debunk his tactics before he scams the playgroup parents. Meanwhile;Tim tries to sell magazines with Boss Babys help.

programme.title: The Croods: Family Tree
programme.desc: When the Bettermans invite the Croods to join their family game night, two things become clear: Phil needs to win and Grug hates to lose.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.sub-title: Captain Underpants and the Abysmal Altercation of the Abominable Altitooth
programme.desc: Eager to get the campers out of his hair, Krupp orders them to climb Plummet Peak, where a terrifying creature is rumored to reside.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight
programme.desc: There is more epic action and intrigue as Po and the Dragon Knights continue their quest to destroy the Tianshang weapons, but find themselves in treacherous waters when they are captured by pirates, one of which is out for revenge against Mr. Ping! programme.title: Dragons: The Nine Realms
programme.desc: When Feather is taken by a group of what appear to be zombie dragons, Alex finds her inner hero and rescues her friend.

programme.title: Fast and Furious: Spy Racers
programme.desc: The team realizes they cant stop Dann on their own, so they call in Ms. Nowhere for backup. While they try to come up with a game plan, Dann ambushes them! Its a knock-down-drag-out brawl all through Los Gatos as they try to keep Dann from getting the mysterious devices shes collecting. In their time of need, they turn to the last person they ever thought theyd ask for help: Cleve Kelso.

programme.title: Jurassic World: Camp Cretaceous
programme.desc: Determined to build a raft to leave Isla Nublar, the campers search for materials to create a sail. The kids head to the Sky Gondola Ride hoping to find something they can use to help them escape. But when Dimorphodons attack, the group must find a way back down the mountain.

programme.title: Jurassic World: Camp Cretaceous
programme.desc: After discovering Mitch and Tiffs damaged yacht, the kids explore the North Dock hoping to find materials to patch up the boat. There they encounter angry Ouranosauruses that chase them back to the yacht and Darius notes that they are not typically aggressive. Its almost as if the islands balance has been thrown off.

programme.title: CruiseAway

programme.title: Power AirFryer Oven
programme.desc: Simply add your food to the Easy Load basket, slide it into the air fryer unit, and with the touch of a finger select your cooking setting from one of the 7 preset programs.

programme.title: CruiseAway
programme.desc: With over 25 years experience in the cruise industry, CruiseAway boasts thousands of cruise deals for 2024, 2025 and 2026, as well as some of the best cruise lines and cruise ships.

programme.title: Jet Hawk
programme.desc: It is a powerful, hand-held pressure washer. You can connect it to your garden hose, but unlike other pressure washers, Jet Hawk includes a water syphoning hose that means it can draw water from a bucket, bath or pool, wherever you are.

programme.title: Mr. Peabody and Sherman
programme.desc: Mr Peabody, the most accomplished dog in the world, and his mischievous boy Sherman, use their time machine - the WABAC - to go on the most outrageous adventures known to man or dog. But when Sherman takes the WABAC out for a joyride to impress his friend Penny, they accidentally rip a hole in the universe, wreaking havoc on the most important events in world history. Before they forever alter the past, present and future, Mr. Peabody must come to their rescue, ultimately facing the most daunting challenge of any era: figuring out how to be a parent. Together, the time traveling trio will make their mark on history.

programme.title: Stuart Little 2
programme.desc: Stuart, the Little familys lonely mouse son, gets into strife by befriending a canary.

programme.title: Daddy Day Camp
programme.desc: When the dads expand their childcare magic to Camp Driftwood, serving up sports, crafts and teaching the kids a thing or two about nature, they discover the camp has everything it needs except a plan to put the bullies of rival Camp Canola to shame. With some quick thinking, teamwork, a secret weapon and some off-the-wall crazy antics, the dads and kids unite to make sure Daddy Day Camp secures its rightful place in kid camp history.

programme.title: Sinbad: Legend of the Seven Seas
programme.desc: Its high-seas adventure when legendary swashbuckler Sinbad, his loyal pooch Spike, and the daring Princess Marina face off against the trickster Goddess of Chaos and her mischievous monsters.

programme.title: The Smurfs 2
programme.desc: Evil wizard Gargamel creates a couple of mischievous Smurf-like creatures called the Naughties hoping they will let him harness the magical Smurf-essence. However, he soon discovers that he needs the help of Smurfette, who knows the secret to turning the Naughties into real Smurfs. When Gargamel and his Naughties kidnap Smurfette from Smurf Village and bring her to Paris, its up to Papa, Clumsy, Grouchy and Vanity to reunite with their human friends, Patrick and Grace Winslow, and rescue her!

programme.title: Journey 2: The Mysterious Island
programme.desc: The journey begins when young adventurer Sean receives a coded distress signal from a mysterious island where no island should exist - a place of strange life forms, mountains of gold, deadly volcanoes, and more than one astonishing secret. Unable to stop him from going, Seans new stepfather joins the quest. Together with a helicopter pilot and his beautiful, strong-willed daughter, they set out to find the island, rescue its lone inhabitant and escape before seismic shock waves force the island under the sea and bury its treasures forever.

programme.title: Monsters Vs Aliens
programme.desc: When California girl Susan Murphy is clobbered by space gunk on her wedding day, she mysteriously grows to 49-feet-11-inches tall. The military puts her into a secret government compound, renamed Ginormica and hold her captive along with a ragtag group of Monsters: the brilliant but insect-headed Dr Cockroach, Ph.D.; the macho half-ape, half-fish, The Missing Link; the gelatinous and indestructible B.O.B.; and the 350-foot grub, Insectosaurus. But when a wild and dangerous alien robot lands on Earth, The President enlists this motley crew to save the world from imminent destruction.

programme.title: Transformers: Dark of the Moon
programme.desc: A mysterious event from Earths past threatens to ignite a war so big that the Transformers alone will not be able to save the planet. Sam Witwicky and the Autobots must fight against the darkness to defend our world from the Decepticons all-consuming evil.

programme.title: Jumanji
programme.desc: Young Alan Parrish sits down as a young boy to play a game with his friend, Sarah, and on a roll of the dice is mysteriously transported into the strange jungle realm of Jumanji. There he remains trapped for 26 years, until two newly orphaned children, Judy and Peter, playing in the attic of Alans childhood home, free the now-adult Alan from the games clutches. But to defeat Jumanjis encroaching powers, the three reluctant players must find the now-grown Sarah and band together as a makeshift family to finish the game - before it finishes them.

programme.title: Balto
programme.desc: Part husky, part wolf, Balto doesnt know where he belongs. Hes an outcast in Alaska, except to his true friends - Boris, the Russian snow goose, polar bear cubs Muk and Luk, and the beautiful husky, Jenna. Even though hes different, all of Baltos friends recognise what he still cant see himself: his noble spirit. One day, a serious diphtheria epidemic spreads fast among the children of Nome. When a fierce blizzard closes off all routes of transport, theres no way to obtain lifesaving medicine - unless a team of sled dogs can race 965km through the blinding Arctic storm and bring back anti-toxin. But when the dogs get lost in the frozen wilderness, only Balto can rescue the team and save the children.

programme.title: Dinosaur Train: Adventure Island
programme.desc: Dinosaur siblings Buddy, Tiny, Shiny and Don try to reunite with their parents after an earthquake causes theme park robots to go rogue.

programme.title: Cloudy With a Chance of Meatballs
programme.desc: A local scientist is often regarded as a failure until he invents a machine that can make food fall from the sky. But little does he know, things are about to take a turn for the worse.

programme.title: How the Grinch Stole Christmas
programme.desc: Hes mean and green and he hates the yo-ho-hoing. The Grinch conspires to steal Christmas from Whoville, making off with the presents, decorations, trees and every other joyful thing.

programme.title: Bee Movie
programme.desc: A bee is abuzz over a scandal: people are stealing honey to eat. With the help of a florist, he sues the human race for honey laundering.

programme.title: The Grinch
programme.desc: For their eighth fully animated feature, Illumination and Universal Pictures present "The Grinch," based on Dr. Seuss beloved holiday classic. The Grinch tells the story of a cynical grump who goes on a mission to steal Christmas, only to have his heart changed by a young girls generous holiday spirit. Funny, heartwarming and visually stunning, its a universal story about the spirit of Christmas and the indomitable power of optimism.

programme.title: Penguins of Madagascar
programme.desc: Recruited from youngsters into the global spy game, four penguins are called into action by a mysterious espionage organisation in order to save the world from a villainous octopus.

programme.title: The Garfield Movie
programme.desc: Garfield, the Monday-hating, lasagna-loving indoor cat, is about to have a wild outdoor adventure.

programme.title: Paddington
programme.desc: This film tells the story of the comic misadventures of a young Peruvian bear who travels to the city in search of a home. Finding himself lost and alone, he begins to realise that city life is not all he had imagined until he meets the kindly Brown family who read the label around his neck that says "Please look after this bear. Thank you," and offer him a temporary haven. It looks as though his luck has changed until this rarest of bears catches the eye of a museum taxidermist.

programme.title: Hop
programme.desc: An egg emergency ensues when the rock n roll-loving teen son of the Easter Bunny shirks his responsibility and runs away from home.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda
programme.desc: Clumsy and overweight panda, Po, dreams of becoming a kung fu master.

programme.title: Jumanji: Welcome to the Jungle
programme.desc: In the brand new adventure Jumanji: Welcome to the Jungle, the tables are turned as four teenagers are sucked into the world of Jumanji. When four high-school kids discover an old video game console with a game theyve never heard of Jumanji they are immediately drawn into the games jungle setting, literally becoming the avatars they chose: gamer Spencer becomes a brawny adventurer; football jock Fridge loses (in his words) the top two feet of his body and becomes an Einstein; popular girl Bethany becomes a middle-aged male professor; and wallflower Martha becomes a badass warrior. What they discover is that you dont just play Jumanji you must survive it. To beat the game and return to the real world, theyll have to go on the most dangerous adventure of their lives, discover what Alan Parrish left 20 years ago, and change the way they think about themselves or theyll be stuck in the game forever.

programme.title: Transformers: Age of Extinction
programme.desc: This film begins after an epic battle left a great city torn, but with the world saved. As humanity picks up the pieces, a shadowy group reveals itself in an attempt to control the direction of history ... while an ancient, powerful new menace sets Earth in its crosshairs. With help from a new cast of humans, Optimus Prime and the Autobots rise to meet their most fearsome challenge yet. In an incredible adventure, they are swept up in a war of good and evil, ultimately leading to a climactic battle across the world.

programme.title: Shrek 2
programme.desc: Happily ever after will have to wait as Shrek, Princess Fiona, and Donkey visit the in-laws. Outraged that Fiona has wed an ogre, the King hires hit man Puss in Boots to make the problem disappear.

programme.title: Christmas with the Kranks
programme.desc: Fed up with the commercial aspects of Christmas, particularly all the money spent and alone for the holiday for the first time in decades, as their daughter has just joined the Peace Corps, grumpy Luther Krank and his sweet wife, Nora, decide to skip Christmas this year and forgo the gifts, the tree, the decorations, the cards, the parties and to spend the dollars saved on a 10-day Caribbean cruise.

programme.title: The Polar Express
programme.desc: On Christmas Eve, a doubting boy boards a magical train thats headed to the North Pole and Santa Clauss home.

programme.title: Cloudy with a Chance of Meatballs 2
programme.desc: Inventor Flint Lockwood thought he saved the world when he destroyed his most infamous invention - a machine that turned water into food causing cheeseburger rain and spaghetti tornadoes. But Flint soon learns that his invention survived and is now combining food and animals to create foodimals! Flint and his friends embark on an adventurously mouth-watering mission to battle hungry tacodiles, shrimpanzees, hippotatomuses, cheesepiders and other foodimals to save the world - again!

programme.title: Tom and Jerry
programme.desc: A legendary rivalry re-emerges when Jerry moves into New York Citys finest hotel on the eve of the wedding of the century, forcing the desperate event planner to hire Tom to get rid of him. As mayhem ensues, the escalating cat-and-mouse battle soon threatens to destroy her career, the wedding, and possibly the hotel itself.

programme.title: An American Tail
programme.desc: Fievel the mouse travels from Russia to America with his family in the late 1800s to seek freedom from cat persecution.

programme.title: An American Tail: Fievel Goes West
programme.desc: Lured out west by the crafty Cat R. Waul, Fievel joins forces with famed lawdog Wylie Blurp to thwart a sinister plot to transform unsuspecting settlers into mouse burgers!

programme.title: The Road to El Dorado
programme.desc: Get ready for an exhilarating ride of a lifetime! Join Tulio and Miguel and their hilarious horse Altivo as they set sail, map in hand, in search of golden treasure in the all-star adventure, The Road to El Dorado! Upon landing on the shores of El Dorado, the legendary Lost City of Gold, Tulio and Miguel are mistaken for gods and are lavished with riches beyond their wildest dreams! As friendship, loyalty, and greed collide, our unlikely heroes must make the decision of their lives: run off with the gold or face unforeseen dangers to save the people of El Dorado.

programme.title: Despicable Me
programme.desc: In a happy suburban neighbourhood surrounded by white picket fences and flowering rose bushes sits a black house with a dead lawn. Unbeknownst to the neighbours, hidden deep beneath this home is a vast secret hideout belonging to Gru, a dastardly villain who, along with the help of his many little minions, is planning the biggest heist in the history of the world: hes going to steal the moon!

programme.title: Paddington 2
programme.desc: Now happily settled with the Brown family, Paddington picks up a series of odd jobs to buy the perfect present for his Aunt Lucys 100th birthday, only for the gift to be stolen.

programme.title: Antz
programme.desc: A worker ant changes roles with a soldier ant to woo a forbidden princess.

programme.desc: Dinosaur siblings Buddy, Tiny, Shiny and Don try to reunite with their parents after an earthquake causes theme park robots to go rogue.

programme.title: Cloudy With a Chance of Meatballs
programme.desc: A local scientist is often regarded as a failure until he invents a machine that can make food fall from the sky. But little does he know, things are about to take a turn for the worse.

programme.title: How the Grinch Stole Christmas
programme.desc: Hes mean and green and he hates the yo-ho-hoing. The Grinch conspires to steal Christmas from Whoville, making off with the presents, decorations, trees and every other joyful thing.

programme.title: Bee Movie
programme.desc: A bee is abuzz over a scandal: people are stealing honey to eat. With the help of a florist, he sues the human race for honey laundering.

programme.title: The Grinch
programme.desc: For their eighth fully animated feature, Illumination and Universal Pictures present "The Grinch," based on Dr. Seuss beloved holiday classic. The Grinch tells the story of a cynical grump who goes on a mission to steal Christmas, only to have his heart changed by a young girls generous holiday spirit. Funny, heartwarming and visually stunning, its a universal story about the spirit of Christmas and the indomitable power of optimism.

programme.title: Penguins of Madagascar
programme.desc: Recruited from youngsters into the global spy game, four penguins are called into action by a mysterious espionage organisation in order to save the world from a villainous octopus.

programme.title: The Garfield Movie
programme.desc: Garfield, the Monday-hating, lasagna-loving indoor cat, is about to have a wild outdoor adventure.

programme.title: Paddington
programme.desc: This film tells the story of the comic misadventures of a young Peruvian bear who travels to the city in search of a home. Finding himself lost and alone, he begins to realise that city life is not all he had imagined until he meets the kindly Brown family who read the label around his neck that says "Please look after this bear. Thank you," and offer him a temporary haven. It looks as though his luck has changed until this rarest of bears catches the eye of a museum taxidermist.

programme.title: Hop
programme.desc: An egg emergency ensues when the rock n roll-loving teen son of the Easter Bunny shirks his responsibility and runs away from home.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda
programme.desc: Clumsy and overweight panda, Po, dreams of becoming a kung fu master.

programme.title: Jumanji: Welcome to the Jungle
programme.desc: In the brand new adventure Jumanji: Welcome to the Jungle, the tables are turned as four teenagers are sucked into the world of Jumanji. When four high-school kids discover an old video game console with a game theyve never heard of Jumanji they are immediately drawn into the games jungle setting, literally becoming the avatars they chose: gamer Spencer becomes a brawny adventurer; football jock Fridge loses (in his words) the top two feet of his body and becomes an Einstein; popular girl Bethany becomes a middle-aged male professor; and wallflower Martha becomes a badass warrior. What they discover is that you dont just play Jumanji you must survive it. To beat the game and return to the real world, theyll have to go on the most dangerous adventure of their lives, discover what Alan Parrish left 20 years ago, and change the way they think about themselves or theyll be stuck in the game forever.

programme.title: Transformers: Age of Extinction
programme.desc: This film begins after an epic battle left a great city torn, but with the world saved. As humanity picks up the pieces, a shadowy group reveals itself in an attempt to control the direction of history ... while an ancient, powerful new menace sets Earth in its crosshairs. With help from a new cast of humans, Optimus Prime and the Autobots rise to meet their most fearsome challenge yet. In an incredible adventure, they are swept up in a war of good and evil, ultimately leading to a climactic battle across the world.

programme.title: Shrek 2
programme.desc: Happily ever after will have to wait as Shrek, Princess Fiona, and Donkey visit the in-laws. Outraged that Fiona has wed an ogre, the King hires hit man Puss in Boots to make the problem disappear.

programme.title: Christmas with the Kranks
programme.desc: Fed up with the commercial aspects of Christmas, particularly all the money spent and alone for the holiday for the first time in decades, as their daughter has just joined the Peace Corps, grumpy Luther Krank and his sweet wife, Nora, decide to skip Christmas this year and forgo the gifts, the tree, the decorations, the cards, the parties and to spend the dollars saved on a 10-day Caribbean cruise.

programme.title: The Polar Express
programme.desc: On Christmas Eve, a doubting boy boards a magical train thats headed to the North Pole and Santa Clauss home.

programme.title: Cloudy with a Chance of Meatballs 2
programme.desc: Inventor Flint Lockwood thought he saved the world when he destroyed his most infamous invention - a machine that turned water into food causing cheeseburger rain and spaghetti tornadoes. But Flint soon learns that his invention survived and is now combining food and animals to create foodimals! Flint and his friends embark on an adventurously mouth-watering mission to battle hungry tacodiles, shrimpanzees, hippotatomuses, cheesepiders and other foodimals to save the world - again!

programme.title: Tom and Jerry
programme.desc: A legendary rivalry re-emerges when Jerry moves into New York Citys finest hotel on the eve of the wedding of the century, forcing the desperate event planner to hire Tom to get rid of him. As mayhem ensues, the escalating cat-and-mouse battle soon threatens to destroy her career, the wedding, and possibly the hotel itself.

programme.title: An American Tail
programme.desc: Fievel the mouse travels from Russia to America with his family in the late 1800s to seek freedom from cat persecution.

programme.title: An American Tail: Fievel Goes West
programme.desc: Lured out west by the crafty Cat R. Waul, Fievel joins forces with famed lawdog Wylie Blurp to thwart a sinister plot to transform unsuspecting settlers into mouse burgers!

programme.title: The Road to El Dorado
programme.desc: Get ready for an exhilarating ride of a lifetime! Join Tulio and Miguel and their hilarious horse Altivo as they set sail, map in hand, in search of golden treasure in the all-star adventure, The Road to El Dorado! Upon landing on the shores of El Dorado, the legendary Lost City of Gold, Tulio and Miguel are mistaken for gods and are lavished with riches beyond their wildest dreams! As friendship, loyalty, and greed collide, our unlikely heroes must make the decision of their lives: run off with the gold or face unforeseen dangers to save the people of El Dorado.

programme.title: Despicable Me
programme.desc: In a happy suburban neighbourhood surrounded by white picket fences and flowering rose bushes sits a black house with a dead lawn. Unbeknownst to the neighbours, hidden deep beneath this home is a vast secret hideout belonging to Gru, a dastardly villain who, along with the help of his many little minions, is planning the biggest heist in the history of the world: hes going to steal the moon!

programme.title: Paddington 2
programme.desc: Now happily settled with the Brown family, Paddington picks up a series of odd jobs to buy the perfect present for his Aunt Lucys 100th birthday, only for the gift to be stolen.

programme.title: Antz
programme.desc: A worker ant changes roles with a soldier ant to woo a forbidden princess.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda 2
programme.desc: Po is now living his dream as The Dragon Warrior. But his new life is threatened by the emergence of a formidable villain, who plans to use a secret weapon to conquer China.

programme.title: Landscape Artist of the Year
programme.desc: In North Wales, eight artists compete in front of a historic slate quarry in the fifth heat.

programme.title: Portrait Artist of the Year
programme.desc: The seven contestants who won through in the regional heats face their most daunting challenge yet as they paint a double portrait at the Royal Academy. They have eight hours to capture Anglican priest Sally Hitchiner and avowed atheist Richard Dawkins on the same canvas, aiming to impress judges Tai Shan Schierenberg, Kate Bryan and Kathleen Soriano and win one of three places in the final.

programme.title: Born to Be King
programme.desc: Reveals the compelling inside story of the extraordinary life of King Charles. The documentary uses unique, unprecedented and unlimited access to a fascinating well of footage to show a definitive story of the man behind the crown, while exploring the direction of the British monarchy under King Charles III.

programme.title: Secrets of the Queens Coronation
programme.desc: A behind-the-scenes look at Queen Elizabeth IIs coronation. This documentary shares memories and anecdotes from people who plays key roles at the celebration, all speaking publicly for the first time.

programme.title: Love Has Won: The Cult of Mother God
programme.desc: Introduces Amys daughter, Madi, who describes her life growing up without a mother. Amy and the Love Has Won commune are kicked out of Hawaii after Amy claims to be Pele, the Hawaiian goddess of fire. Amys health continues to deteriorate and after her death, her followers take her body to Colorado where the compound is raided 12 days later.

programme.title: Great British Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Join Michael Portillo as he travels around the railway networks of Great Britain, Ireland, and the Isle of Man, and examines how these various destinations have developed since Victorian times.

programme.title: Great British Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Join Michael Portillo as he travels around the railway networks of Great Britain, Ireland, and the Isle of Man, and examines how these various destinations have developed since Victorian times.

programme.title: Stars of the Silver Screen
programme.desc: This documentary series takes an in-depth look at the lives of stars who have soared the highest. Come learn about your favourite stars and their extraordinary lives.

programme.title: The Brief History Of Cricket Downunder
programme.desc: Explore Australias sporting fortresses, delve into stories of their distinctive, sometimes unplayable wickets, antagonistic crowds and harsh climates. Meet the iconic batsmen and bowlers, heroic captains, and observe on-field antics ranging from poor behaviour to instances of brilliance and sportsmanship.

programme.title: Icons Unearthed: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Just as critical to the success of the show as the writers, the animators had drama and tension of their own. The funky, punk rock animation house Klasky Csupo, led by Gabor Csupo had secured the contract of a lifetime, but could they hold on to The Simpsons? Through internal strife and natural disasters, the animators gave The Simpsons their signature look.

programme.title: Born to Be King
programme.desc: Reveals the compelling inside story of the extraordinary life of King Charles. The documentary uses unique, unprecedented and unlimited access to a fascinating well of footage to show a definitive story of the man behind the crown, while exploring the direction of the British monarchy under King Charles III.

programme.title: Great British Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Join Michael Portillo as he travels around the railway networks of Great Britain, Ireland, and the Isle of Man, and examines how these various destinations have developed since Victorian times.

programme.title: Icons Unearthed: The Simpsons
programme.desc: With the departure of the original creative team, a fresh team of writers take over running the show. Bill Oakley and Josh Weinstein build on the legacy, expanding the world and exploring the side characters. To stay relevant, the Simpsons had to evolve; opening its doors to new creative voices, celebrity guest stars and even take on the big screen.

programme.title: Stars of the Silver Screen
programme.desc: In-depth profiles of some of the biggest movie stars from the golden age of Hollywood.

programme.title: The Brief History Of Cricket Downunder
programme.desc: Explore Australias sporting fortresses, delve into stories of their distinctive, sometimes unplayable wickets, antagonistic crowds and harsh climates. Meet the iconic batsmen and bowlers, heroic captains, and observe on-field antics ranging from poor behaviour to instances of brilliance and sportsmanship.

programme.title: Landscape Artist of the Year
programme.desc: Stephen Mangan returns for the final heat in Bristol, where eight artists compete along the bustling harbourside for a 10,000 pounds commission and a semifinal spot.

programme.title: Portrait Artist of the Year
programme.desc: The three remaining artists prepare for a tense final at the National Portrait Gallery in London, where they have just four hours to capture the likeness of Lord of the Rings and X-Men star Ian McKellen. Tai Shan Schierenberg, Kate Bryan and Kathleen Soriano judge the contestants on their final timed portrait, as well as on a painting of a mystery high-profile figure they were asked to complete following the semifinal. Who will win the coveted 10,000-pounds commission to paint actor Alan Cumming for the Scottish National Portrait Gallery?

programme.title: Branson
programme.desc: The series finale tracks the arduous history of Virgin Galactic, from conception to test flights, and the controversial bid from Virgin Atlantic to obtain government support for the airline during the Covid-19 pandemic. As the first passenger flight of Virgin Galactic approaches, Branson defends the benefits of privately funded space exploration and the paradoxes around Virgins eco-messaging. Set for July 11, 2021, the launch day follows 17 years of research, testing, accidents, and setbacks, culminating in a successful flight in which Branson realizes his ultimate dream.

programme.title: Icahn: The Restless Billionaire
programme.desc: The billionaire activist investor. Icahn is on the Forbes 400 and has a net worth of approximately $17 billion to $22 billion.

Even contract negotiations and corporate mergers never put the Simpsons future into question. But what theres no doubt about is the impact the show has had on viewers, television and popular culture.

programme.title: The Legend of the 81 Point Game
programme.desc: The historic and legendary 81 point game offers a great opportunity to tell the story of the amazing basketball player: Kobe Bryant. Former team mates, coaches and play-by-play commentators tell the story of this unique basketball game.

programme.desc: Follows the journey in the career of English football great Wayne Rooney, from his professional debut at the age of 16 to becoming Manchester United and Englands all-time top scorer.

Who will win the coveted 10,000-pounds commission to paint actor Alan Cumming for the Scottish National Portrait Gallery?

programme.title: Branson
programme.desc: The series finale tracks the arduous history of Virgin Galactic, from conception to test flights, and the controversial bid from Virgin Atlantic to obtain government support for the airline during the Covid-19 pandemic. As the first passenger flight of Virgin Galactic approaches, Branson defends the benefits of privately funded space exploration and the paradoxes around Virgins eco-messaging. Set for July 11, 2021, the launch day follows 17 years of research, testing, accidents, and setbacks, culminating in a successful flight in which Branson realizes his ultimate dream.

programme.title: Icahn: The Restless Billionaire
programme.desc: The billionaire activist investor. Icahn is on the Forbes 400 and has a net worth of approximately $17 billion to $22 billion.

programme.desc: Join Michael Portillo as he travels around the railway networks of Great Britain, Ireland, and the Isle of Man, and examines how these various destinations have developed since Victorian times.

programme.title: The Brief History Of Cricket Downunder
programme.desc: Explore Australias sporting fortresses, delve into stories of their distinctive, sometimes unplayable wickets, antagonistic crowds and harsh climates. programme.title: Idiot TV
programme.desc: Features hilarious fails from pensioners, pogo enthusiasts, and rush hour chaos. Javier Sanchez covers Mexicos Presidents Day celebrations.

programme.title: Ridiculousness
programme.desc: Rob Dyrdek and friends critique viral videos, categorizing them into "Hot Mess," "Worst Case Scenario," "Redneck Good Times," and "What Happened Last Night".

programme.title: Ridiculousness
programme.desc: Rob Dyrdek and friends critique viral videos, categorizing them into "Hot Mess," "Worst Case Scenario," "Redneck Good Times," and "What Happened Last Night".

programme.title: Two and a Half Men
programme.desc: Jake disappears with the daughter of Charlies neighbour and Charlie is left to cover his back. Meanwhile, Alan scores a hot date with the help of Charlies Mercedes.

programme.title: Two and a Half Men
programme.sub-title: He Smelled The Ham, He Got Excited
programme.desc: Evelyn offers to pay for Jakes college education, leaving Alan to wonder if he ever needs to work again.

programme.title: Taskmaster
programme.desc: Five comedians are set tasks challenging their creativity and wit. The tasks are supervised by Alex Horne but the Taskmaster, Greg Davies, always has the final word.

programme.title: Outback Truckers
programme.desc: The outback is one of the worlds last wild frontiers. Its vast, untamed and home to some of the toughest places to reach. For the truckers who travel this harsh country, theres only one way to get from A to B: the hard way.

programme.title: Backroad Truckers
programme.desc: Dale scores a job moving a travel trailer down a mountain to an off-grid owner. But slick muddy roads, a punctured tire, and a wrong turn have Dale wondering if he bit off more than he can chew. Tensions run high between father and son when Mother Nature blindsides Dave and Tristan on a massive steel deck move. On a run to pick up some western movie props for Big Donny, Angela ends up stranded and in desperate need of help on a remote gold rush trail.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: All the whales are coming to the big auction in Fullerton or at least, thats what Barry hears as he takes Dusty under his wing to see what kind of profit he can style. Rene has some dainty discoveries, while Darrells tool locker is quite eye-opening.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: The women outnumber the men in Rosamond, as Dusty and his girlfriend discover a stockpile of vintage TV memorabilia. Brandi enlists the help of both Danielle and Lisa to dig for gold, and what they find gives them pause. Kenny stumbles over what appears to be an exotic music box.

programme.title: Whose Line Is It Anyway?
programme.desc: Aisha Tyler hosts another fun packed episode of the legendary improv show featuring regulars Wayne Brady, Ryan Stiles and Colin Mochrie along with guest performer Heather Anne Campbell. The show begins with single Heather choosing between frat boy astronaut Wayne, Swedish milkmaid Colin and obnoxious frog prince Ryan in Lets Make a Date, this is followed by a skin crawling Newsflash involving Colin talking us through footage of bugs and worms. Ryan and Colin use audience suggested lines to act out a Cinderella Whose Line scenario before acting out scenes from a hat including strange psychiatrists and TV shows that shouldnt be sexy. The show ends with a tour de force from Wayne Brady in Greatest Hits as he performs car mechanic themed songs in the styles of Jason De Rulo and tap dance.

programme.title: Whose Line Is It Anyway?
programme.desc: Aisha Tyler hosts another hilarious episode of the legendary improv show featuring regulars Wayne Brady, Ryan Stiles and Colin Mochrie along with guest performer Jonathan Mangum. Beginning with a seriously weird speed dating event in Questions, the performers move on to a fast moving Jurassic Park scene in Forward Rewind ending where Jonathan falls from the stage and bangs his head. Theres more injury to follow for him as he is hit by collateral in a lively round of Infomercial before taking part on a packed game of Scenes from a Hat where the performers act out strange bath times, bad competitions, jobs that shouldnt be done in the nude and the wrong time to say I love you. The final two games of a jam packed six game show are a brilliant re-voicing of an old movie clip in Film Dub, followed by a mind bending volleyball scene in the always incredible Sideways Scene.

programme.title: 101 Places to Party Before You Die
programme.desc: The party heads outdoors as Adam and Jon attempt to conquer 4x4s, horseback riding and fly fishing. Not to mention the complicated liquor laws in Moab, Utah.

programme.title: Fear Factor
programme.desc: In each pulse-racing "Fear Factor" episode, contestants (sometimes solo, often paired with spouses, siblings or best friends) must decide if they have the guts and determination to face their most primal fears.

programme.title: The Great North

programme.title: Whose Line Is It Anyway?
programme.desc: Aisha Tyler hosts another memorable episode of the legendary improv show featuring regulars Wayne Brady, Ryan Stiles and Colin Mochrie along with guest performer Brad Sherwood. A laughter packed six game show begins with a horror movie themed edition of Questions, followed by more visual gags in the classic Props round a haunting tribute to Caroline who died in a fruit related accident in Doo Wop. Colin and Ryan battle with light sabres and the usual substandard audience noises in a Star Wars themed round of Sound Effects before acting out hilarious Scenes from Hat about Star Trek, national anthems and eating out. The show reaches a memorable conclusion with a Water Park themed set of Greatest Hits featuring Gilbert and Sullivan and Brad as Willie Nelson to Waynes sensational Stevie Wonder.

programme.title: Whose Line Is It Anyway?
programme.desc: Aisha Tyler hosts another hilarious episode of the legendary improv show featuring regulars Wayne Brady, Ryan Stiles and Colin Mochrie along with guest performer Jeff Davis. Highlights include Jeff choosing between an equine superhero, an over physical exorcist and a lab rat in Lets Make a Date followed by a moving Doo Wop tribute to Corey who died in a pet store related accident. Theres a festive Newsflash to confound Colin, followed by the ever-entertaining Scenes from a Hat, this time featuring strippergrams and evil laughs. The show builds to a foot-stomping conclusion with the always impressive Greatest Hits as Jeff and Wayne performs beauty salon themed album tracks in the style of German Opera and a remarkable Prince and Johnny Cash duet.

programme.title: Whose Line Is It Anyway?
programme.desc: Aisha Tyler hosts another laughter-filled episode of the legendary improv show featuring regulars Wayne Brady, Ryan Stiles and Colin Mochrie along with guest performer Keegan Michael Key. In a show packed with unforgettable moments, hats and wigs are donned to start the show off with a Vegas themed round of Questions, followed by a quirky playing of Sound Effects as Ryan and Colin act as French secret service agents on a mission in Paris. Weird News provides the usual eccentric mix of anchors with Keegans bitchy beautician and Ryans crazy lottery winner bookending Waynes brilliant 60 years of American TV one man montage. As ever, the Scenes from a Hat proves a fertile arena for comedy with the performers taking on waiters and a delightful fairy tale themed Jerry Springer episode. Keegan dons some khaki as a special forces recruit getting survival tips from expert Ryan in a typically screwball Helping Hands.

programme.title: Whose Line Is It Anyway?
programme.desc: Aisha Tyler hosts another hilarious episode of the legendary improv show featuring regulars Wayne Brady, Ryan Stiles and Colin Mochrie along with guest performer Heather Anne Campbell. Highlights include party giver Heather trying to work out Waynes evolving and devolving, Colins butt rescuer and Ryans array of possessed celebrities. Next up in the six game show, Colin talks us through a movie monster filled Newsflash, theres the usual quickfire invention in Props before a superbly sinister round of Secret featuring Colin and Ryan as a macabre Jack and Jill. Theres a peculiar pizza delivery in Film Dub and the show builds to a gym themed round of Greatest Hits with Wayne giving us herniated Latin Pop and Beyonce having a heart attack.

programme.desc: Aisha Tyler hosts another hilarious episode of the legendary improv show featuring regulars Wayne Brady, Ryan Stiles and Colin Mochrie along with guest performer Jonathan Mangum. Beginning with a seriously weird speed dating event in Questions, the performers move on to a fast moving Jurassic Park scene in Forward Rewind ending where Jonathan falls from the stage and bangs his head. Theres more injury to follow for him as he is hit by collateral in a lively round of Infomercial before taking part on a packed game of Scenes from a Hat where the performers act out strange bath times, bad competitions, jobs that shouldnt be done in the nude and the wrong time to say I love you. The final two games of a jam packed six game show are a brilliant re-voicing of an old movie clip in Film Dub, followed by a mind bending volleyball scene in the always incredible Sideways Scene.

programme.title: Whose Line Is It Anyway?

programme.title: Whose Line Is It Anyway?
programme.desc: Aisha Tyler hosts another laughter-filled episode of the legendary improv show featuring regulars Wayne Brady, Ryan Stiles and Colin Mochrie along with guest performer Keegan Michael Key. In a show packed with unforgettable moments, hats and wigs are donned to start the show off with a Vegas themed round of Questions, followed by a quirky playing of Sound Effects as Ryan and Colin act as French secret service agents on a mission in Paris. Weird News provides the usual eccentric mix of anchors with Keegans bitchy beautician and Ryans crazy lottery winner bookending Waynes brilliant 60 years of American TV one man montage. As ever, the Scenes from a Hat proves a fertile arena for comedy with the performers taking on waiters and a delightful fairy tale themed Jerry Springer episode. Keegan dons some khaki as a special forces recruit getting survival tips from expert Ryan in a typically screwball Helping Hands.

programme.title: Whose Line Is It Anyway?
programme.desc: Aisha Tyler hosts another hilarious episode of the legendary improv show featuring regulars Wayne Brady, Ryan Stiles and Colin Mochrie along with guest performer Heather Anne Campbell. Next up in the six game show, Colin talks us through a movie monster filled Newsflash, theres the usual quickfire invention in Props before a superbly sinister round of Secret featuring Colin and Ryan as a macabre Jack and Jill. Theres a peculiar pizza delivery in Film Dub and the show builds to a gym themed round of Greatest Hits with Wayne giving us herniated Latin Pop and Beyonce having a heart attack.

programme.title: Idiot TV

programme.title: Outback Truckers

programme.title: Two and a Half Men
programme.desc: One of Charlies old partners in crime dies, leaving Charlie to re-evaluate his own reckless lifestyle.

programme.title: Two and a Half Men

programme.title: Backroad Truckers
programme.desc: Dale and his son strike out on an urgent delivery, but Dales truck breaks down at the worst time possible stranding Dale and Cooper on the side of a busy and snowy mountain highway. Angela is called to remove an off-road vehicle that has her seeing dollar signs if she can find some way to get the rare machine out of the ditch and on to her truck. Craig goes on a garlic farming adventure but risks blowing the job when a very important and mysterious special package goes missing.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: Lancaster is Ivys honeypot, so everyone had better watch out or they might get stung. Lisa plans to use the right side of her brain when selecting lockers or is it the left? While Dusty and "Tollbooth Lupe" do a mitzvah.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: The buyers head out to Palm Springs, in search of higher end goods. Kenny tries to amp up the profit on an otherwise unimpressive unit. Rene sees quick potential where others dont and puts his pocket change into it. Brandi and Bozek try to keep their gains from squirming away.

programme.title: The Russell Howard Hour
programme.desc: Join Russell for his take on current affairs as he mocks the madness of the news with his unique sense of humour.

programme.title: Whose Line Is It Anyway?
programme.desc: Aisha Tyler hosts another memorable episode of the legendary improv show featuring regulars Wayne Brady, Ryan Stiles and Colin Mochrie along with guest performer Brad Sherwood. A laughter packed six game show begins with a horror movie themed edition of Questions, followed by more visual gags in the classic Props round a haunting tribute to Caroline who died in a fruit related accident in Doo Wop. Colin and Ryan battle with light sabres and the usual substandard audience noises in a Star Wars themed round of Sound Effects before acting out hilarious Scenes from Hat about Star Trek, national anthems and eating out. The show reaches a memorable conclusion with a Water Park themed set of Greatest Hits featuring Gilbert and Sullivan and Brad as Willie Nelson to Waynes sensational Stevie Wonder.

programme.title: Whose Line Is It Anyway?
programme.desc: Aisha Tyler hosts another hilarious episode of the legendary improv show featuring regulars Wayne Brady, Ryan Stiles and Colin Mochrie along with guest performer Jeff Davis. Highlights include Jeff choosing between an equine superhero, an over physical exorcist and a lab rat in Lets Make a Date followed by a moving Doo Wop tribute to Corey who died in a pet store related accident. Theres a festive Newsflash to confound Colin, followed by the ever-entertaining Scenes from a Hat, this time featuring strippergrams and evil laughs. The show builds to a foot-stomping conclusion with the always impressive Greatest Hits as Jeff and Wayne performs beauty salon themed album tracks in the style of German Opera and a remarkable Prince and Johnny Cash duet.

programme.title: 101 Places to Party Before You Die
programme.desc: Of course these Island Boys went to Maui for the season finale. Wouldnt you?

programme.title: Fear Factor
programme.desc: In each pulse-racing "Fear Factor" episode, contestants (sometimes solo, often paired with spouses, siblings or best friends) must decide if they have the guts and determination to face their most primal fears.

programme.title: The Great North
programme.desc: Beef is recruited to pilot a superyacht owned by an eccentric billionaire. Wolf and Honeybee come to suspect that a mysterious stranger is Wolf from the future.

programme.title: Whose Line Is It Anyway?
programme.desc: Aisha Tyler hosts another laughter-filled episode of the legendary improv show featuring regulars Wayne Brady, Ryan Stiles and Colin Mochrie along with guest performer Keegan Michael Key. In a show packed with unforgettable moments, hats and wigs are donned to start the show off with a Vegas themed round of Questions, followed by a quirky playing of Sound Effects as Ryan and Colin act as French secret service agents on a mission in Paris. Weird News provides the usual eccentric mix of anchors with Keegans bitchy beautician and Ryans crazy lottery winner bookending Waynes brilliant 60 years of American TV one man montage. As ever, the Scenes from a Hat proves a fertile arena for comedy with the performers taking on waiters and a delightful fairy tale themed Jerry Springer episode. Keegan dons some khaki as a special forces recruit getting survival tips from expert Ryan in a typically screwball Helping Hands.

programme.title: Whose Line Is It Anyway?
programme.desc: Aisha Tyler hosts another hilarious episode of the legendary improv show featuring regulars Wayne Brady, Ryan Stiles and Colin Mochrie along with guest performer Heather Anne Campbell. Highlights include party giver Heather trying to work out Waynes evolving and devolving, Colins butt rescuer and Ryans array of possessed celebrities. Next up in the six game show, Colin talks us through a movie monster filled Newsflash, theres the usual quickfire invention in Props before a superbly sinister round of Secret featuring Colin and Ryan as a macabre Jack and Jill. Theres a peculiar pizza delivery in Film Dub and the show builds to a gym themed round of Greatest Hits with Wayne giving us herniated Latin Pop and Beyonce having a heart attack.

programme.title: Idiot TV
programme.desc: Features water fails, holiday mishaps, and footage of the worlds worst toilet. Meet lonely Pavel seeking love and enjoy DJ Steves drum and bass remix.

programme.title: Idiot TV
programme.desc: Showcases job fails, falling fools, and wacky weddings. Learn how to get sacked, enjoy marital mishaps, and see top historical falls. Plus, Eugosto de Fundos covers Brazils latest.

programme.title: Two and a Half Men
programme.desc: Judith is pregnant with a baby girl and Alan is convinced he is the father. Meanwhile, Jake is in a contentious mood and Charlie thinks he knows why.

programme.title: Two and a Half Men
programme.sub-title: David Copperfield Slipped Me A Roofie
programme.desc: Convinced that Alans family doesnt fully appreciate him, Melissa invites Alan to live with her and her mum.

programme.title: Taskmaster
