programme.desc: The outback is one of the worlds last wild frontiers. Its vast, untamed and home to some of the toughest places to reach. For the truckers who travel this harsh country, theres only one way to get from A to B: the hard way.

programme.title: Backroad Truckers
programme.desc: With his first year business on the ropes, Dale goes hat-in-hand to his former boss, Big Donny, to get his truck back. Dave goes solo with a heavy WW2 military vehicle move that has him pushing his vehicles limits. Craigs biodiesel hotshot in his girlfriends truck is derailed when he inadvertently smashes into a tree.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: The sun is beating down in Oceanside, bringing out all the parasols. Dusty and Lupe steal a no-brainer locker and it pays off handsomely. Darrell taxes himself and it almost puts him in storage jail. Brandi and Lisa find their true identities and ultimately "re-cover" their investment.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.sub-title: The Way Of The Gam Gam
programme.desc: While in Santa Ana, Lisa channels her grandmother, in trying to turn a profit. Brandi is dealing with the most frustrating day ever. Darrell tries to make a meal out of a snack-sized locker and Kenny learns to prep himself for true stealthiness.

programme.title: Idiot TV
programme.desc: Features water fails, holiday mishaps, and footage of the worlds worst toilet. Meet lonely Pavel seeking love and enjoy DJ Steves drum and bass remix.

programme.title: Idiot TV
programme.desc: Showcases job fails, falling fools, and wacky weddings. Learn how to get sacked, enjoy marital mishaps, and see top historical falls. Plus, Eugosto de Fundos covers Brazils latest.

programme.title: Outback Truckers
programme.desc: The outback is one of the worlds last wild frontiers. Its vast, untamed and home to some of the toughest places to reach. For the truckers who travel this harsh country, theres only one way to get from A to B: the hard way.

programme.title: Two and a Half Men
programme.desc: Judith is pregnant with a baby girl and Alan is convinced he is the father. Meanwhile, Jake is in a contentious mood and Charlie thinks he knows why.

programme.title: Two and a Half Men
programme.sub-title: David Copperfield Slipped Me A Roofie
programme.desc: Convinced that Alans family doesnt fully appreciate him, Melissa invites Alan to live with her and her mum.

programme.title: Mad Max 2: The Road Warrior
programme.desc: Mel Gibson first made his mark on movie history as heroic loner Max, who drives the roads of outback Australia in an unending search for gasoline. Arrayed against him and the other scraggly defenders of a fuel-depot encampment are the bizarre warriors commanded by The Humungus, notorious for never taking prisoners when they can pulverize them instead. With The Road Warrior on your side, screen action doesnt get any better.

programme.title: S.W.A.T.
programme.desc: A French drug kingpin offers a huge reward to anyone who can break him out of jail and only the LAPDs Special Weapons and Tactics team can prevent it.

programme.title: The Bourne Legacy
programme.desc: On the verge of having their conspiracy exposed, members of the governments intelligence community will stop at nothing to erase all evidence of their top secret programs - even the agents involved. Aaron Cross must use his genetically-engineered skills to survive the ultimate game of cat-and-mouse and finish what Jason Bourne started.

programme.title: Skyscraper
programme.desc: Former FBI Hostage Rescue Team leader and U.S. war veteran Will Sawyer now assesses security for skyscrapers. On assignment in Hong Kong he finds the tallest, safest building in the world, The Pearl, suddenly ablaze, and hes been framed for it. A wanted man on the run, Will must find those responsible, clear his name and somehow rescue his family who is trapped inside the building above the fire line.

programme.title: Bad Boys
programme.desc: Two Miami cops must find $100 million in stolen heroin before their department is shut down. With time running out, detectives Burnett and Lowrey track a master thief into the Miami underworld, dodging bullets and bad guys along the way. A sexy witness can identify the suspect, but a mix-up causes her to believe Burnett is Lowrey, forcing the partners to switch identities. Now, between shoot-outs and car chases, married man Burnett has to stick close to their only witness, while playboy Lowrey goes home to his partners wife and kids to learn the joys of parenthood - the hard way.

programme.title: Bloodshot
programme.desc: Based on the Valiant Comics series, Bloodshot, an ex-killer for the mob and slain soldier, is re-animated with superpowers.

programme.title: Hard Target
programme.desc: The thrill of the hunt. Its the ultimate drug, and the more intense the rush, the higher the price. Chance, is the target of an evil mercenary who recruits homeless combat veterans for the amusement of his clients, bored tycoons who will pay a half a million dollars to stalk and kill the most challenging prey of them all: Man.

programme.title: Nobody
programme.desc: After failing to fight for his family during a robbery, an unassuming father calls on skills from his hidden past to become a lethal vigilante blazing a wild ride to revenge.

programme.title: Lights Out
programme.desc: A homeless veteran gets caught up in the world of underground fight clubs.

programme.title: Pulp Fiction
programme.desc: Winnfield and Vincent Vega are two hitmen out to retrieve a suitcase stolen from their employer, mob boss Marcellus Wallace. Wallace has also asked Vincent to take his wife Mia out a few days later when Wallace himself will be out of town. Butch Coolidge is an ageing boxer who is paid by Wallace to lose his next fight. Honey Bunny and Pumpkin are a couple of young lovers and small time thieves who decide they need a change of venue. The lives of these seemingly unrelated people are woven together in a wildly entertaining and exhilarating motion picture adventure that both thrills and amuses.

programme.title: Monkey Man
programme.desc: Inspired by the legend of Hanuman, an icon embodying strength and courage, Monkey Man stars Patel as Kid, an anonymous young man who ekes out a meager living in an underground fight club where, night after night, wearing a gorilla mask, he is beaten bloody by more popular fighters for cash. After years of suppressed rage, Kid discovers a way to infiltrate the enclave of the citys sinister elite. As his childhood trauma boils over, his mysteriously scarred hands unleash an explosive campaign of retribution to settle the score with the men who took everything from him.

programme.title: The Fall Guy
programme.desc: Hes a stuntman, and like everyone in the stunt community, he gets blown up, shot, crashed, thrown through windows and dropped from the highest of heights, all for our entertainment. And now, fresh off an almost career-ending accident, this working-class hero has to track down a missing movie star, solve a conspiracy and try to win back the love of his life while still doing his day job. What could possibly go right?

programme.title: Hard Target
programme.desc: The thrill of the hunt. Its the ultimate drug, and the more intense the rush, the higher the price. Chance, is the target of an evil mercenary who recruits homeless combat veterans for the amusement of his clients, bored tycoons who will pay a half a million dollars to stalk and kill the most challenging prey of them all: Man.

programme.title: Welcome to the Jungle
programme.desc: Beck is a bounty hunter sent into the treacherous jungles of the Amazon to bring the rebellious Travis back to the States. When Beck and Travis reluctantly join forces to hunt down a priceless treasure, this unlikely team embarks on a pulse-pounding, nonstop thrill ride.

programme.title: Furiosa: A Mad Max Saga
programme.desc: As the world fell, young Furiosa is snatched from the Green Place of Many Mothers and falls into the hands of a great biker horde led by the warlord Dementus. Sweeping through the Wasteland, they come across the Citadel presided over by The Immortan Joe. While the two tyrants war for dominance, Furiosa must survive many trials as she puts together the means to find her way home.

programme.title: Suicide Squad
programme.desc: It feels good to be bad. Assemble a team of the worlds most dangerous, incarcerated supervillains, provide them with the most powerful arsenal at the governments disposal, and send them off on a mission to defeat an enigmatic, insuperable entity. US intelligence officer Amanda Waller has determined only a secretly convened group of disparate, despicable individuals with next to nothing to lose will do. Once they realise they werent picked to succeed, but chosen for their patent culpability when they inevitably fail, will the Suicide Squad resolve to die trying, or decide its everyone for themself?

programme.title: Bad Boys 2
programme.desc: Burnett and Lowrey reunite as out-of-control, trash-talking cops. Bullets fly, cars crash, and laughs explode as they pursue a whacked-out drug lord from the streets of Miami to the barrios of Cuba.

programme.title: The Punisher
programme.desc: Undercover FBI agent Frank Castle (Thomas Jane) is crushed when his wife and children are killed after accidentally witnessing a mafia hit. With nothing left to lose or to live for, Castle becomes The Punisher a one-man judge, jury and executioner who declares open season on criminals throughout America. Based on the Marvel Comics character, the film also stars John Travolta, Laura Harring, Samantha Mathis and Rebecca Romijn.

programme.title: Punisher: War Zone
programme.desc: The Punisher is around and trouble begins when he accidentally kills an undercover FBI agent while raiding the warehouse of Mafia warlord Billy the Face, prompting a crisis of conscience in the vigilante. Billy is then fed through a glass recycling machine, creating one of the Punishers greatest comic book enemies, Jigsaw. The unfortunate agent had stashed away all of Jigsaws racketeering money, and the bad guy decides to lean on the dead mans widow and daughter to recover it, which doesnt go down at all with The Punisher.

programme.title: The Killer
programme.desc: An assassin tries to make amends in an effort to restore the sight of a beautiful young singer.

programme.title: Inglourious Basterds
programme.desc: As war rages in Europe, a Nazi-scalping squad of American soldiers, known to their enemy as The Basterds, is on a daring mission to take down the leaders of the Third Reich.

programme.title: S.W.A.T.
programme.desc: A French drug kingpin offers a huge reward to anyone who can break him out of jail and only the LAPDs Special Weapons and Tactics team can prevent it.

programme.title: Silent Night
programme.desc: A father witnesses his sons death in a gangs crossfire on Christmas Eve. While recovering from a wound that costs him his voice, he makes vengeance his lifes mission.

programme.title: Tango and Cash
programme.desc: Two narcotics detectives cant stand each other. When a crime lord frames them for murder, they have to buddy up to clear their names and put him away.

programme.title: Repo Men
programme.desc: Supplying sophisticated and hugely expensive artificial organs to those in need, multinational company The Union has a virtual monopoly on life and death. Unfortunately, for those who cant keep up the repayments, the firms repo men are despatched to reclaim company property - no matter the consequences for the customer. After suffering a heart attack on the job, top repo man Remy wakes to find the company have fitted him with the latest heart replacement, along with a sizeable debt repayment. Unable to make the payments, and rapidly losing his taste for the job, Remy goes on the run, teaming up with his former wife, Beth, who is also fleeing the system.

programme.title: Last Action Hero
programme.desc: A projectionist allows 11-year-old boy Danny to a private midnight preview of the latest movie featuring his idol and superhero, Jack Slater. A magic ticket transports the boy into the film, where he helps his hero chase the baddie, who in turn breaks through the screen to wreak havoc in real-life, with the help of an evil sidekick.

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles (2014)
programme.desc: The city needs heroes. Darkness has settled over New York City as Shredder and his evil Foot Clan have an iron grip on everything from the police to the politicians. The future is grim until four unlikely outcast brothers rise from the sewers and discover their destiny as Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles. The Turtles must work with fearless reporter April ONeil and her wise-cracking cameraman Vern Fenwick to save the city and unravel Shredders diabolical plan.

programme.title: Charlies Angels (2019)
programme.desc: In this next generation, the worlds most highly trained women all over the globe are now teams of Angels guided by multiple Bosleys taking on the toughest jobs everywhere.

programme.title: Mad Max 2: The Road Warrior
programme.desc: Mel Gibson first made his mark on movie history as heroic loner Max, who drives the roads of outback Australia in an unending search for gasoline. programme.desc: Two narcotics detectives cant stand each other. When a crime lord frames them for murder, they have to buddy up to clear their names and put him away.

programme.title: Repo Men
programme.desc: Supplying sophisticated and hugely expensive artificial organs to those in need, multinational company The Union has a virtual monopoly on life and death. Unfortunately, for those who cant keep up the repayments, the firms repo men are despatched to reclaim company property - no matter the consequences for the customer. After suffering a heart attack on the job, top repo man Remy wakes to find the company have fitted him with the latest heart replacement, along with a sizeable debt repayment. Unable to make the payments, and rapidly losing his taste for the job, Remy goes on the run, teaming up with his former wife, Beth, who is also fleeing the system.

programme.title: Last Action Hero
programme.desc: A projectionist allows 11-year-old boy Danny to a private midnight preview of the latest movie featuring his idol and superhero, Jack Slater. A magic ticket transports the boy into the film, where he helps his hero chase the baddie, who in turn breaks through the screen to wreak havoc in real-life, with the help of an evil sidekick.

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles (2014)
programme.desc: The city needs heroes. Darkness has settled over New York City as Shredder and his evil Foot Clan have an iron grip on everything from the police to the politicians. The future is grim until four unlikely outcast brothers rise from the sewers and discover their destiny as Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles. The Turtles must work with fearless reporter April ONeil and her wise-cracking cameraman Vern Fenwick to save the city and unravel Shredders diabolical plan.

programme.title: Charlies Angels (2019)
programme.desc: In this next generation, the worlds most highly trained women all over the globe are now teams of Angels guided by multiple Bosleys taking on the toughest jobs everywhere.

programme.title: The Mummy: Tomb of the Dragon Emperor
programme.desc: The OConnells must stop a mummy awoken from a 2000-year-old curse who threatens to plunge the world into his merciless, unending service. Doomed by a wronged sorceress, Zi Yuan, to spend eternity in suspended animation, the ruthless Dragon Emperor and his 10,000 warriors have laid forgotten for eons, entombed in clay as a vast, silent Terracotta Army.

programme.title: Hitch
programme.desc: Hitch is a cocky and successful date doctor for the unlucky in love, but when he falls for gossip columnist Sara, he forgets his own rules.

programme.title: Transformers: Age of Extinction
programme.desc: This film begins after an epic battle left a great city torn, but with the world saved. As humanity picks up the pieces, a shadowy group reveals itself in an attempt to control the direction of history, while an ancient, powerful new menace sets Earth in its crosshairs. With help from a new cast of humans, Optimus Prime and the Autobots rise to meet their most fearsome challenge yet. In an incredible adventure, they are swept up in a war of good and evil, ultimately leading to a climactic battle across the world.

programme.title: Warcraft: The Beginning
programme.desc: The peaceful realm of Azeroth stands on the brink of war as its civilisation faces a fearsome race of invaders: Orc warriors fleeing their dying home to colonise another. As a portal opens to connect the two worlds, one army faces destruction and the other faces extinction. From opposing sides, two heroes are set on a collision course that will decide the fate of their family, their people and their home. So begins a spectacular saga of power and sacrifice in which war has many faces, and everyone fights for something.

programme.title: The Hangover
programme.desc: Two days before his wedding, Doug and his three friends drive to Las Vegas for a blow-out bachelor party theyll never forget. But, in fact, when the three groomsmen wake up the next morning, they cant remember a thing. For some reason, they find a tiger in the bathroom and a six-month-old baby in the closet of their suite at Caesars Palace. The one thing they cant find is Doug. With no clue as to what transpired and little time to spare, the trio must retrace their hazy steps and all their bad decisions in order to figure out where things went wrong and hopefully get Doug back to LA in time to walk down the aisle.

programme.title: Saturday Night
programme.desc: Tensions run high as producer Lorne Michaels and a ferocious troupe of young comedians and writers prepare for the first broadcast of "Saturday Night Live" on Oct. 11, 1975.

programme.title: Once Upon A Time... In Hollywood
programme.desc: The highly anticipated 9th film from Quentin Tarantino. In 1969 Los Angeles, during the Charles Manson murders, a TV actor and his stunt double, embark on an odyssey to make a name for themselves in the film industry.

programme.title: Hitch
programme.desc: Hitch is a cocky and successful date doctor for the unlucky in love, but when he falls for gossip columnist Sara, he forgets his own rules.

programme.title: Holmes and Watson
programme.desc: Holmes and Watson join forces to solve a murder at Buckingham Palace. They soon realise that they only have 5760 minutes to solve the case, or the Queen will be next.

programme.title: Identity Thief
programme.desc: Unlimited funds have allowed Diana to live it up on the outskirts of Orlando. Theres only one glitch: shes financing her shopping sprees with an ID stolen from Sandy Patterson, an accounts rep who lives halfway across the US. With only one week to hunt down the con artist before his world implodes, the real Sandy Patterson is forced to extreme measures to clear his name.

programme.title: The Hangover
programme.desc: Two days before his wedding, Doug and his three friends drive to Las Vegas for a blow-out bachelor party theyll never forget. But, in fact, when the three groomsmen wake up the next morning, they cant remember a thing. For some reason, they find a tiger in the bathroom and a six-month-old baby in the closet of their suite at Caesars Palace. The one thing they cant find is Doug. With no clue as to what transpired and little time to spare, the trio must retrace their hazy steps and all their bad decisions in order to figure out where things went wrong and hopefully get Doug back to LA in time to walk down the aisle.

programme.title: Jack Reacher
programme.desc: A military cop becomes involved in a deadly game of cat-and-mouse when five people are randomly murdered by a sniper.

programme.title: Tenet
programme.desc: Armed with only one word, Tenet, and fighting for the survival of the entire world, The Protagonist journeys through a twilight world of international espionage on a mission that will unfold into something beyond real time. Not time travel. Inversion.

programme.title: Beverly Hills Cop II
programme.desc: Axel Foley turns up the heat when the street-wise cop leads sidekick Judge Reinhold on the trail of a weapons kingpin and his leather-clad hit-lady.

programme.title: Dolittle
programme.desc: After losing his wife seven years earlier, the eccentric Dr. John Dolittle, famed doctor and veterinarian of Queen Victorias England, hermits himself away behind the high walls of Dolittle Manor with only his menagerie of exotic animals for company. But when the young queen falls gravely ill, a reluctant Dolittle is forced to set sail on an epic adventure to a mythical island in search of a cure, regaining his wit and courage as he crosses old adversaries and discovers wondrous creatures.

programme.title: Forrest Gump
programme.desc: This film follows a man with a low IQ who has accomplished great things in his life and been present during significant historic events - in each case, far exceeding what anyone imagined he could do. Yet, despite all the things he has attained, his one true love eludes him.

programme.title: Dune: Part Two
programme.desc: Dune: Part Two will explore the mythic journey of Paul Atreides as he unites with Chani and the Fremen while on a warpath of revenge against the conspirators who destroyed his family. Facing a choice between the love of his life and the fate of the known universe, he endeavors to prevent a terrible future only he can foresee.

programme.title: Wonder Woman 1984
programme.desc: In the vibrant, sleek 1980s, Wonder Woman will have to muster all her strength, wisdom and courage as she finds herself squaring off against Maxwell Lord and the Cheetah.

programme.title: Smokin Aces
programme.desc: After snitching mob secrets to the FBI, a $1 million contract is put out on Buddy Aces Israel. Now, everybody wants him dead.

programme.title: Tenet
programme.desc: Armed with only one word, Tenet, and fighting for the survival of the entire world, The Protagonist journeys through a twilight world of international espionage on a mission that will unfold into something beyond real time. Not time travel. Inversion.

programme.title: Batman Begins
programme.desc: This story explores the origins of the Batman legend and the Dark Knights emergence as a force for good in Gotham. In the wake of his parents murder, disillusioned industrial heir Bruce Wayne travels the world seeking the means to fight injustice and turn fear against those who prey on the fearful. He returns to Gotham and unveils his alter-ego: Batman, a masked crusader who uses his strength, intellect and an array of high tech deceptions to fight the sinister forces that threaten the city.

programme.title: Patriot Games
programme.desc: Former CIA analyst Jack Ryan travels to London with his wife and child. Upon being caught in the middle of a terrorist attack on a member of the royal family, Ryan helps to thwart the assailants. Ryans courageous act, however, marks him and his family as a target for revenge in the sights of the terrorist whose brother Ryan killed.

programme.title: Top Gun
programme.desc: A pilot is selected to attend the Top Gun Naval Flying School while also pursuing a relationship with an instructor.

programme.title: Tenor
programme.desc: While working part-time as a food deliveryman, Antoine, an aspiring young rapper from the suburbs of Paris, meets Mrs. Loyseau, an eminent teacher at the Paris Opera. Stunned by the young mans raw talent, she introduces him to the world of opera. As Antoine becomes one of Mrs. Loyseaus students, he hides his new dream from his friends and family, fearing that they wont understand. Somewhere in between the gilded and uptight Parisian upper-class, and the harsh yet free-spirited and familiar suburbs he grew up in, Antoine will have to find his own voice.

programme.title: Blue Beetle
programme.desc: A Mexican-American college grads life is turned upside down when a mysterious scarab gives him the ability to generate an exoskeleton suit of incredible power.

programme.title: Dear Evan Hansen
programme.desc: In this film adaptation of the Broadway phenomenon, Evan Hansen is an anxious, isolated high-schooler who aches for understanding and belonging amid the chaos and cruelty of the social media age.

programme.title: Station 19
programme.desc: Vic and Travis friendship is put to the test as they respond to calls to help two best friends in need; Jack realises he has a greater impact on Marcus than he thought.

programme.title: Blue Bloods
programme.desc: In the Season 6 finale, public outrage erupts when a cop isnt indicted for shooting a teenager, and the fallout affects Frank, the mayor and Erins office. Later, an officer gets shot in a possible case of retaliation, so Danny searches for the shooter.

programme.desc: S.W.A.T.s anti-terror sting operation at a bus station is thrown into chaos when felons, fleeing the police, burst in and take the bus station hostage.

programme.title: The Restoration Road
programme.desc: As we travel this side of life, none of us arrives anywhere by accident. We choose, think, pray, and feel our way down a road of desires and intentional acts that bring us to our destination. We program our internal GPS to guide us to one of two places: destruction or restoration. Which direction are you heading? For seventeen years, host, Mitch Kruse was owner, CEO, and auctioneer for Kruse International, the worlds largest collector car sales organisation. Today, Mitch writes and speaks to a wide array of audiences and on The Restoration Road offers sound biblical teaching exploring wisdom, leadership and restoration. Is there anything in your life that needs restoration? Like a classic car that needs restoration, each one of us must surrender our old wreck of a life to the Restorer who desires to return us to His original design.

programme.title: Bible Discovery TV
programme.desc: Hosted by the Hembree family, Bible Discovery TV is a thirty-minute daily devotional show where Rod, Janice, Ryan and Corie walk you through the Word in a way that will forever change how you read, learn and experience the Bible.

programme.title: Answers with Bayless Conley
programme.sub-title: What I Got Right and Wrong on My Journey Part 2
programme.desc: Relationships are critical in the Christian life-so how do you navigate relationships well while keeping faith at the forefront? In part two of What I Got Right and Wrong on My Journey, Pastor Bayless delves deeper into the decisions that shape our spiritual lives, emphasizing the importance of choosing the right companions and the transformative power of prioritizing family relationships. Get indispensable wisdom to help you navigate lifes relationships well in this encouraging message!

programme.title: Katherine Ruonala Ministries
programme.desc: Katherine Ruonala shares a practical message of love and hope to the nations. Reaching across denominational walls, her ministry is used to spread the fires of revival and ignite a fresh passion in the hearts of believers to go deeper in their relationship with God. Katherine carries a strong prophetic and miracle anointing with many experiencing instant healing in her meetings.

programme.title: The 700 Club
programme.desc: The 700 Club is a daily magazine programme with news, interviews, lifestyle features and true-life stories from a Christian perspective. including powerful and dramatic testimonies of God touching peoples lives. Where does the name The 700 Club come from? When the show started to air more than 50 years ago, founder and host Pat Robertson needed to have just 700 Partners to donate $5 a month to make the programme possible. Those original 700 supporters couldnt have imagined they would start a TV show that is now seen every day in over 200 countries, impacting the nations with the Gospel of Jesus Christ!

programme.title: Joyce Meyer: Enjoying Everyday Life
programme.desc: With her no nonsense preaching Joyce Meyer shares practical teaching about living life as a Christian. In an encouraging and supportive way, hear real stories that will challenge you to be the best that you can be. Joyce Meyer is one of the worlds leading practical Bible teachers. A New York Times bestselling author, her books have helped millions of people find hope and restoration through Jesus Christ. In this series you will see her powerful preaching from her home church, as well as the crusades around the world, and intriguing interviews with a variety of guests. Be inspired and encouraged this week, with Joyce Meyer on Enjoying Everyday Life.

programme.title: In Touch
programme.sub-title: How To Claim A Promise/A Life of Self-Discipline
programme.desc: The In Touch program reaches the world with the Gospel with messages that tackle such issues as parenting, finances, personal crises, emotions, and relationships. Dr. Stanley fervently believes the Bible to be the inerrant Word of God, a belief strongly reflected in his teaching. Dr Charles Stanley is the author of more than 50 books.

programme.title: Just Jake
programme.desc: Jake, a country music star, returns to his hometown to tackle a severe case of writers block. Amidst the backdrop of familiar streets and faces, Jake reconnects with Amber, his high school sweetheart. As old feelings bubble to the surface, Jake finds himself torn between his career aspirations and the pull of his past. The small-town charm and the rekindled passion for music help Jake find his artistic voice again. With a soundtrack echoing the heartbeats of first love and second chances, Just Jake is a melodious journey of love, self-discovery, and the roots that shape us.

programme.title: Jeni: Hometown Harvest
programme.desc: Youve seen her in the kitchen before, rolling out doughnuts and putting together ceviche. But, this time its Jenis turn to show off her culinary skills in her new series Jeni: Hometown Harvest. Jeni, joined by her close friends and family, is cooking up some of her favourite autumn foods like beef stew, chocolate chip cookies, and challah bread. But a season of Jeni wouldnt be complete with out some fun activities like pumpkin carving, skeet shooting, and running through a corn maze. Come along as Jeni opens her doors and welcomes you into the family.

programme.title: Holy Moly
programme.desc: Holy Moly turns the Bible into a living, breathing colouring book that will delight children of all ages. Eyes will be fixed on the screen, observing how God is at work in the story when colour is introduced to an otherwise black-and-white world. Rather than dialogue, the series focuses on the Biblical characters actions and emotions to help audiences of any language or background immediately relate to and remember these enriching stories.

programme.title: The Blello Show
programme.desc: Join Kyle, Lyds, Extra Bear, and Stu as they share with you some cool vids, catchy catch phrases crazy challenges, things you can do in 3 minutes, and other random stuff to make your life awesome. Its the Blello Show! Lets go!

programme.title: Elevation Experience
programme.desc: The Elevation Experience with Pastor Steven Furtick features inspirational and challenging messages from Pastor Steven as well as original worship music from Elevation Church in Charlotte, North Carolina.

programme.title: A Moment in History
programme.desc: Join host Seth Udinski as he explores the most pivotal moments in history and the Bible, providing insight into the events that have shaped our world.

programme.title: Faith Runs Deep
programme.desc: Faith Runs Deep is the new series from the producers of the award-winning program, Jesus the Game Changer. Host Karl Faase travels around Australia, discovering the rich and inspiring history of faith Down Under, demonstrating the depth of influence of the Gospel message on Australia. The team drives from the cities to the outback in an iconic Holden ute, unearthing stories from history and today of people whose lives have been changed by Jesus, and who have deeply influenced this nation. Each episode covers a different theme or time in Australias history. Hear from historians and academics; remarkable Australians of faith; and Karl and Jane Faase about their own journey of faith.

programme.title: Drive Thru History: Ends of the Earth
programme.desc: Hosted by historian and filmmaker Dave Stotts, Drive Thru History: Ends of the Earth takes viewers on a 19-episode, global trek to every corner of the earth, to show how God has used ordinary people throughout history to take His saving grace to every nation and people.

programme.title: This Changed Everything
programme.desc: This Changed Everything: 500 Years of the Reformation celebrates the fruits of the Reformation while exploring difficult questions about the cost of division: Could schism have been avoided? Is there hope for reunification? What did Jesus really mean when He prayed for His followers to be one? In this visually rich, three-part documentary series hosted by actor David Suchet, leading church historians share fascinating insights and pose vital questions about unity, truth, and the future of the Christian church.

programme.title: Significance
programme.desc: When we consider what it means to live a life of significance, often our first thoughts are things like success, power and wealth. We fall into a trap of determining our value, worth or significance based on what weve achieved or what we have. However, as we dig a little deeper and reflect on history, we see that its not always the person who shouts the loudest, with the highest credentials or even the most wealth that makes the greatest impact. In this short 30-minute program, with the help of Australian and international speakers we will explore what it means to live a life of significance. Our guests have diverse backgrounds, and include politicians, journalists, authors and pastors. Join us as each of them share stories about their own unique personal discovery of significance. Well learn more on shared misconceptions and roadblocks and ultimately how men and women of Christian faith today live lives of significance.

programme.title: Bible Land Passages
programme.desc: Bible Land Passages is designed help others better understand and appreciate the Bible. Read about places like Beersheba, Jericho, Jerusalem, Caesarea, and cities surrounding the Sea of Galilee, and discover that those places exist just as the Bible describes. Explore the lands of the Bible and uncover a window into the ancient past. Sift through the archaeological data, travel down the pathways of the Bible lands and traverse through the passages of its ancient cities, trade routes, and caves and understand and appreciate the challenges of life faced by Christian forbearers, and learn how God used the historical and geographic setting of the Bible lands to refine and develop their faith. Those same real places and same real settings - when examined in the modern era - can likewise become a passage for developing greater faith and devotion for God.

programme.title: The Incredible Journey
programme.desc: Gary Kent is the speaker for The Incredible Journey. He is an archaeologist who has excavated numerous sites throughout Israel and Jordan. He holds a BA in Theology, MA in Ancient History and Archaeology, and M in Divinity. As an internationally-acclaimed speaker and TV presenter, he has spoken and produced numerous documentaries on subjects including the Bible, Bible prophecy, world events, historical places and natural health. His passion is to share the good news of Jesus soon return.

programme.title: New Creation Church
programme.sub-title: Five Times More Favour And Provision Pt 2 of 4
programme.desc: Pastor Joseph Prince preaches dynamic messages centred on the pure gospel of the grace of God. His desire is to help believers understand grace and how greatly blessed, highly favoured and deeply loved they are by their heavenly Father.

programme.title: Joel Osteen
programme.desc: Direct from Houston, Texas, USA; join Joel and Victoria Osteen and the team from Lakewood Church, for this program of powerful music and empowering preaching. Experience from the weekend church service of Lakewood Church, the largest and fastest growing church in America that is inspiring millions of people around the world!

programme.title: The Way of the Master
programme.desc: Is Buddhism compatible with Christianity? The short answer is no.

programme.title: Joyce Meyer: Enjoying Everyday Life
programme.desc: With her no nonsense preaching Joyce Meyer shares practical teaching about living life as a Christian. In an encouraging and supportive way, hear real stories that will challenge you to be the best that you can be. Joyce Meyer is one of the worlds leading practical Bible teachers. A New York Times bestselling author, her books have helped millions of people find hope and restoration through Jesus Christ. In this series you will see her powerful preaching from her home church, as well as the crusades around the world, and intriguing interviews with a variety of guests. Be inspired and encouraged this week, with Joyce Meyer on Enjoying Everyday Life.

programme.title: I Still Believe
programme.desc: One love can change your life. One life can change the world. From the creators of I Can Only Imagine comes an inspiring love story for the ages. Rediscover the wonder of love in I STILL BELIEVE, based on the real-life story of chart-topping singer Jeremy Camp. This movie is a powerful reminder that in the midst of lifes storms, true hope can be found.

programme.title: Power for Living
programme.desc: Powerful words from Evangelist and Pastor Bill Newman.

programme.title: In Touch
programme.sub-title: How To Claim A Promise/A Life of Self-Discipline
programme.desc: The In Touch program reaches the world with the Gospel with messages that tackle such issues as parenting, finances, personal crises, emotions, and relationships. Dr. Stanley fervently believes the Bible to be the inerrant Word of God, a belief strongly reflected in his teaching. Dr Charles Stanley is the author of more than 50 books.

programme.title: David Pawson
programme.desc: Why was the Bible written? David Pawson explores scripture and discovers some hidden gems. David Pawson has a BSc in Agriculture and an MA in Theology from Cambridge. He was a Chaplain in the RAF for three years and went on to become Pastor of two Baptist Churches (Gold Hill in Buckinghamshire and the Millmead Centre in Guildford) where he maintained a strong Bible teaching ministry. Released for a wider ministry in 1979, he has since spoken in numerous towns and cities in the British Isles and also extensively overseas. He is the author of a number of books including Truth To Tell, Leadership is Male and The Normal Christian Birth.

programme.title: Youre Bacon Me Crazy
programme.desc: Youre Bacon Me Crazy is a deliciously charming love story about Cleo, a passionate young chef with a popular food truck. With the help of her niece Tessa, Cleos handcrafted Italian sandwiches have become a favourite of the bustling and competitive Portland food scene. But when Gabe, the handsome chef of a rival food truck called the Bacon Wagon, parks across the street, Cleos goal to win a local food truck competition takes a spicy turn. With Gabes help and her familys encouragement, Cleo comes to learn that shes not going to win if she doesnt push herself. As she comes to realise that owning her own restaurant is what she wants most, she also begins to understand that her food isnt the only thing that could use some TLC. The only way Cleo can have everything she wants is if she adds the most important ingredient to both her cooking and her life. And thats love.

programme.title: New Creation Church
programme.sub-title: Five Times More Favour And Provision Pt 2 of 4
programme.desc: Pastor Joseph Prince preaches dynamic messages centred on the pure gospel of the grace of God. His desire is to help believers understand grace and how greatly blessed, highly favoured and deeply loved they are by their heavenly Father.

programme.title: Friends and Heroes
programme.desc: Friends and Heroes is an animated childrens adventure based in Ancient Egypt, Israel and Rome. The story follows two young friends Macky and Portia as they fight for justice against the Roman Empire.

programme.title: Night Owls and Early Birds
programme.desc: Night Owls and Early Birds is a new topical Bible study show from the creators of Owlegories. Join Hoot, Savannah, Screech, Charlie, and Steve as they take a deeper dive into the truths found in Gods Word.

programme.title: The Garden
programme.desc: Lenny Lion and Lucy Lamb are the caretakers for a magical garden where anything can grow. They work for The Boss (God) who gives them a new assignment to complete in every episode. Lenny is always happy and ready to take on the tasks the Boss gives him. However, much like Peter in the gospels, Lenny doesnt always think before he acts and usually needs help getting out of sticky situations. But hes teachable and willing to admit when hes wrong. His two best qualities are that he loves Jesus and is a true friend to Lucy. Lucy is sweet, smart and lamb-tastic! Shes kind-hearted, loving, and aims to support everyone she meets. Inside that happy demeanor is a strong-willed, adventurous, task-oriented gal who will take on any task handed to her. But, she still has a lot to learn when it comes to being an example for others. Her two best qualities are that she takes very good care of Lenny and points everyone to Jesus.

programme.title: Impact for Life
programme.desc: An inspirational program with principles for living, and life stories from everyday New Zealanders. Collated with a fresh and dynamic edge, Pastors Peter and Bev Mortlock share principles both from the platform, and on location. Impact for Life equips people to mature and grow into Christ-likeness while maximising their potential.

programme.title: Be Great. Do Good
programme.desc: Leadership and influence carry a specific burden that we need to be prepared for. Holding positions of leadership and influence are glamorous and easy when things are going well. But true leadership shines in the moments that are most difficult. Peter sits down with Wendy Simpson to hear how understanding the burdens of leadership ensures were prepared to execute the responsibilities of leadership, and how this enables a response that can powerfully protect the people in the business. Peter and the team unpack the importance of doing the consistent work of self evaluation to increase self-awareness which is critical to responding well.

programme.title: Holy Rollin
programme.desc: Nick and Yvette Wynne take on the gruelling journey of riding around Australia on their matching 1200 Ducati motorbikes. Get a feel for the rugged sunburnt countryside and the people of the outback as these two motorcycle missionaries traverse 20 000 km in 3 months over 12 episodes.

programme.title: View and Chew
programme.desc: Mike wakes up from a food coma filled with spicy noodles and fancy French fare; a trip downtown sends him flying seven stories off the ground.

programme.title: Centuries Collide
programme.sub-title: St Nicholas - St Nick or Santa?
programme.desc: Every year, baby Jesus and Santa dominate all Christmas imagery. But who is this jolly fur-clad mythological figure? In this episode we discover his fascinating 1700 year evolution from a bishop of ancient Turkey to Santa Clause of the North Pole.

programme.title: Jentezen Franklin
programme.desc: New York Times bestselling author, Pastor Jentezen Franklin, brings practical meaning to spiritual truths found in Gods Word. Kingdom Connection is the teaching ministry of Free Chapel, a multi-campus church with a global ministry. Hear inspiration for change, healing, peace and joy through his affective communication connecting you to God, the church, and the world!

programme.title: David Jeremiah
programme.desc: Join us for the weekly church service conducted by David Jeremiah from San Diego, California, USA. Dedicated to providing sound, in-depth teaching of the Word of God verse by verse. Through his personable and expository teaching, pastor Dr David Jeremiah challenges viewers to take hold of the truths of Gods Word for themselves and to apply it to the daily circumstances in their own life, by presenting Gods truth in clear and practical applications.

programme.title: PowerPoint with Jack Graham
programme.desc: PowerPoint Ministries started as a vision of Dr Jack Graham and his wife, Deb, 20 years ago. They believed that the power of God was evident in their growing church and that His Gospel message should be spread beyond the walls of that church to the world at large. They put their faith into action and purchased airtime on the Trinity Broadcasting Network. PowerPoint Ministries was then officially launched in April 1994. Over the past 19 years, PowerPoint Ministries has grown to an expansive network of local, national, and international television and radio broadcasts. In fact, PowerPoint can be seen or heard by a potential audience of millions of television viewers and radio listeners across the United States, the United Kingdom, Australia, South Africa, Iran, Russia, Israel and more. The Ministry has a vision to glorify God by introducing Jesus Christ as Lord to as many people as possible and to develop them in Christian living using the most effective means to impact the world, making an eternal difference in this generation.

programme.title: Joyce Meyer: Enjoying Everyday Life
programme.desc: With her no nonsense preaching Joyce Meyer shares practical teaching about living life as a Christian. In an encouraging and supportive way, hear real stories that will challenge you to be the best that you can be. Joyce Meyer is one of the worlds leading practical Bible teachers. A New York Times bestselling author, her books have helped millions of people find hope and restoration through Jesus Christ. In this series you will see her powerful preaching from her home church, as well as the crusades around the world, and intriguing interviews with a variety of guests. Be inspired and encouraged this week, with Joyce Meyer on Enjoying Everyday Life.

programme.title: Hour of Power
programme.desc: Since 1970 the Hour of Power has been reaching viewers from around the world. Originally founded by Dr Robert H Schuller, the program became the most-watched religious program in the world, reaching 17 million viewers. Now under the leadership of Bobby Schuller, Dr Schullers grandson. The congregation worships at Shepherds Grove Church in Garden Grove, CA. The program aims to provide spiritual principles and practices that can help people, as they become happy students of Jesus and live a life of meaning. To learn more about who they are in Christ through the process of formation, to belong to his family of believers and become a part of the community and to heal as they are loved and then love and help heal others through mission. Jesus Christ ushered in the Kingdom of God into our world through His death and resurrection. He invites everyone to be a part of this amazing movement by trusting and following Him. There is no fuller, richer life than the one that is lived in Christ.

programme.title: Drive Thru History: The Gospels
programme.desc: Dave Stotts takes us on his most exciting adventure yet as he tells the story of Jesus from the locations recorded in the Gospels of Matthew, Mark, Luke, and John. Dave travels to over 50 ancient sites in Israel to deliver the Gospels in a fresh and compelling way. As Dave uncovers the evidence for the truth of scripture, he encourages all of us to get excited about reading the Bible again!

programme.title: Faith Runs Deep
programme.desc: Faith Runs Deep is the new series from the producers of the award-winning program, Jesus the Game Changer. Host Karl Faase travels around Australia, discovering the rich and inspiring history of faith Down Under, demonstrating the depth of influence of the Gospel message on Australia. The team drives from the cities to the outback in an iconic Holden ute, unearthing stories from history and today of people whose lives have been changed by Jesus, and who have deeply influenced this nation. Each episode covers a different theme or time in Australias history. Hear from historians and academics; remarkable Australians of faith; and Karl and Jane Faase about their own journey of faith.

programme.title: Bible Land Passages
programme.sub-title: The Southern Steps - Coming into the Presence of the Lord
programme.desc: Bible Land Passages is designed help others better understand and appreciate the Bible. Read about places like Beersheba, Jericho, Jerusalem, Caesarea, and cities surrounding the Sea of Galilee, and discover that those places exist just as the Bible describes. Explore the lands of the Bible and uncover a window into the ancient past. Sift through the archaeological data, travel down the pathways of the Bible lands and traverse through the passages of its ancient cities, trade routes, and caves and understand and appreciate the challenges of life faced by Christian forbearers, and learn how God used the historical and geographic setting of the Bible lands to refine and develop their faith. Those same real places and same real settings - when examined in the modern era - can likewise become a passage for developing greater faith and devotion for God.

programme.title: Soul Sessions
programme.desc: Hosted by Sara Jane Elika Soul Sessions is an exploration into the New Zealand gospel music scene with a focus on Pacific musicians and artists. The award-winning artists are a mix of new and established faces, who share the vision of expressing their faith through music.

programme.title: Whats Cooking with Young and Free
programme.desc: Join Young and Free in the kitchen as they serve up a feast of music videos and a side of laughs.

programme.title: OK TV
programme.desc: Powerful, life filled topics are presented in an enjoyable and proven format. Hosts, Brendon and Cathie have poured their 30 years of experience with kids in schools and in ministry and the great goals of the local church into a energetic show that will engage the next generation.

programme.title: Connect
programme.desc: Connect follows a plucky school theatre group that aspires to stage every book of the Bible. The kids are pretty sure they have a clear understanding of everything that happens in Gods Big Story. Well...most of it. They do have a few questions, concerns, and outright misconceptions. Fortunately, an ever-expanding cast of surprising and often bizarre visitors is on hand to help them navigate their journey through the scriptures. And yes, there is a talking sock.

programme.title: TV One Life
programme.desc: TV One Life is the kind of show that will keep you watching. Its a commercial spoof one minute, a reality segment the next and heartfelt ministry after that. Between the humour, music and unfiltered ministry, the message is clear, "God can change your life"! Fasten your seatbelts for this roller coaster ride of a show!

programme.title: Katherine Ruonala Ministries
programme.desc: Katherine Ruonala shares a practical message of love and hope to the nations. Reaching across denominational walls, her ministry is used to spread the fires of revival and ignite a fresh passion in the hearts of believers to go deeper in their relationship with God. Katherine carries a strong prophetic and miracle anointing with many experiencing instant healing in her meetings.

programme.title: A Very Tall Man
programme.desc: Gary Hoogvliet, a very tall man, interviews interesting folk, not quite as tall as he, but nevertheless with fascinating and inspiring stories to tell.

programme.title: Be That
programme.desc: Ironically, in this era of Social Media, people are feeling more isolated and disconnected than ever. Groups like the team at Be That are looking to change this, encouraging Australians to connect face to face and begin real conversations. Be That has assembled a crew of Clinical Psychologists to develop relevant resources to encourage people to gather together and connect through intentional and empowering conversations. The Be That TV Show, created in partnership with ACCTV, shares the real stories of individuals, couples and families who have journeyed through bondage to freedom and inspire others that they too can overcome challenges. Topics are discussed with host Jo Bouris, and regular panellist, Clinical Psychologist, Sarah Harriott. Guests are welcomed to the couch, who speak hope, life and encouragement through their personal experience. Viewers can then access the topic resources and corresponding questions to start their own journey to understanding and healing: Be that person they were designed to be.

programme.title: When Calls the Heart
programme.desc: Hickam and Lee clash with the mayor of Benson Hills, and Henry suggests a solution with huge implications for the town. Elizabeth and Nathan clear up a misunderstanding.

programme.title: HumanKind
programme.desc: The vast expanses of rural Queensland dont deter Debbie Bazzo from spreading kindness. With Care Outreach, she traverses great distances to bring support and companionship to isolated communities. Journey with Debbie as she proves that no distance is too great when it comes to reaching out with compassion.

programme.title: The Kindness Diaries
programme.desc: Ready. Set. Give. Welcome to the adventure of a lifetime: a heartfelt, humour-filled and jeopardy-laced journey around planet earth. Follow eternal optimist, passionate adventurer, and former broker Leon Logothetis, as he circumnavigates the globe in a search for kindness. Leaving his successful but empty life behind, Leon hops on a vintage yellow motorbike for a 25K mile journey around the world. The challenge: he will do it with no money, no food, no petrol, and no place to stay. Everyday he will put his trust and his fate in the hands of strangers. Why? To reaffirm his belief that despite what we see in the news, humans are ultimately kind. For the generosity he receives, Leon will offer his humble stories, sincere thanks and in each episode, he will give one unsuspecting Good Samaritan a life-changing gift. See you on the road!

programme.title: The Kindness Diaries
programme.desc: Adventurer Leon Logothetis travels from Alaska to Argentina relying on the kindness of strangers and surprising unsuspecting good Samaritans with life-changing gifts!

programme.title: A Fantail Journey
programme.desc: This series showcases a variety of uniquely Christian Kiwi content produced at Fantail Studios. Jared shares his heart behind them and the call that God has for each of us in sharing testimonies and to seek His Kingdom.

programme.title: Billy Graham Classics
programme.desc: Accepting Jesus requires faith, and to be born again. A John 3 (Boise 1982).

programme.title: New Creation Church
programme.sub-title: Five Times More Favour And Provision Pt 3 of 4
programme.desc: Pastor Joseph Prince preaches dynamic messages centred on the pure gospel of the grace of God. His desire is to help believers understand grace and how greatly blessed, highly favoured and deeply loved they are by their heavenly Father.

programme.title: In Touch
programme.sub-title: How To Claim A Promise/A Life of Self-Discipline
programme.desc: The In Touch program reaches the world with the Gospel with messages that tackle such issues as parenting, finances, personal crises, emotions, and relationships. Dr. Stanley fervently believes the Bible to be the inerrant Word of God, a belief strongly reflected in his teaching. Dr Charles Stanley is the author of more than 50 books.

programme.title: Joyce Meyer: Enjoying Everyday Life
programme.desc: With her no nonsense preaching Joyce Meyer shares practical teaching about living life as a Christian. In an encouraging and supportive way, hear real stories that will challenge you to be the best that you can be. Joyce Meyer is one of the worlds leading practical Bible teachers. A New York Times bestselling author, her books have helped millions of people find hope and restoration through Jesus Christ. In this series you will see her powerful preaching from her home church, as well as the crusades around the world, and intriguing interviews with a variety of guests. Be inspired and encouraged this week, with Joyce Meyer on Enjoying Everyday Life.

programme.title: When Calls the Heart
programme.desc: Hickam and Lee clash with the mayor of Benson Hills, and Henry suggests a solution with huge implications for the town. Elizabeth and Nathan clear up a misunderstanding.

programme.title: A Marriage Made in Heaven
programme.desc: Demetri Chicopoulos (Robert Krantz) is living a charmed life. He is the host of his hit, daytime talk show, Daytime with Demetri. However, we soon learn that with a recent divorce and the passing of his mother, Demetris life is more pain than charmed. In a prayerful moment, Demetri kneels and asks God if he could just relive one week of his life. He knows things would turn out differently. Demetri rises and suddenly meets his Guardian Angel (Tom Arnold). Well, not exactly the type of Guardian Angel one hopes for. The Guardian Angel tells Demetri God heard his prayer. Demetri will get to relive one week of his life. What happens next will change Demetris life forever.

programme.desc: An inspirational program with principles for living, and life stories from everyday New Zealanders. Collated with a fresh and dynamic edge, Pastors Peter and Bev Mortlock share principles both from the platform, and on location. Impact for Life equips people to mature and grow into Christ-likeness while maximising their potential.

programme.title: Answers with Bayless Conley
programme.sub-title: What I Got Right and Wrong on My Journey Part 2
programme.desc: Relationships are critical in the Christian life-so how do you navigate relationships well while keeping faith at the forefront? In part two of What I Got Right and Wrong on My Journey, Pastor Bayless delves deeper into the decisions that shape our spiritual lives, emphasizing the importance of choosing the right companions and the transformative power of prioritizing family relationships. Get indispensable wisdom to help you navigate lifes relationships well in this encouraging message!

programme.title: The Catholic Guy
programme.desc: Bruce Downes is The Catholic Guy. Bruce and his team will move, inspire and challenge you to live your life to the absolute fullest. No matter your age, situation or background, be prepared to laugh, learn and listen to what God is trying to say to you. Bruce travels Australia speaking regularly about his experiences in life and in the Church in a way that is both relatable and easy to understand. Bruces message of power, impact, freedom and purpose is for anyone and everyone - for no matter where you are around the world today, God is never far from you.

programme.title: Veggie Tales
programme.desc: Rack, Shack, and Benny work in a factory that makes chocolate bunnies, owned by Nebbie K. Nezzer. Anyone who doesnt bow down to the giant bunny is fed to the furnace. While most employees worship it, Rack, Shack and Benny cling to their faith.

programme.title: Deditos
programme.desc: This quirky kids show introduces children to classic stories from the Old Testament using finger puppets.

programme.title: New Horizons
programme.sub-title: Following Jesus in Johns Gospel Pt6
programme.desc: New Horizons is a teaching series from Gymea Baptist Church, Sydney, presented by Rev Dr Marc Rader. Gymea Baptist is a contemporary evangelical church in Sydneys South. Companion study guides for the series are available on line at: www.gymeabaptist.org.au/newhorizons.

programme.title: Jeni: Seeking the Extraordinary
programme.desc: Jeni is back on the road, visiting the amazing state of Oregon in the USA. Close friend, Casey Cole, joins her in this exciting series. Together, they go fly fishing, crabbing, white water rafting, and zip lining. During their adventure, Jeni and Casey take you to the picturesque Cannon Beach and experience the fun of an exciting rodeo. Lots of laughter and adventure, times of sharing their hearts about spiritual matters, and plenty of the extraordinary.

programme.title: Elevation Experience
programme.desc: The Elevation Experience with Pastor Steven Furtick features inspirational and challenging messages from Pastor Steven as well as original worship music from Elevation Church in Charlotte, North Carolina.

programme.title: Life with Paul De Jong
programme.desc: We like to call it soul food. LIFE TV uses creative illustration, real life stories and biblical teaching to encourage and help viewers discover a greater purpose to their lives.

programme.title: Drive Thru History
programme.desc: In this series of Drive Thru History, Dave Stotts explores the amazing lives of the very first Christians. Beginning in Jerusalem and using the Book of Acts as a roadmap, Dave travels the Mediterranean region to share the people, places, and events that launched the Christian faith. He investigates what happened after the Gospel accounts of Jesus Christ. Dave follows the lives of the disciples through Israel, and travels the missionary routes of Paul and his companions. We finish with John on the island of Patmos, and drive through the seven churches of Revelation in Asia Minor.

programme.title: Convocation
programme.desc: Convocation at Liberty University is North Americas largest weekly gathering of Christian students, and each year it plays host to more than 80 guest speakers of national significance from every sphere of society. The services, held within the Vines Centre at the University during each semester, connect students with their Creator through passionate worship and powerful messages firmly rooted in Biblical truth.

programme.desc: Hickam and Lee clash with the mayor of Benson Hills, and Henry suggests a solution with huge implications for the town. Elizabeth and Nathan clear up a misunderstanding.

programme.title: Welcome to Hope
programme.desc: John tries to act as though everything is normal, but Abe is looking for someone to blame for the Potter family misfortunes.

programme.title: Behind the Sash
programme.desc: Based on the YMCA Music Video Project, the ladies head down the coast to Rye to shine a light on the beauty of people with special needs and create a creative music video alongside a new singing Queen, Mareshah and Chico Johnson.

programme.title: Owlegories
programme.desc: Owlegories is an animated series that follows a group of student owls as they travel on adventures learning about nature, faith, and God! You can tell a lot about an artist by what he creates. That is the theme behind Owlegories. Owlegories teaches kids about God through the amazing things found in nature and revealed in Gods word. The banner verse for Owlegories is Psalm 19:1-4: "The heavens declare the glory of God; the skies proclaim the work of his hands. Day after day they pour forth speech; night after night they reveal knowledge. They have no speech, they use no words; no sound is heard from them. Yet their voice goes out into all the earth, their words to the ends of the world."

programme.title: Superbook
programme.desc: The familiar and the futuristic interact with ancient people, places and events to create a sense of wonder, anticipation, empowerment, and personal breakthrough as the children witness Gods interaction with man. Superbook is always an exciting journey, full of discovery - with a transformational outcome. Superbook teaches children timeless moral truths and life lessons through the captivating, Bible-based adventures of two time-traveling children and their robot friend. Play fun Superbook games here: https://us-en.superbook.cbn.com/games.

programme.title: Obsession: Dark Desires
programme.desc: Sandra never expected such extreme reprisals from her former partner. Her plan for a Thanksgiving reunion with her daughter ends with one person dead.

programme.title: Body Cam
programme.desc: After a home invasion gone wrong, a burglar takes a heavily pregnant woman as a human shield. In California, an officer faces a knife-wielding girl.

programme.title: Late Night Lockup
programme.desc: An intoxicated man falls asleep at a drive-thru in New Mexico. A police horse pursues a gun-toting felon around in New Orleans.

programme.title: Late Night Lockup
programme.desc: In Wisconsin, officers engage in a late-night pursuit. In Washington, a drunk driver causes a crash. Police deal with an unruly woman in Florida.

programme.title: Road Rage
programme.desc: A man climbs onto the hood of a school bus. A menacing man harasses a father and his son. A disgruntled driver shoots at another motorist.

programme.title: Road Rage
programme.desc: A group of drivers brawl in a Texas intersection. A man attacks a motorist. A driver gets into an intense exchange with construction workers.

programme.title: American Monster
programme.desc: Best friends are separated for eternity when one marries the others brother.

programme.title: True Conviction
programme.desc: A young womans disappearance sets off a complex police investigation.

programme.title: The Perfect Murder
programme.desc: A house fire reveals a charred body: 20-year-old Kimberly has been burned alive. Was it her ex-boyfriend, Psycho? Or is her dad connected to the mob?

programme.title: Evil Kin
programme.desc: Three brothers will take their twisted desires to an unimaginable level of terror, leaving a trail of bodies across the city of Richmond, Virginia.

programme.title: Who the (Bleep) Did I Marry?
programme.desc: Thirteen-year-old Myras famous cousin Jerry Lee Lewis manipulates her into marrying him.

programme.title: On the Case with Paula Zahn
programme.desc: Will a trail of blood stretching from the balcony of a young womans apartment all the way to the parking lot lead police to her calculating killer?

programme.title: People Magazine: Crimes of the 2010s
programme.desc: In 2015, the identification of five family members brutally murdered in their Oklahoma home sends shockwaves through the nation.

programme.title: Reasonable Doubt
programme.desc: One witness puts three people accused of murder in prison. Is she believable?

programme.title: Body Cam
programme.desc: Officers arrive at an armed robbery in progress with the manager held hostage. In New York, a young mother and her baby are hit by a drunk driver.

programme.title: MasterChef UK: Celebrity
programme.desc: In the semifinals, seven celebrities recreate Ainsley Harriotts dish and make the perfect pizza. One will be eliminated, leaving six to continue the race for the title.

programme.title: The Great Australian Bake Off
programme.desc: The heat is on for spice week, with the bakers having to carefully consider their flavours as they tackle maamoul biscuits and a baklava tower.

programme.title: The Great British Bake Off
programme.desc: The white tent awaits twelve of the Nations best amateur bakers, as they take their place under the critical eye of judges Paul Hollywood and Prue Leith. Breaking with tradition, this year the series kicks off with Biscuit Week. The bakers tackle signature biscuits that will say something about them and a place in the British Isles. Next the bakers face their first technical, and hiding under the gingham cloth is one of Pauls childhood favourites, an iconic biscuit thats sure to send the bakers round in circles. Finally, its crunch time. The bakers will have to be picture perfect with their first showstopper, a spectacular 3d biscuit portrait challenge that requires precision baking and superb decorating skills. Three challenges, three chances to win star baker, three chances to avoid leaving the tent.

programme.title: Jamies Air Fryer Meals
programme.desc: Jamie elevates your cooking with the latest kitchen craze, showcasing delicious dishes and innovative ways to make the most of air fryers.

programme.title: Gordon Ramsays Next Level Chef
programme.desc: The chefs are tasked with preparing a next-level international street food dish; the platform never stops moving throughout the challenge.

programme.title: Great British Menu
programme.desc: The remaining chefs from Scotland compete over dishes inspired by 2024s Olympics and Paralympics in Paris, but when the chefs are this close, who will win and who must go home?

programme.title: Tom Kerridges Sunday Lunch
programme.desc: Tom celebrates the flavours and ingredients of Spain. First up, he slow-cooks a rich pork and bean stew, and then serves a creamy Catalan flan for dessert.

programme.title: Jamies Quick and Easy Food
programme.desc: With four mouth watering recipes in each show, this week Jamies cooking up his snappy Sesame Seared Tuna, a mouth watering meal in minutes, and Messy Meatball Buns, feel good family food thats fast and loaded with flavour. Followed by his irresistibly gooey Chocolate Rye Cookies, home baking at breakneck speed. Then, to top it all off, hearty Chicken Pot Pie, a comforting classic with a quick and easy hack for the perfect crispy crust. If you think you havent got time to cook, think again.

programme.title: Mary Berrys Foolproof Dinners
programme.desc: Mary comes armed with a sumptuous selection of foolproof dishes. Her celebration menu includes lemongrass crab cakes, coq au vin pie, langoustine paella, and her floating islands with caramel.

programme.title: Eat Well For Less
programme.desc: For the very first time, Gregg and Chris will be helping a household of students, whose expensive tastes and love of brands mean that theyre blowing their student loan on pricey pesto and branded pasta. In Bristol, undergraduates Dylan, Ben and Roo and Louis have been flat sharing for 9 months. They all have different work shifts, and as Roo is a Coeliac and Ben is a vegetarian, they shop separately and rarely cook or eat together, often getting takeaways and ready meals. Gregg and Chris watch as they each individually do a shop in their local convenience store and its not the shop they were expecting from cashtrapped students. Separate shops mean that they are doubling up and missing out on deals, and branded products and expensive wine mean that with takeaways, these students are spending around 300 pounds a week on food.

programme.title: French Gourmet with Justine Schofield
programme.desc: Justine visits the charming old town of Sarlat where she explores the vibrant local market. After tasting the local treats and buying some fresh produce, she whips up a delicious confit duck dish.

programme.title: MasterChef UK: Celebrity
programme.desc: In the semifinals, seven celebrities recreate Ainsley Harriotts dish and make the perfect pizza. One will be eliminated, leaving six to continue the race for the title.

programme.title: Bake Off: The Professionals
programme.desc: The search for Britains best pastry chefs has reached its conclusion, hosted by Liam Charles and Tom Allen, in the grand finale of Bake Off: The Professionals. The remaining three teams must pour all of their patisserie passion, prowess and precision into this final epic challenge. Nothing less than brilliance on every level will be good enough at this stage in the competition. World class ptissier chefs and expert judges Benoit Blin and Cherish Finden, have set not one but two marathon challenges for the teams. For their first challenge they must produce hats fit for Hollywood which are constructed entirely from chocolate and modelled by the teams themselves as they parade up and down the catwalk. Alongside their hats the teams must make 24 filled chocolates and 24 confections and all this in just 4 hours. The final grand challenge is a gruelling seven hours, the teams must create a Banquet fit for an awards ceremony of their choosing to feed 60 people. So which team will impress the judges with their stunning creations, to be crowned the winner of Bake Off: The Professionals?

programme.title: The Great Kiwi Bake Off
programme.desc: This season brings a new group of 10 baking hopefuls to the tent to impress the returning judges Sue Fleischl and Dean Brettschneider.

programme.title: Great British Menu
programme.desc: The judges are joined by one of Britains most decorated Olympians to decide Scotlands winner. With dishes celebrating the Olympics and Paralympics, who will get through?

programme.title: Eat Well For Less
programme.desc: Gregg and Chris are going back to basics with the Drews, their youngest family ever. This couple have been through a very tough time, with food being a low priority, combined with some fussy eating, this family need a compete overhaul. In Gosport, on the South Coast, 28 year-old dad James, a plumbing merchant, and 23 year-old Rianna, a mum and full-time carer, have 2 children, Tallulah-Belle who is 3 and Penelope who is 1. Tallulah-Belle was born 11 weeks early weighing just 1lb and now suffers with chronic lung disease. The couple spent over 2 years in hospital with her, living on convenience freezer food and takeaways, and now she is home with their diets not changed.

programme.title: French Gourmet with Justine Schofield
programme.desc: Justine cooks mussels at a breathtaking Chateau, then visits the village of Brantome where she learns the secrets to first-class French cooking from a Michelin-starred chef.

programme.title: Mary Berrys Foolproof Dinners
programme.desc: Mary invites star of The Repair Shop and antique restorer Will Kirk to join her for some cooking in the great outdoors. Will has just moved house, and for the first time has his own garden.

programme.title: Jamies Quick and Easy Food
programme.desc: With four mouth watering recipes in each show, this week Jamies cooking up his snappy Sesame Seared Tuna, a mouth watering meal in minutes, and Messy Meatball Buns, feel good family food thats fast and loaded with flavour. programme.title: Farm to Fork
programme.desc: Courtney and Michael collaborate to prepare roast cabbage with zhoug. Michael crafts a scrumptious panna cotta, coconut shortbread, and summer fruits dessert.

programme.title: MasterChef UK: Celebrity
programme.desc: In the semifinals, six celebrities must impress Grace Dent with a luxurious dish. One will be sent home, leaving five to compete in finals week for the title.

programme.title: Food Safari Water
programme.desc: The simplicity of cooking and serving seafood in one pot is a hallmark of cuisines around the world. Chef Angie Hong shares the secrets of Vietnamese claypot cooking starting with a visit to a supplier in Cabramatta with live fish. Belgian chef David Coumont cooks up a pot of mussels using eschallots and a splash of wine and shows how to eat mussels like a Belgian, using the shell as tweezers. Thai Australian cafe owner and farmer Palisa Anderson, makes jungle curry using butterflied whiting while Spanish chef Gerardo Iglesias makes fideua in paella pan on the jetty at Geelong, Victoria.

programme.title: The Great Australian Bake Off
programme.desc: The bakers mix things up to create a fusion of favourites, croissants that look like muffins, doughnuts that arent quite what they seem, and cakes made from anything but cake.

programme.title: The Great British Bake Off
programme.desc: Its week two and our remaining 11 bakers face Cake Week, kicking off with a Crowd-pleasing signature challenge. Next, the bakers turn green with Prues first technical challenge a complicated cake with a very unusual ingredient. Finally, an ambitious collared showstopper turns up the heat in the tent. Who will rise to the challenge and who will melt under the pressure? Three challenges. Three chances to win star baker. Three chances to avoid leaving the tent.

programme.title: River Cottage: Veg
programme.desc: Hugh heads into the River Cottage vegetable garden to see what green summer vegetables he can get his hands on. A classic summer garden soup is a sure-fire winner. Next he pays a visit to David Bailey, one of the best vegetarian chefs in the country. David wows Hugh with his Asian-inspired cooking. On his return to River Cottage, Hughs first challenge is to put on a full summer barbecue without so much as a single sausage. Time for some delicious haloumi, tomato and potato kebabs, and a vibrant carrot, cashew and orange salad. A forage in the wild larder proves even more fruitful - with tasty samphire, for chard and samphire tarts, and seaweed for dulce rosti.

programme.desc: Tucci visits the island of Sardinia, Italy, famous for its harsh, rugged landscape, crystal blue ocean, and passionately preserved traditions; Tucci learns how Sardinian food culture varies wildly.

programme.desc: Justine highlights some of the freshest ingredients native to Noumea. Grilled Wahoo fish is served with a New Caledonian inspired sauce vierge.

programme.desc: Even though shes queen of the kitchen, Mary Berry spends just as much time in the garden, growing ingredients for her delicious dishes packed with fruit and vegetables.

programme.desc: Andy and Michael team up to prepare a flavourful peri peri chicken dish. Courtney crafts a delectable split iceberg lettuce salad with yoghurt and fried onions. Michael showcases a Texas potato salad.

programme.title: MasterChef UK: Celebrity
programme.desc: In finals week, five celebrities cook a dish inspired by a famous chef and serve lunch on the British Pullman train. One will be eliminated, leaving four to compete for the coveted trophy.

programme.title: The Great Australian Bake Off
programme.desc: Its the semifinal, and what better way to celebrate than by baking for a party? Matt and Maggie set a series of party-themed challenges that will help them decide who will be celebrating a place in the final.

programme.title: The Great British Bake Off
programme.desc: Week three of The Great British Bake Off, and its Bread Week. The ten remaining bakers have a lot to prove with three tough challenges, set by judges Paul Hollywood and Prue Leith. There is a teatime fruity favourite signature, a deceptively simple time-test of a technical, and an ambitious showstopper thats the largest bread sculpture challenge ever set in the tent. Only one can claim star baker, whilst one baker will leave the tent for good.
