programme.desc: With four mouth watering recipes in each show, this week Jamies cooking up his Tender Lamb Shoulder, an epic sharing feast thats super-quick to prep, with an easy cheat for incredible flavour. Next up, Super Green Spaghetti, a speedy veggie pasta thatll blow your mind. Plus, his One-pan Fabulous Fish, a fail-safe supper with a quick and easy tip for perfect rice. And to top it all off, Jamies Apple Crumble Cookies- an old-school favourite reworked into a delicious, super-quick treat. If you think you havent got time to cook, think again.

programme.title: Honest Renovations
programme.desc: After a pandemic, two kids, and lots of online shopping, the Wong familys home is no longer the warm and inviting place it once was; Jessica and Lizzy come to the Wongs de-cluttering rescue.

programme.title: Extreme Makeover: Home Edition
programme.desc: Hosts Clea Shearer and Joanna Teplin aid a single mother and her family of five living in a barely functioning 1960s home in Phoenix.

programme.title: My Dream Home
programme.desc: Steph and Micah are unable to find a potential first home that meets their needs, so seek the help of property experts Drew Scott and Jonathan Scott.

programme.title: Love It or List It Vancouver
programme.desc: Can Todd find a larger home in their upscale area and pull Sanjeev from his beloved man cave? Or will Jillians spacious redesign convince a strong-willed Kavita to stay?

programme.title: A Place in the Sun
programme.desc: Jonny Irwin travels inland from Spains Costa Calida to help Paul and Michelle find the perfect place to spend their retirement. The couple, who are from Greater Manchester, would like a secluded property within walking distance of shops and restaurants.

programme.title: A Place in the Sun
programme.desc: Sandra and Dave are house hunting in and around La Duquesa on the Costa del Sol. Theyve been visiting the south of Spain for over 24 years and are now looking for their very own holiday home with a sea view and plenty of outside space for entertaining their family, including young grandson, Henry.

programme.title: A Place in the Sun
programme.desc: Having just sold her house in West London, Mia is taking early retirement and planning a permanent move to the countryside around Alicante. Helping Mia with this house hunt is her mother Valerie, who also plans to visit her in Spain regularly.

programme.title: A Place in the Sun
programme.desc: House hunters Diane and David are planning a permanent move to Almeria Province in South East Spain. For their a budget of 150,000 pounds, theyd like a three bedroom detached house with a garage for Davids classic cars and a craft room for Diana.

programme.title: Love It or List It
programme.desc: When a house no longer feels like home, owners are left with a big financial and emotional question: renovate or real estate? Hosts David and Hilary help fed-up owners decide.

programme.title: House Hunters Renovation
programme.desc: Home buyers tour for-sale homes and choose the one that is the perfect fixer-upper.

programme.title: Grand Designs Australia
programme.desc: Hardworking GP Zewlan and her electrician husband Tom (now stay-at-home dad to their two kids), want an architect-designed home in a great location on a shoestring budget. This was looking unlikely until they found an inexpensive block on a ridge above a freeway at Ocean Shores (near Byron). Now all they need is an architecture firm inventive enough to design them a stylish home for very little money. Their modest, forward-thinking philosophy is helpful as they naturally veer away from lavish floor plans and luxurious finishes in favour of the compact, simple, open, sustainable and economical. Working within a tenuous loan framework what they get, apart from stress, is quite fantastic.

programme.title: Grand Designs Australia
programme.desc: A tiny budget, a thirst for living frugally, and a desire to have a home that leaves a small footprint can force some radical thinking. So when electrician and stay-at-home dad Tom and his doctor wife Zewlan decided to build their new home in Ocean Shores, size was everything. Their plan is for a solar passive family home with three modest bedrooms that maximise potential views; small, beautiful spaces on a firm budget of $350,000. With the help of award-winning architects Melanie and James, theyve come up with a design based on the three Ss: small, simple and straightforward. Built out of chipboard, the house will be just half the size of the average Australian home. In a simple layout, three modest bedrooms will connect to one long outside/inside corridor running the length of the house and open underneath, like a deck. The lounge, kitchen and mezzanine will all be easily closed off with huge sliding glass. Toms biggest concern is for the finishes after the exposed chipboard is damaged by some wet weather, hes keen to get the roof on. Will financial pressure and some inclement weather force a re-think or will he and Zewlan stay true to their small house philosophy?

programme.desc: Tarek and Christina flip a midcentury home with a dream layout in Placentia, California, but not without their fair share of surprises and setbacks.

programme.title: Grand Designs Australia
programme.desc: Hardworking GP Zewlan and her electrician husband Tom (now stay-at-home dad to their two kids), want an architect-designed home in a great location on a shoestring budget. This was looking unlikely until they found an inexpensive block on a ridge above a freeway at Ocean Shores (near Byron). Now all they need is an architecture firm inventive enough to design them a stylish home for very little money. Their modest, forward-thinking philosophy is helpful as they naturally veer away from lavish floor plans and luxurious finishes in favour of the compact, simple, open, sustainable and economical. Working within a tenuous loan framework what they get, apart from stress, is quite fantastic.

programme.title: Grand Designs Australia
programme.desc: A tiny budget, a thirst for living frugally, and a desire to have a home that leaves a small footprint can force some radical thinking. So when electrician and stay-at-home dad Tom and his doctor wife Zewlan decided to build their new home in Ocean Shores, size was everything. Their plan is for a solar passive family home with three modest bedrooms that maximise potential views; small, beautiful spaces on a firm budget of $350,000. With the help of award-winning architects Melanie and James, theyve come up with a design based on the three Ss: small, simple and straightforward. Built out of chipboard, the house will be just half the size of the average Australian home. In a simple layout, three modest bedrooms will connect to one long outside/inside corridor running the length of the house and open underneath, like a deck. The lounge, kitchen and mezzanine will all be easily closed off with huge sliding glass. Toms biggest concern is for the finishes after the exposed chipboard is damaged by some wet weather, hes keen to get the roof on. Will financial pressure and some inclement weather force a re-think or will he and Zewlan stay true to their small house philosophy?

programme.title: Property Brothers: Forever Home
programme.desc: Ashley, Red and their three kids love their 1960s family home thats full of charm and beautiful vintage treasures. But with its dated layout, an abundance of antiques and a frustrating kitchen, the house is showing its age, and the couple needs help.

programme.title: Buying and Selling
programme.desc: After 16 years in her compact home, single mum Lolita is desperate to find a larger property for herself and her four growing boys. Drew and Jonathan step in with a real estate intervention.

programme.title: Buying and Selling
programme.desc: Andrea and Santino are desperate to move back downtown, but if the brothers dont help them spruce up their well-worn family home, they wont be able to afford a pricey urban upgrade.

programme.title: My Dream Home
programme.desc: Newlyweds, busy professionals, and animal lovers, Sophie, Tim, and their two dogs are determined to get out of his cramped condo. But with their mile-long wish list, finding a perfect modern property will take a minor miracle. The Property Brothers promise to make it happen and lead the search for a fixer-upper with great bones. Drew successfully coaches the couple through a potential bidding war. Later, the open-concept design hits a brick wall, and Jonathan wrestles with asbestos, ancient wiring, and structural issues to keep the ambitious project on time and on budget.

programme.title: Home Town
programme.desc: Ben and Erin transform a home into a modern, spacious farmhouse with a chicken coop made from a dilapidated childrens playhouse for a family seeking more space.

programme.title: Fixer to Fabulous
programme.desc: Newly empty nesters purchase a property with plenty of land for their dogs, but the dated house needs some serious renovations to fit their style. Dave and Jenny transform the home.

programme.title: House Hunters Renovation
programme.desc: Home buyers tour for-sale homes and choose the one that is the perfect fixer-upper.

programme.title: Property Brothers: Forever Home
programme.desc: Lisa, John and their two grown kids Cora and Spencer have lived in their home for over 20 years. But with the choppy layout, cramped kitchen and dated style, the house is no longer functioning for four adults living under the same roof, and the family needs help.

programme.title: My Dream Home
programme.desc: Drew Scott and Jonathan Scott help Lana and Jacob, who are ready to move from a tiny one-bedroom apartment into their first house.

programme.title: Love It or List It Vancouver
programme.desc: Danielle loves Trevor but not his house. Can Jillian convince her to stay by bringing out the beauty in this heritage home? Or can Todd help Trevor move to a house with an outdoor space that fulfils his dream?

programme.title: A Place in the Sun
programme.desc: Laura Hamilton is house hunting around the coastal town of Mazarron with Andi and Neil from York. The couple are dreaming of retiring permanently to Spain with their son Joel and Spaniel, Dixie, and are looking for a 3-bedroom house, close to the beach, with a dog-friendly garden, where Captain Barbeque Neil can cook up a storm.

programme.title: A Place in the Sun
programme.desc: Jean Johansson is coming to the aid of Lorraine and Jon, whose long-held dream is of owning a house in Spain for regular getaways among the white-washed, mountain villages of Axarquia.

programme.title: A Place in the Sun
programme.desc: Lorna and Gordon cant wait to retire and move to Spain, where they are looking for their new dream home in their favourite resort of Benalmadena on the Costa Del Sol.

programme.title: A Place in the Sun
programme.desc: Laura and Nick are childhood sweethearts, who finally got engaged more than 20 years later, after a chance reunion. Theyre now dreaming of a wedding in the sun and of moving permanently to Estepona, on Spains Costa Del Sol along with their dog, Poppy.

programme.title: Love It or List It
programme.desc: When a house no longer feels like home, owners are left with a big financial and emotional question: renovate or real estate? Hosts David and Hilary help fed-up owners decide.

programme.title: House Hunters Renovation
programme.sub-title: A Reno With No End In Sight
programme.desc: Home buyers tour for-sale homes and choose the one that is the perfect fixer-upper.

programme.title: Home Town Takeover
programme.desc: The Napiers and the Marrs kick off the revitalisation of Fort Morgan, Colorado, with the goal to transform 18 projects in just four months.

programme.title: Designing the Hebrides
programme.desc: Banjo makes over two spaces on the Isle of Mull. A local castle turret needs a spruce up and a lighthouse guest room is in need of a revamp, but tricky logistics and bad weather hamper his plans.

programme.title: Designing the Hebrides
programme.desc: Banjo and his team have been tasked with updating a crumbling bothy for the community of the Isle of Ulva. Can Banjo transform it into a cosy, welcoming retreat?

programme.title: Flip or Flop
programme.desc: Tarek and Christina get a lead on a trust sale property. Its in good shape, but as the budget starts ballooning, they wonder if this home has more pitfalls than potential.

programme.title: Buying and Selling
programme.desc: Single dad Joe lives in the suburbs with his daughters, but the non-stop driving is taking its toll. Theyre desperate to trade their detached home and crazy commute for a downtown condo with all the perks.

programme.title: My Dream Home
programme.desc: Confined to a tiny home in a hot neighbourhood, Katie, Michael, and their three daughters quickly sold their property. But now theyre squeezed into a one-bedroom rental until the Property Brothers can find them their forever home. Determined to stay in their high-demand school district, the search area is limited to just a few blocks. Drew somehow manages to come up with a short-list, and then its up to Jonathan to straighten a seriously sagging century home. The problems start piling up as soon as the walls come down, and then the renovation is thrown completely off track by a hole that threatens to sink the entire project.

programme.title: Home Town
programme.desc: Ben and Erin help a couple create the ultimate gathering place complete with a custom table for outdoor dining and a pergola party area.

programme.title: Fixer to Fabulous
programme.desc: Dave and Jenny purchase a historic building in Centerton with the vision of revitalising the downtown area. Now, theyre ready to begin this massive project.

programme.title: House Hunters Renovation
programme.sub-title: A Reno With No End In Sight
programme.desc: Home buyers tour for-sale homes and choose the one that is the perfect fixer-upper.

programme.title: Property Brothers: Forever Home
programme.desc: Meghan and Chris moved 14 times in the last 15 years before they discovered a single-story house and knew they found what could be their forever home. Despite its quirks with the 1970s decor, old carpet, they just need help bringing their dream to life.

programme.title: Designing the Hebrides
programme.desc: Banjo makes over two spaces on the Isle of Mull. A local castle turret needs a spruce up and a lighthouse guest room is in need of a revamp, but tricky logistics and bad weather hamper his plans.

programme.title: Home Town Takeover
programme.desc: The Napiers and the Marrs kick off the revitalisation of Fort Morgan, Colorado, with the goal to transform 18 projects in just four months.

programme.title: My Dream Home
programme.desc: Fresh out of a six-year relationship, Amber is determined to move on and buy a new house, so seeks advice from experts Drew and Jonathan Scott.

programme.title: Love It or List It Vancouver
programme.desc: Amie and Mark love mountain living but hate their dark, gloomy location. Can Todd find Mark the bright, sunny home of his dreams? Or will Jillian bring light to the darkness and help Amie persuade Mark to stay?

programme.title: A Place in the Sun
programme.desc: Gary and Jennifer from Northern Ireland are childhood sweethearts, who after 40 years together are looking to open a new chapter in their lives by buying a holiday home near the traditional Spanish town of Vera, on the Costa Almeria.

programme.title: A Place in the Sun
programme.desc: Jonnie Irwin is house hunting in and around the pretty Spanish town of Chiclana de la Frontera on the Costa de la Luz, with chauffeur company owner Steve, and export co-ordinator Janice. They both have busy lives and cant wait to buy their own holiday home that they can escape to for relaxing getaways with their family.

programme.title: A Place in the Sun
programme.desc: Scarlette Douglas is in the charming, whitewashed town of Mojacar on the Costa Almeria with house hunter, Maureen who after holidaying there for nearly 30 years feels nows the right time to make the big move and retire there permanently.

programme.title: Blonde and Blonder
programme.desc: When two dim-witted blonde bombshells are mistaken for the underworlds most cunning assassins, they are approached with a lucrative contract to take out the head of the Chinese mafia in a globetrotting, air-headed comedy. Two fair-haired beauties have just witnessed a high-profile mob hit, and now the Godfather is convinced that they have what it takes to rub out his most fearsome rival. After accepting a hearty payout and agreeing to carry out the dangerous assignment, the two brainless beauties hit the open road on the adventure of a lifetime.

programme.title: The Pastors Wife
programme.desc: Mary, a dutiful preachers wife and mother of three, becomes the prime suspect in her husbands murder. What went on behind this perfect familys closed doors? Based on a true story.

programme.title: Wedding Planner Mystery
programme.desc: A quirky but lovable event planner makes murder as fun as can be. Homicide doesnt follow our heroine, she seeks it out. Using her circle of contacts, her friendship with a cop and the same research skills that enable her to plan distinctive events - if an unsolved murder occurs in Seattle, Carnegie will find out about it.

programme.title: Michael Jackson: Searching for Neverland
programme.desc: Based on Bill and Javons book Remember the Time: The Last Days of Michael Jackson, this movie will chronicle those intimate moments between Jackson and his children, document the professional turbulence that engulfed Jackson in financial trouble and forced him back to rehearsals for the ill-fated This Is It tour that led to his early death, and help answer the question that fans around the world want to know: What really happened to the King of Pop?

programme.title: Lies Between Friends
programme.desc: A wealthy familys life is upended when the 18-year-old daughter of a family friend comes to live with them for a few months.

programme.title: Date at Your Own Risk
programme.desc: Eva becomes horrified when she reads an online post where other women accuse her ex-fiance, Will, of harassment and aggressive behaviour. When one of the posters mysteriously disappears, she soon starts to wonder if the stories about Will are true.

programme.title: Match, Meet, Murder
programme.desc: A lingerie designer meets a handsome stranger whos smart, successful, and a former contestant on a dating show. However, she soon learns that the show wasnt the only secret he failed to mention.

programme.title: Wife Stalker
programme.desc: Joannas obsessive fantasy of a perfect life with Leo shatters, forcing her to confront harsh reality and the truth about their relationship, with dire consequences.

programme.title: Deadly Secrets By the Lake
programme.desc: This whodunit murder mystery uncovers the secrets kept by the idyllic lakeside town of Thornwood Heights. It tells the story of the prodigal daughter who returns home to prove her sisters innocence of murder but is met by a lost, forbidden love, dark family secrets and a long standing family rivalry fuelled by the disappearance of a childhood best friend.

programme.title: Beaches
programme.desc: While remaining faithful to the original story, we follow the lifelong friendship between LA-born CC Bloom and San Francisco rich girl Hillary Whitney after they serendipitously meet on Venice Beach. In this update, CC is a budding pop star who is struggling to make it in LA until she is discovered by a music producer who helps her develop her raw talent. Hillary is the daughter of a prominent lawyer who is intent on making her own destiny and getting out from under the control of her domineering father. Their friendship - even with its ups and downs - sustains them for decades, but ends tragically with Hillarys early death.

programme.title: Who Is Killing The Cheerleaders?
programme.desc: Ellie, a former cheerleader, returns to her high school as a teacher ten years after she was nearly killed in a series of brutal slayings on the squad. When the attacks start up again shortly after her arrival, she must find the killer before they get to her first.

programme.title: Husband, Wife and Their Lover
programme.desc: When an Ad Execs husband suggests a third in their bed to spice up the marriage, she invites her female trainer to join them but soon after discovers the trainer is unhinged, bent on revenge for something in the past, and must find a way to stop the woman before she ruins both their lives.

programme.title: Expecting Amish
programme.desc: When an eventful Rumspringa leads to an unintended pregnancy, Amish teen Hannah must choose between returning to faith and family or beginning a new life elsewhere.

programme.title: V.C. Andrews Hidden Jewel
programme.desc: Rubys struggle continues to find a happy life with Beau Andreas, the true father of Pearl, and to protect their precious daughter. Sheltered from sorrow, innocent young Pearl thrives in the sunshine of a loving home, except for the haunting nightmares of her earliest years and the dark family secrets she worries will one day shadow her destiny. As Pearls journey and dreams of success swirl away with the hurricane winds, and she journeys to the swamps in search of her mother and the shocking truths of her heritage. In the warm embrace of a gentle Cajun man, she discovers a blessed refuge. But, until the storm clouds clear, Pearl cannot savour the springtime sweetness that always seems beyond tomorrow.

programme.title: Spinning Out Of Control
programme.desc: Infatuated and obsessed with a fitness instructor, Natalie hatches a devious plan to eliminate everyone in the young womans life so she can have her all to herself.

programme.title: V.C. Andrews All That Glitters
programme.desc: Driven from the Dumas Mansion back to her beloved bayou, Ruby is determined to make a secure and happy home for her precious infant daughter, Pearl. Paul Tate, her first love, is at her side once more with dazzling wealth. Whisking her into his grand house, it seems their future is assured. But the thick, expensive walls of Cypress Woods cannot shut out the terrible memories and shocking reasons that have woven their fabric over her destiny, or the cold eyes of Pauls mother, Gladys, reminding Ruby of the secret she must keep to give Pearl a loving father. Desperate to find the complete, fulfilling life she craves, Ruby builds a precarious new existence, a flimsy shanty of hope that the first flood washes away. Only when the storm exposes the very blackest evils of the past will she glimpse the rainbows fragile promise, a morning of sunshine and laughter with a family of her own.

programme.title: Burned By Love
programme.desc: A divorcee meets her perfect match on an online dating site, only to discover hes a scammer looking to destroy her life, escalating into a violent stalker when she attempts to bring him to justice.

programme.title: Surviving The Sleepover
programme.desc: Outspoken teenager Hannah goes to a sleepover at a popular girls house, not realising she was only invited to be the victim of a prank.

programme.title: Cruise Ship Murder
programme.desc: After her aunt is found dead, falling overboard on a cruise ship, Olivias uncles secret past is brought to life.

programme.title: Happy Face Killer
programme.desc: Grisly serial killer Keith Hunter Jesperson taunts authorities with scribbled confessions bearing a smiley face at the scenes of his crimes. Based on a true story.

programme.title: Dying to Win
programme.desc: A gold medal gymnast is catapulted back into the spotlight when she finds her mother and step dad murdered in the family home.

programme.title: Am I A Serial Killer?
programme.desc: A teenage girl visits her mum on death row and gets lured into a dangerous trap to take the fall for her mothers crimes.

programme.title: The Killer Is Calling
programme.desc: When a mysterious killer targets a remote island town, a veteran 911 operator tries to uncover his motives and save her community, one emergency call at a time.

programme.title: Her Affair to Die For
programme.desc: A young womans dad becomes the obsession of her seductive roommate, who will stop at nothing to possess him.

programme.title: Liz and Dick
programme.desc: A chronicle of the fiery, legendary, on-again off-again romance between Hollywood stars Elizabeth Taylor and Richard Burton.

programme.title: An Amish Murder
programme.desc: A woman returns to the Amish farming community of her youth, but her peace is shattered when a murder investigation exposes a dark secret that could destroy her.

programme.title: You Cant Take My Daughter
programme.desc: Amy Thompson is a vibrant law student in Charlotte who is attacked and raped by Demetri, a friend of a friend she met once. Discovering that she is pregnant from the rape, Amy makes the difficult decision to keep her baby, despite the fact that Demetri continues to stalk and harass her as she waits for the long-delayed trial. She gives birth to a beautiful little girl and decides to flee him and start over in Atlanta. Six years later, Demetri finds her and, to her horror, sues her for custody of her daughter. Using her own legal and investigative skills, Amy fights back.

programme.title: Secrets In The Desert
programme.desc: While on a road trip through the desert, Charlie and her boyfriend Aidan break down in the middle of nowhere. While Aidan waits for a tow truck, Charlie heads to a nearby diner to find help. When Aidan goes missing, Charlie finds herself stranded in a strange town unsure who to trust. The only thing she knows is she might just be their only chance to get out alive.

programme.title: Waking Up To Danger
programme.desc: A young mother picks up the pieces after a horrible accident damages her memory. She soon suspects her husbands indiscretions are what caused her suffering and that her family is in danger.

programme.title: Nanny Dearest
programme.desc: Ex-con Taylor tracks down a married couple who received one of her eggs 10 years ago. She becomes fixated on their daughter and will stop at nothing from becoming a mother again.

programme.title: Silent Night, Fatal Night
programme.desc: When best-selling mystery author Mallory Dearborn decides to end her long-running detective franchise, her unhinged manager takes her prisoner and forces her to write a new novel during the holidays.

programme.title: Single Black Female 3: The Final Chapter
programme.desc: Monica is proven innocent after being wrongfully arrested for murder. As charges are dropped, the police shift focus to Simone, who has vanished while bonding with her daughter Joy.

programme.title: Framed by My Husband
programme.desc: When Junes wealthy husband Rick becomes the target of an extortionist who claims he sexually assaulted her, Rick convinces his wife its an act of revenge by a spurned suitor, and enlists her help to prevent the accusations from going public. June agrees to help him pay off the extortionist, but when the woman is found dead, June becomes the prime suspect.

programme.title: Ill Be Watching
programme.desc: Based on the novel The Purple Rose by Christi R. Walsh. After narrowly escaping the clutches of a deadly stalker, a beautiful young woman flees to a remote anonymous town, where she rebuilds her life and finds the man of her dreams, until the man of her nightmares tracks her down.

programme.title: I Will Survive: The Gloria Gaynor Story
programme.desc: Rising from humble beginnings and overcoming personal challenges, singer Gloria Gaynor soars to the top of the music charts with her legendary hit, I Will Survive.

programme.title: Trapped in Her Dorm Room
programme.desc: College student Erin becomes trapped in her dorm room during Spring Break when a classmates harmless adoration turns into a dangerous obsession.

programme.title: Boy In The Attic
programme.desc: Angst-ridden over her new mundane small town life, a teenage girl discovers a mysterious boy living in her attic and befriends him. Unknown to her, he is harbouring a dark secret.

programme.title: Blonde and Blonder
programme.desc: When two dim-witted blonde bombshells are mistaken for the underworlds most cunning assassins, they are approached with a lucrative contract to take out the head of the Chinese mafia in a globetrotting, air-headed comedy. Paul Tate, her first love, is at her side once more with dazzling wealth. Whisking her into his grand house, it seems their future is assured. But the thick, expensive walls of Cypress Woods cannot shut out the terrible memories and shocking reasons that have woven their fabric over her destiny, or the cold eyes of Pauls mother, Gladys, reminding Ruby of the secret she must keep to give Pearl a loving father. Desperate to find the complete, fulfilling life she craves, Ruby builds a precarious new existence, a flimsy shanty of hope that the first flood washes away. Only when the storm exposes the very blackest evils of the past will she glimpse the rainbows fragile promise, a morning of sunshine and laughter with a family of her own.

programme.title: Burned By Love
programme.desc: A divorcee meets her perfect match on an online dating site, only to discover hes a scammer looking to destroy her life, escalating into a violent stalker when she attempts to bring him to justice.

programme.title: Surviving The Sleepover
programme.desc: Outspoken teenager Hannah goes to a sleepover at a popular girls house, not realising she was only invited to be the victim of a prank.

programme.title: Cruise Ship Murder
programme.desc: After her aunt is found dead, falling overboard on a cruise ship, Olivias uncles secret past is brought to life.

programme.title: Happy Face Killer
programme.desc: Grisly serial killer Keith Hunter Jesperson taunts authorities with scribbled confessions bearing a smiley face at the scenes of his crimes. Based on a true story.

programme.title: Dying to Win
programme.desc: A gold medal gymnast is catapulted back into the spotlight when she finds her mother and step dad murdered in the family home.

programme.title: Am I A Serial Killer?
programme.desc: A teenage girl visits her mum on death row and gets lured into a dangerous trap to take the fall for her mothers crimes.

programme.title: The Killer Is Calling
programme.desc: When a mysterious killer targets a remote island town, a veteran 911 operator tries to uncover his motives and save her community, one emergency call at a time.

programme.title: Her Affair to Die For
programme.desc: A young womans dad becomes the obsession of her seductive roommate, who will stop at nothing to possess him.

programme.title: Liz and Dick
programme.desc: A chronicle of the fiery, legendary, on-again off-again romance between Hollywood stars Elizabeth Taylor and Richard Burton.

programme.title: An Amish Murder
programme.desc: A woman returns to the Amish farming community of her youth, but her peace is shattered when a murder investigation exposes a dark secret that could destroy her.

programme.title: You Cant Take My Daughter
programme.desc: Amy Thompson is a vibrant law student in Charlotte who is attacked and raped by Demetri, a friend of a friend she met once. Discovering that she is pregnant from the rape, Amy makes the difficult decision to keep her baby, despite the fact that Demetri continues to stalk and harass her as she waits for the long-delayed trial. She gives birth to a beautiful little girl and decides to flee him and start over in Atlanta. Six years later, Demetri finds her and, to her horror, sues her for custody of her daughter. Using her own legal and investigative skills, Amy fights back.

programme.title: Secrets In The Desert
programme.desc: While on a road trip through the desert, Charlie and her boyfriend Aidan break down in the middle of nowhere. While Aidan waits for a tow truck, Charlie heads to a nearby diner to find help. When Aidan goes missing, Charlie finds herself stranded in a strange town unsure who to trust. The only thing she knows is she might just be their only chance to get out alive.

programme.title: Waking Up To Danger
programme.desc: A young mother picks up the pieces after a horrible accident damages her memory. She soon suspects her husbands indiscretions are what caused her suffering and that her family is in danger.

programme.title: Nanny Dearest
programme.desc: Ex-con Taylor tracks down a married couple who received one of her eggs 10 years ago. She becomes fixated on their daughter and will stop at nothing from becoming a mother again.

programme.title: Silent Night, Fatal Night
programme.desc: When best-selling mystery author Mallory Dearborn decides to end her long-running detective franchise, her unhinged manager takes her prisoner and forces her to write a new novel during the holidays.

programme.title: Single Black Female 3: The Final Chapter
programme.desc: Monica is proven innocent after being wrongfully arrested for murder. As charges are dropped, the police shift focus to Simone, who has vanished while bonding with her daughter Joy.

programme.title: Framed by My Husband
programme.desc: When Junes wealthy husband Rick becomes the target of an extortionist who claims he sexually assaulted her, Rick convinces his wife its an act of revenge by a spurned suitor, and enlists her help to prevent the accusations from going public. June agrees to help him pay off the extortionist, but when the woman is found dead, June becomes the prime suspect.

programme.title: Ill Be Watching
programme.desc: Based on the novel The Purple Rose by Christi R. Walsh. After narrowly escaping the clutches of a deadly stalker, a beautiful young woman flees to a remote anonymous town, where she rebuilds her life and finds the man of her dreams, until the man of her nightmares tracks her down.

programme.title: I Will Survive: The Gloria Gaynor Story
programme.desc: Rising from humble beginnings and overcoming personal challenges, singer Gloria Gaynor soars to the top of the music charts with her legendary hit, I Will Survive.

programme.title: Trapped in Her Dorm Room
programme.desc: College student Erin becomes trapped in her dorm room during Spring Break when a classmates harmless adoration turns into a dangerous obsession.

programme.title: Boy In The Attic
programme.desc: Angst-ridden over her new mundane small town life, a teenage girl discovers a mysterious boy living in her attic and befriends him. Unknown to her, he is harbouring a dark secret.

programme.title: Lawrence of Arabia
programme.desc: When T.E. Lawrence was attached to the British general staff in Arabia, he inspired the feuding Arabian chieftains to rebel against the Turks, leading to the birth of the Arabian kingdom.

programme.title: Frantic
programme.desc: In a hotel room in Paris, a doctor comes out of the shower and finds that his wife has disappeared. He soon finds himself caught up in a world of intrigue, espionage, gangsters, drugs and murder.

programme.title: Look Whos Talking Now
programme.desc: The holidays are approaching and the Ubriacco household is wrapped up in more turmoil than tinsel. James has unexpectedly found prosperity and job satisfaction as a highly paid private pilot for Samantha DBonne, the glamorous president of an international cosmetics firm. But while her husband is winging around the world, Mollie has to juggle her role as mum with her duties at her new job, labouring as an elf for a department store Santa.

programme.title: U.S. Marshals
programme.desc: We are initiating a hard-target search for a fugitive in an ever-widening perimeter. We will navigate swamps, prowl Manhattan streets, search every house and doghouse. And since Marshal Sam Gerard leads the hunt, we will experience suspense, action and daring twists every step of the way.

programme.title: Up In Smoke
programme.desc: In this hilarious comedy, two free-spirited pot-heads decide to join forces in their endles search for substances to snort, smoke, or drop. This is the first film in the Cheech and Chong series.

programme.title: The Naked Gun: From the Files of Police Squad!
programme.desc: Incompetent detective Frank Drebin has to foil an attempt to assassinate the Queen as he woos Priscilla Presley.

programme.title: The Naked Gun: From the Files of Police Squad!
programme.desc: Incompetent detective Frank Drebin has to foil an attempt to assassinate the Queen as he woos Priscilla Presley.

programme.title: The Brady Bunch Movie
programme.desc: The Brady Bunch live in the LA suburbs, a community beset by economic adversity, a crime rate spiralling out of control and the challenges of the information superhighway. In the middle of it all, the Bradys live a chaotically idyllic existence with their kids, where 70s values reign. But problems arise to upset this perfect world. Carol and Mike face a considerable dilemma when confronted with an overdue property tax bill.

programme.title: Wyatt Earp
programme.desc: The epic story of love and adventure in a lawless land shows the complex portrayal of the most famous lawman in the Wild West.

programme.title: The Blues Brothers
programme.desc: After the release of Jake Blues from prison, he and brother Elwood go to visit the orphanage where they were raised by nuns. They learn that the church stopped its support and will sell the place unless the tax on the property is paid within 11 days. The brothers decide to raise the money by putting their blues band back together and staging a big gig. They may be on a mission from God but theyre making enemies everywhere they go.

programme.title: Death Becomes Her
programme.desc: Two Hollywood divas surgery-enhanced rivalry goes beyond the grave.

programme.title: Patriot Games
programme.desc: Former CIA analyst Jack Ryan travels to London with his wife and child. Upon being caught in the middle of a terrorist attack on a member of the royal family, Ryan helps to thwart the assailants. Ryans courageous act, however, marks him and his family as a target for revenge in the sights of the terrorist whose brother Ryan killed.

programme.title: Top Gun
programme.desc: A pilot is selected to attend the Top Gun Naval Flying School while also pursuing a relationship with an instructor.

programme.desc: Defence lawyers Daniel Kaffee and Joanne Galloway are assigned the case of defending two US soldiers, accused of murdering a fellow soldier who was deemed to have broken the code. Kaffee and Galloway soon run into a brick wall with Col Nathan Jessep, who sees himself as a military untouchable. The accused claim they were obeying orders, and that the death was an accident.

In disguise as an impoverished immigrant, the pampered prince quickly finds himself a new job, new friends, new digs, new enemies and lots of trouble.

programme.desc: Tom travels out to Arizona to search for the Lost Dutchmans treasure.

programme.title: Duck Camp Dinners
programme.desc: After a late night of good times, venison chili, and some old school roux the crew heads out for another day of hunting ducks. After a couple of quick adjustments the team finds themselves back in the ducks.

programme.title: Duck Camp Dinners
programme.sub-title: Beaux Beauxs at the Hobo Hilton

programme.title: Great Aussie Road Trips
programme.desc: Part One of a journey along the Kamilaroi Highway, from Willow Tree to Moree, in NewSouth Wales, taking in The Great Divide on our way to the Great Australian Outback. Magnificentlandscapes, awesome attractions.

programme.title: Great Aussie Road Trips
programme.desc: Part Two of our Kamilaroi Highway road-trip starts in Lightning Ridge and wraps up inBourke, and were blessed with more sensational countryside, and the awesome stories that make this so popular.

programme.title: Jack Stein: Inside the Box
programme.desc: Jack travels to Lucca, Italy, to share the British classic bangers and mash. A Michelin star chef proposes he radically changes the dish and transforms it into a masterpiece.

programme.title: Jack Stein: Inside the Box
programme.desc: Jack travels to landlocked Zagreb in Croatia to cook fish and chips for hungry locals and a politician. Will they like his version of the internationally renowned meal?

programme.desc: Claudia pulls out all the stops to try and make a big sale to jade buyers; up at the mine, Guy and Gary struggle through the first snowstorm of the season.

programme.desc: Claudia pushes her crew to keep mining despite freezing temperatures and deteriorating road conditions, but her biggest obstacle could be Robin who wants to pack up before its too late.

programme.title: Unsung Hero
programme.desc: David Smallbone moves his family from Downunder to the States, searching for a brighter future after his successful music company collapses. With nothing more than their seven children, suitcases, and their love of music, David and his pregnant wife Helen set out to rebuild their lives. David and Helen begin to realise the musical prowess in their children, who would go on to become two of the most successful acts in Inspirational Music history.

programme.title: The Holdovers
programme.desc: A curmudgeonly instructor at a prep school is forced to remain on campus during Christmas break to babysit a handful of students with nowhere to go.

programme.title: Gary
programme.desc: Follows Gary Colemans rise to international fame as the child star of Diffrent Strokes, his struggles with fame, and the controversy surrounding his tragic death at the age of 42.

programme.title: Speak No Evil
programme.desc: A dream holiday turns into a living nightmare when an American couple and their daughter spend the weekend at a British familys idyllic country estate.

programme.title: Something In The Water
programme.desc: A dream wedding turns into a nightmare when five girlfriends fight for their lives in open water.

programme.title: Spit
programme.desc: An ex-con returns to Australia after 20 years, and gets detained. He faces old enemies, makes new friends in detention, and teaches his version of Australian mateship while staying one step ahead.

programme.title: And Mrs
programme.desc: When a reluctant bride-to-bes fiance drops dead, she insists on marrying him anyway, vowing to overcome public opinion, the law of the land, and her loved ones objections.

programme.title: Saturday Night
programme.desc: Tensions run high as producer Lorne Michaels and a ferocious troupe of young comedians and writers prepare for the first broadcast of "Saturday Night Live" on Oct. 11, 1975.

programme.title: Anyone But You
programme.desc: Bea and Bens initial attraction quickly turns sour until they must pretend to be a couple.

programme.title: A Different Man
programme.desc: An aspiring actor undergoes a radical medical procedure to transform his appearance. However, his dream face quickly becomes a nightmare as he becomes obsessed with reclaiming what he lost.

programme.title: Ezra
programme.desc: Comedian Max co-parents autistic son Ezra with ex-wife Jenna. Faced with crucial decisions about Ezras future, Max and Ezra go on a life-changing cross-country road trip.

programme.title: Mean Girls (2024)
programme.desc: In a musical twist of the cult classic, new student Cady Heron is welcomed by the popular girls called "The Plastics". However, when Cady falls for queen bee Reginas ex-boyfriend, she finds herself in Reginas crosshairs. She must learn to stay true to herself while navigating the most cut throat jungle of all: high school.

programme.title: Reunion
programme.desc: Snowbound at their high school reunion, former classmates uncover a murder and scramble to identify the killer among them before theyre all iced out for good.

programme.title: Thelma
programme.desc: When 93-year-old Thelma Post gets duped by a phone scammer pretending to be her grandson, she sets out on a treacherous quest across the city to reclaim what was taken from her.

programme.title: Midas Man
programme.desc: On Thursday 9 November 1961, a man named Brian descended the stairs to a cellar in Liverpool and changed the world forever.

programme.title: The Beast Within
programme.desc: After witnessing her father undergo a terrible transformation, a 10-year-old girl becomes ensnared by the dark ancestral secret that her parents have so desperately tried to conceal.

programme.title: Sumotherhood
programme.desc: Two wannabe gangsters hold up a local bank, but when things dont go according to plan, a misunderstanding leads them into business with one of East Londons most notorious gangs.

programme.title: Theres Something in the Barn
programme.desc: Bill moves his family to Norway after inheriting a remote estate. However, the family disturbs an unexpected resident: a barn elf who will go to lengths to drive the family away.

programme.title: Smile 2
programme.desc: About to embark on a world tour, global pop sensation Skye Riley begins experiencing increasingly terrifying and inexplicable events. Overwhelmed by the escalating horrors and the pressures of fame, Skye is forced to face her past.

programme.title: Dune: Part Two
programme.desc: Dune: Part Two will explore the mythic journey of Paul Atreides as he unites with Chani and the Fremen while on a warpath of revenge against the conspirators who destroyed his family. Facing a choice between the love of his life and the fate of the known universe, he endeavors to prevent a terrible future only he can foresee.

programme.title: Tuesday
programme.desc: A mother and her teenage daughter must confront Death when it arrives in the form of an astonishing talking bird.

programme.title: Blue Beetle
programme.desc: A Mexican-American college grads life is turned upside down when a mysterious scarab gives him the ability to generate an exoskeleton suit of incredible power.

programme.title: Aristotle and Dante
programme.desc: Mexican teenagers Aristotle Mendoza and Dante Quintana explore their friendship while struggling with racial and ethnic identity, sexuality and family relationships in 1987, Texas.

programme.title: I.S.S.
programme.desc: Tensions flare in the near future aboard the International Space Station as a conflict breaks out on Earth. Reeling, the U.S. and Russian astronauts receive orders from the ground - take control of the station by any means necessary.

programme.title: Bookworm
programme.desc: 11-year-old Mildreds world is turned upside down when her estranged father, the washed-up magician Strawn Wise, comes to look after her and agrees to take her camping to find a mythological beast known as the Canterbury Panther.

programme.title: Harold and the Purple Crayon
programme.desc: Inside of his book, adventurous Harold can make anything come to life simply by drawing it. After he grows up and draws himself off the books pages and into the physical world, Harold finds he has a lot to learn about real life.

programme.title: This Time Next Year
programme.desc: Minnie and Quinn are born on the same day, one minute apart. Their lives may begin together, but their worlds couldnt be more different. Years later they find themselves together again. Maybe its time to take a chance on love.

programme.title: Tenor
programme.desc: While working part-time as a food deliveryman, Antoine, an aspiring young rapper from the suburbs of Paris, meets Mrs. Loyseau, an eminent teacher at the Paris Opera. Stunned by the young mans raw talent, she introduces him to the world of opera. As Antoine becomes one of Mrs. Loyseaus students, he hides his new dream from his friends and family, fearing that they wont understand. Somewhere in between the gilded and uptight Parisian upper-class, and the harsh yet free-spirited and familiar suburbs he grew up in, Antoine will have to find his own voice.

programme.desc: An aspiring actor undergoes a radical medical procedure to transform his appearance. However, his dream face quickly becomes a nightmare as he becomes obsessed with reclaiming what he lost.

programme.title: Ezra
programme.desc: Comedian Max co-parents autistic son Ezra with ex-wife Jenna. Faced with crucial decisions about Ezras future, Max and Ezra go on a life-changing cross-country road trip.

programme.title: Mean Girls (2024)
programme.desc: In a musical twist of the cult classic, new student Cady Heron is welcomed by the popular girls called "The Plastics". However, when Cady falls for queen bee Reginas ex-boyfriend, she finds herself in Reginas crosshairs. She must learn to stay true to herself while navigating the most cut throat jungle of all: high school.

programme.title: Reunion
programme.desc: Snowbound at their high school reunion, former classmates uncover a murder and scramble to identify the killer among them before theyre all iced out for good.

programme.title: Thelma
programme.desc: When 93-year-old Thelma Post gets duped by a phone scammer pretending to be her grandson, she sets out on a treacherous quest across the city to reclaim what was taken from her.

programme.title: Midas Man
programme.desc: On Thursday 9 November 1961, a man named Brian descended the stairs to a cellar in Liverpool and changed the world forever.

programme.title: The Beast Within
programme.desc: After witnessing her father undergo a terrible transformation, a 10-year-old girl becomes ensnared by the dark ancestral secret that her parents have so desperately tried to conceal.

programme.title: Sumotherhood
programme.desc: Two wannabe gangsters hold up a local bank, but when things dont go according to plan, a misunderstanding leads them into business with one of East Londons most notorious gangs.

programme.title: Theres Something in the Barn
programme.desc: Bill moves his family to Norway after inheriting a remote estate. However, the family disturbs an unexpected resident: a barn elf who will go to lengths to drive the family away.

programme.title: Smile 2
programme.desc: About to embark on a world tour, global pop sensation Skye Riley begins experiencing increasingly terrifying and inexplicable events. Overwhelmed by the escalating horrors and the pressures of fame, Skye is forced to face her past.

programme.title: Dune: Part Two
programme.desc: Dune: Part Two will explore the mythic journey of Paul Atreides as he unites with Chani and the Fremen while on a warpath of revenge against the conspirators who destroyed his family. Facing a choice between the love of his life and the fate of the known universe, he endeavors to prevent a terrible future only he can foresee.

programme.title: Tuesday
programme.desc: A mother and her teenage daughter must confront Death when it arrives in the form of an astonishing talking bird.

programme.title: Blue Beetle
programme.desc: A Mexican-American college grads life is turned upside down when a mysterious scarab gives him the ability to generate an exoskeleton suit of incredible power.

programme.title: Aristotle and Dante
programme.desc: Mexican teenagers Aristotle Mendoza and Dante Quintana explore their friendship while struggling with racial and ethnic identity, sexuality and family relationships in 1987, Texas.

programme.title: I.S.S.
programme.desc: Tensions flare in the near future aboard the International Space Station as a conflict breaks out on Earth. Reeling, the U.S. and Russian astronauts receive orders from the ground - take control of the station by any means necessary.

programme.title: Bookworm
programme.desc: 11-year-old Mildreds world is turned upside down when her estranged father, the washed-up magician Strawn Wise, comes to look after her and agrees to take her camping to find a mythological beast known as the Canterbury Panther.

programme.title: Harold and the Purple Crayon
programme.desc: Inside of his book, adventurous Harold can make anything come to life simply by drawing it. After he grows up and draws himself off the books pages and into the physical world, Harold finds he has a lot to learn about real life.

programme.title: This Time Next Year
programme.desc: Minnie and Quinn are born on the same day, one minute apart. Their lives may begin together, but their worlds couldnt be more different. Years later they find themselves together again. Maybe its time to take a chance on love.

programme.title: Tenor
programme.desc: While working part-time as a food deliveryman, Antoine, an aspiring young rapper from the suburbs of Paris, meets Mrs. Loyseau, an eminent teacher at the Paris Opera. Stunned by the young mans raw talent, she introduces him to the world of opera. As Antoine becomes one of Mrs. Loyseaus students, he hides his new dream from his friends and family, fearing that they wont understand. Somewhere in between the gilded and uptight Parisian upper-class, and the harsh yet free-spirited and familiar suburbs he grew up in, Antoine will have to find his own voice.

programme.title: Blue Beetle
programme.desc: A Mexican-American college grads life is turned upside down when a mysterious scarab gives him the ability to generate an exoskeleton suit of incredible power.

programme.title: Saw X
programme.desc: A sick and desperate John Kramer travels to Mexico for a risky and experimental medical procedure in hopes of a miracle cure for his cancer - only to discover the entire operation is a scam to defraud the vulnerable. Armed with a newfound purpose, the infamous serial killer returns to his work, turning the tables on the con artists in his signature visceral way through devious, deranged, and ingenious traps.

programme.title: Deadly Deception
programme.desc: Best friends Devin and Stefan thought their bond was unbreakable. That is, until a former sweetheart comes back into their lives and inadvertently tears open a deadly wound.

programme.title: The Killer in My Family
programme.desc: After a tragic murder in Cornwall that left his sister and four of her children dead, Peter Wyatt opens up about his violent, controlling brother-in-law, Lee Ford.

programme.title: Australian Crime Stories: Investigators
programme.desc: Traces the decades-long hunt for an elusive bank robber, culminating in his capture through a 50-year-old fingerprint and fraud conviction.

programme.title: Million Dollar Murders
programme.desc: In 1986, Kevin Pearce was shot by a sniper. Million Dollar Murders uncovers new evidence, reviving the case that implicated business rival William Matthews, hoping to bring closure to the Pearce family.

programme.title: Bloodline Detectives
programme.desc: The NorCal rapist terrorises the women of North California for years until forensic science identifies him.

programme.title: The First 48
programme.desc: When a suburban teenager is found dead in a robbery gone bad, Minneapolis detective Emily Dunphy must find out which of the victims friends may have double-crossed him.

programme.desc: Nick Castree learns his father Ronald Castree was arrested for the murder of a girl in 1975, a crime another man spent 16 years in prison for.

programme.title: Murdered at First Sight
programme.desc: Most killers know their victims, Murdered At First Sight investigates the alarming rise in "Stranger Murders" and the challenges faced by the police in tracking down the suspect of an entirely random homicide.

programme.title: CI Australia: Families Of Crime
programme.desc: David and Catherine Birnie were a Perth couple who embarked on a depraved killing spree in Perth in 1988. Together, they would cruise the citys streets picking up unsuspecting young women who were then kidnapped, raped and murdered. It was only after their final victim staged a courageous escape and exposed the house of horrors that the killer couple were arrested and jailed for life. David later committed suicide in jail. Catherine makes regular appeals to be released on parole. This episode looks into the family backgrounds of both killers and includes an exclusive interview with David Birnies first wife and others who knew the couple when they were children.

It was only after their final victim staged a courageous escape and exposed the house of horrors that the killer couple were arrested and jailed for life. David later committed suicide in jail. Catherine makes regular appeals to be released on parole. This episode looks into the family backgrounds of both killers and includes an exclusive interview with David Birnies first wife and others who knew the couple when they were children.

programme.title: Homicide With Ron Iddles
programme.desc: One of Australias greatest detectives reveals the untold stories of his most challenging cases. This series takes you behind the news headlines, on a minute-by-minute journey with Ron Iddles.

programme.title: Expert Witness
programme.sub-title: Grave Error And Souvenir Of A Killer
programme.desc: A soil specialist helps solve a teenagers murder; a fibre expert revives a stalled Merseyside murder case.

programme.title: Forensic Files II
programme.desc: Join more real-life investigations, as shown through re-enactments and interviews, with the specialists that either solved the cases, or remain baffled by their mysteries.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: When an off-duty policeman was shot dead, his fellow officers were determined to solve the crime. They needed clues to find the killer, and they discovered them in tiny fibres and an asthma inhaler.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A 16-year-old girl was killed by her mother and father, in her own home. Her parents said they acted in self-defence, but the forensic evidence indicated otherwise. Definitive proof would come from an unlikely source: a recording made by an FBI electronic surveillance device.

programme.title: The First 48
programme.desc: When a young mother is found naked and strangled in her car, Tulsa Detective John Brown uncovers a dark obsession that may have turned deadly.

programme.title: Deadly Deception
programme.desc: For a seemingly perfect Atlanta couple, a spontaneous reunion with a sexy high school friend sets off a murderous chain of events.

programme.title: Hours To Kill
programme.desc: A gunman kills volunteer police officer Laura Grillo in her suburban Dallas home. Investigators must link a shocking accusation to a key email and a mastermind who thinks he can outsmart the law.

programme.title: Cops Reloaded
programme.desc: Cops Reloaded revisits some of the most memorable suspects, car chases and action-packed moments from televisions popular reality program.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A cyclist takes a spill while trying to flee from officers, a suspected auto thief claims hes fixing the car for a friend, and a mans drug paraphernalia is found.

programme.title: Murdered at First Sight
programme.desc: Most killers know their victims, Murdered At First Sight investigates the alarming rise in "Stranger Murders" and the challenges faced by the police in tracking down the suspect of an entirely random homicide.

programme.title: CI Australia: Families Of Crime

programme.title: Deadly Deception
programme.desc: For a seemingly perfect Atlanta couple, a spontaneous reunion with a sexy high school friend sets off a murderous chain of events.

programme.title: The Killer in My Family
programme.desc: Terri Lemoine and Sean Vincent Gillis lived a quiet life for ten years. However, they soon discovered that Gillis was living a double life as a serial killer.

programme.title: Murdered at First Sight
programme.desc: Most killers know their victims, Murdered At First Sight investigates the alarming rise in "Stranger Murders" and the challenges faced by the police in tracking down the suspect of an entirely random homicide.

programme.title: CI Australia: Families Of Crime

programme.title: Homicide With Ron Iddles
programme.desc: One of Australias greatest detectives reveals the untold stories of his most challenging cases. This series takes you behind the news headlines, on a minute-by-minute journey with Ron Iddles.

programme.title: The First 48
programme.desc: In Tulsa, a young mother of four is found shot on the side of the road. Detectives only clue is a photograph she took just moments before her murder.

programme.title: Bloodline Detectives
programme.sub-title: Roxanne Wood - Date Night In Michigan
programme.desc: Niles, Michigan 1987, Terry Wood comes home to find his wife Roxanne lying dead in a pool of blood. She has two deep cuts carved into her neck.

programme.title: Weapons of World War II
programme.desc: By 1944, the Allied fronts in Europe had become faster moving and a new form of aircraft was needed to deliver swift, powerful attacks against German lines.

programme.title: Empires of Stone
programme.desc: Legend has it that as long as the Colosseum stands, Rome will stand, and that when the Colosseum falls, not only will Rome fall, but the world will pass away with it. The ruins of the Colosseum are nearly 2000 years old. What it looked like in its heyday and how the spectacular entertainments were staged are mysteries to the modern visitor, but Empires of Stone: Colosseum solves those mysteries.

programme.title: Hitlers Evil Science
programme.desc: The story of Anheherbe, the scientific research organisation the Reich used to justify its conquests and racial crimes. Himmler, the leader of the SS, was convinced that we needed to "rewrite the past in order to control the present and dominate the future".

programme.title: Line of Fire
programme.desc: One of the most decisive battles in history. Explore the facts through state-of-the-art 3D animation and expert analysis by military historians.

programme.title: Weapons of World War II
programme.desc: At the outbreak of WWII, the only heavy four-engined bombers in the war were either Russian or American.

programme.title: Weapons of World War II
programme.desc: At the start of WWII, battleships were seen as the key weapon at sea; their huge firepower dominated the waves. But over the next six years, their vulnerability was exposed by the submarine and aircraft.

programme.title: Secrets of World War II
programme.desc: By early 1940, British codecrackers working on information from the Poles, had begun to crack the German military codes produced on the Enigma cipher machine. Once this had been achieved, the challenge was how to prevent the Germans from finding out their codes had been broken.

programme.title: History of Warfare
programme.desc: The Franco Prussian War of 1871 was the first modern war in Europe. It took place in a new era marked by huge advances in infantry and artillery weaponry. The ineptitude of the French commanders contrasted sharply with the brilliance of the Prussian General Helmut von Moltke. Indeed, the Battle of St Privat should have reversed the entire course of the war. However, a glorious opportunity for the French was wasted by a combination of indecision and incompetence.

programme.title: Time Team
programme.desc: Dense and tranquil woodland in the County Durham countryside seems an unlikely venue for the teams investigation into the earliest days of the Industrial Revolution. But 200 years ago Derwentcote was at the heart of an iron- and steel-producing complex that fuelled the spread of empire. Over three days the team fights through the undergrowth to reveal the furnaces and forges that produced the raw materials of industry under appalling conditions. As well as their chainsaws and mechanical diggers, the archaeologists draw on an unusual resource: the memoirs of an 18th-century industrial spy who visited the site. And with the help of old records, they can even put names and trades to the people who occupied the workers cottages that once stood alongside the works. Its a story of how cottage industry gave way to the might of the industrial cities such as Sheffield, and the team uncovers the highs and lows of the working life of Derwentcote. On top of all that, Tony discovers how excited grown men can be when they get to analyse huge lumps of 200-year-old slag.

programme.title: Abandoned Engineering
programme.desc: A machine of war given new life, an eerie shrine that offered the promise of immortality, and an unconventional labour of love. Each haunted shell now ready to tell its own unique story.

programme.title: American Dynasty
programme.desc: Explores the evolving narrative of America through the stories of some of the nations most famous families.

programme.title: Ancient Egypt By Train
programme.desc: Professor Alice Roberts uses one of the worlds oldest rail networks to explore one of the worlds most ancient civilisations.

programme.title: The Trojan Horse: On the Trail of a Myth
programme.desc: The story of the Trojan Horse is one of the most famous myths in the world. A gigantic wooden horse is loaded with Greek soldiers and presented to the Trojans. Under cover of darkness, the Greeks slip out of the horse and open the gates to their comrades. Only hours later, mighty Troy goes up in flames, making the Trojan Horse an example of an ingenious strategy and how easy it is to trick people. However, what if the story is not true at all? This elaborately shot film presents new archaeological findings that help solve this 3000-year-old mystery.

programme.title: History Uncovered
programme.sub-title: The Cold War: A Kremlin Instigation?
programme.desc: The Cold War has gone down in history as being instigated by the Soviet Union. And yet! Unlike the popular understanding, the spiral of events was triggered and fueled by the USA. Between misunderstandings, false impressions, and inappropriate reactions, President Trumans obsessive anti-Communism triggered a dangerous escalation of tension that spun out of control, tipping the world into four decades of belligerent peace and nuclear dissuasion.

programme.title: History Uncovered
programme.sub-title: The Cold War: A Kremlin Instigation?
programme.desc: The Cold War has gone down in history as being instigated by the Soviet Union. And yet! Unlike the popular understanding, the spiral of events was triggered and fueled by the USA. Between misunderstandings, false impressions, and inappropriate reactions, President Trumans obsessive anti-Communism triggered a dangerous escalation of tension that spun out of control, tipping the world into four decades of belligerent peace and nuclear dissuasion.

programme.title: Time Team
programme.desc: The team faces one of their strangest challenges ever: digging through a church graveyard in search of what could be one of the largest Roman structures ever built in Britain. Tony Robinson and his band are here at the request of the Reverend William Burke, vicar of the historic St Kyneburghas church in Castor, Cambridgeshire. Under very close supervision, the team must dodge the thousands of burials in the graveyard to get to an ornate mosaic floor that was reportedly discovered almost 200 years ago. It could be the missing link in a village that is crammed with massive Roman walls and old reports of exquisite finds. Could they all belong to one vast building, dubbed a Praetorium, that would have dominated the Roman skyline and the whole region? The team fan out through the village to dig up gardens and playing fields and locate the different pieces of the jigsaw. Can they reach the mosaic under the burials and convince the sceptics that theyve found a building the size of a Roman palace?

programme.title: Line of Fire
programme.desc: One of the most decisive battles in history. Explore the facts through state-of-the-art 3D animation and expert analysis by military historians.

programme.title: Ancient Egypt By Train

programme.title: Line of Fire
programme.desc: On the 25th of October, 1854 the Russians moved in on British positions on the hills of Balaclava, a town in Ukraine, about 10 kilometres from Sevastapol. The Battle of Balaclava has become renowned as one of the most famous battles of all time.

programme.title: Weapons of World War II
programme.desc: Rockets had a huge impact on WWII. Hand-held rocket launchers such as the American bazooka enabled infantry to tackle tanks head on.

programme.title: Weapons of World War II
programme.desc: The machine gun did not dominate the battlefields of WWII but remained a highly potent weapon.

programme.title: Secrets of World War II
programme.desc: Four Italian frogmen place explosives on British battleships in Alexandria Harbour. They were the first of many brave men to use these unconventional weapons.

programme.title: History of Warfare
programme.desc: In a war infamous for its military disasters, there were few greater debacles than Gallipoli. Ill-conceived, poorly planned and dogged by misfortune, the offensive which was supposed to knock Turkey out of the Great War soon subsided into a bloody stalemate. As a result, places such as Anzac Cove and Suvla Bay are written large in military folklore.

programme.title: Time Team
programme.desc: The team faces one of their strangest challenges ever: digging through a church graveyard in search of what could be one of the largest Roman structures ever built in Britain. Can they reach the mosaic under the burials and convince the sceptics that theyve found a building the size of a Roman palace?

programme.title: Abandoned Engineering
programme.desc: A Liberian landmark with US origins, a desolate town in the shadow of its destroyer, and a mountaintop retreat drained of its lifeblood. Each haunted shell ready to tell its unique story.

programme.title: Ancient Powers
programme.desc: Each episode uses the very latest scientific and archaeological discoveries to reveal the tools, technologies, strategies and systems that decided the fate of the ancient world.

programme.title: Discovered by Disaster
programme.desc: Earthquakes, eruptions, and wildfires reveal artifacts and history, from the sinking of Port Royal to the Minoan civilisations resilience, offering rare insights into daily life.

programme.title: Auschwitz: One Day
programme.desc: Auschwitz is still considered synonymous with the Holocaust. This documentary tells the story of a typical day in the camp in 1944, from the viewpoints of victims and perpetrators.

programme.title: WWII: Witness To War
programme.desc: This episode remembers some of the thunderous naval battles which took place during the Pacific war. They include the Battle of the Coral Sea, the battle of Midway and the biggest naval engagement of the war - by some criterion even in world history - the battle of Leyte Gulf. The episode looks at the Guadalcanal Campaign and how the US retook the Philippines. And - featuring some very powerful footage - the appalling events on the Island of Saipan. The Japanese had to be pushed back across the Pacific Ocean inch by inch, step by step. It came to be known as island hopping as US soldiers faced an enemy dug in and determined to die rather than surrender. What was the mood in Japan as the optimism of the early years was replaced by the knowledge that the tide had turned and the US was closing in?

programme.title: Time Team
programme.sub-title: The House Of The White Queen
programme.desc: Groby Old Hall in Leicestershire was once home to the legendary White Queen: Elizabeth, the wife of Edward IV. The team is here to help the new owners, who have saved the house from dereliction, to find out what has gone on in their garden over the centuries. Its full of tantalising glimpses of archaeology: a medieval wall with a window, carved stones, and what looks like the remains of a Norman castle. Sorting this lot out is the kind of challenge the team cant resist. Over three days they discover this remarkable piece of land contains over 600 years of archaeology. It may seem run-down now, but it once belonged to one of the most powerful families in medieval Britain, the Greys. Monumental walls and grand manors emerge from the trenches as Tony is joined by historian and international bestselling author Philippa Gregory to piece together the intriguing tale of this power-hungry family. He discovers a dynasty that arrived with William the Conqueror and went on to produce two queens of England: Elizabeth and Lady Jane Grey.

programme.title: Line of Fire
programme.desc: On the 25th of October, 1854 the Russians moved in on British positions on the hills of Balaclava, a town in Ukraine, about 10 kilometres from Sevastapol. The Battle of Balaclava has become renowned as one of the most famous battles of all time.

programme.title: Line of Fire
programme.desc: Discover why the last major German offensive of WWII so nearly succeeded and how heroic defensive actions by American GIs thwarted their plans.

programme.title: Weapons of World War II
programme.desc: Fast patrol boats, armed with torpedoes and machine guns were the marine raiders of WWII.

programme.title: Unsolved Mysteries of WWII
programme.desc: During the war German scientists invented a range of remarkable weapons. But the most awe-inspiring of all was undoubtedly the long-range rocket known to history as the V-2. Why did the Germans spend so much time and effort developing a space age weapon only to arm it with less than one ton of conventional explosive? Did Hitler have plans to arm the rocket with a more sinister and a more deadly warhead?

programme.title: Secrets of World War II
programme.sub-title: The Real Heroes Of The Telemark
programme.desc: In 1943, as the Germans were producing heavy water to build their atomic bomb, the Norwegian resistance launched a daring raid against the Norsk Hydro plant.

programme.title: History of Warfare
programme.desc: In newly conquered England, the years which followed the Battle of Hastings were marked by violent turmoil. King William eventually responded to the constant uprisings of the Anglo-Saxon people by laying waste to the north of England. This is a the story of a brutal period in English history, a time which saw the introduction of feudalism, a proliferation of Norman churches and castles and the completion of the remarkable Domesday book.

programme.title: Weapons of World War II
programme.desc: By 1944, the Allied fronts in Europe had become faster moving and a new form of aircraft was needed to deliver swift, powerful attacks against German lines.

programme.desc: A machine of war given new life, an eerie shrine that offered the promise of immortality, and an unconventional labour of love. Each haunted shell now ready to tell its own unique story.

programme.title: Line of Fire
programme.desc: One of the most decisive battles in history. Explore the facts through state-of-the-art 3D animation and expert analysis by military historians.

programme.title: Weapons of World War II
programme.desc: At the outbreak of WWII, the only heavy four-engined bombers in the war were either Russian or American.

programme.title: Weapons of World War II
programme.desc: At the start of WWII, battleships were seen as the key weapon at sea; their huge firepower dominated the waves. But over the next six years, their vulnerability was exposed by the submarine and aircraft.

programme.title: Secrets of World War II
programme.desc: By early 1940, British codecrackers working on information from the Poles, had begun to crack the German military codes produced on the Enigma cipher machine. Once this had been achieved, the challenge was how to prevent the Germans from finding out their codes had been broken.

programme.title: History of Warfare
programme.desc: The Franco Prussian War of 1871 was the first modern war in Europe. It took place in a new era marked by huge advances in infantry and artillery weaponry. The ineptitude of the French commanders contrasted sharply with the brilliance of the Prussian General Helmut von Moltke. Indeed, the Battle of St Privat should have reversed the entire course of the war. However, a glorious opportunity for the French was wasted by a combination of indecision and incompetence.

programme.title: Weapons of World War II
programme.desc: At the outbreak of WWII, the only heavy four-engined bombers in the war were either Russian or American.

programme.title: American Dynasty
programme.desc: Explores the evolving narrative of America through the stories of some of the nations most famous families.

programme.title: Ancient Egypt By Train
programme.desc: Professor Alice Roberts uses one of the worlds oldest rail networks to explore one of the worlds most ancient civilisations.

programme.title: The Trojan Horse: On the Trail of a Myth
programme.desc: The story of the Trojan Horse is one of the most famous myths in the world. A gigantic wooden horse is loaded with Greek soldiers and presented to the Trojans. Under cover of darkness, the Greeks slip out of the horse and open the gates to their comrades. Only hours later, mighty Troy goes up in flames, making the Trojan Horse an example of an ingenious strategy and how easy it is to trick people. However, what if the story is not true at all? This elaborately shot film presents new archaeological findings that help solve this 3000-year-old mystery.

programme.title: History Uncovered
programme.sub-title: The Cold War: A Kremlin Instigation?
programme.desc: The Cold War has gone down in history as being instigated by the Soviet Union. And yet! Unlike the popular understanding, the spiral of events was triggered and fueled by the USA. Between misunderstandings, false impressions, and inappropriate reactions, President Trumans obsessive anti-Communism triggered a dangerous escalation of tension that spun out of control, tipping the world into four decades of belligerent peace and nuclear dissuasion.

programme.title: Time Team
programme.desc: The team faces one of their strangest challenges ever: digging through a church graveyard in search of what could be one of the largest Roman structures ever built in Britain. Tony Robinson and his band are here at the request of the Reverend William Burke, vicar of the historic St Kyneburghas church in Castor, Cambridgeshire. Under very close supervision, the team must dodge the thousands of burials in the graveyard to get to an ornate mosaic floor that was reportedly discovered almost 200 years ago. It could be the missing link in a village that is crammed with massive Roman walls and old reports of exquisite finds. Could they all belong to one vast building, dubbed a Praetorium, that would have dominated the Roman skyline and the whole region? The team fan out through the village to dig up gardens and playing fields and locate the different pieces of the jigsaw. Can they reach the mosaic under the burials and convince the sceptics that theyve found a building the size of a Roman palace?

programme.title: Ancient Egypt By Train
