programme.title: Line of Fire
programme.desc: On the 25th of October, 1854 the Russians moved in on British positions on the hills of Balaclava, a town in Ukraine, about 10 kilometres from Sevastapol. The Battle of Balaclava has become renowned as one of the most famous battles of all time.

programme.title: Weapons of World War II
programme.desc: Rockets had a huge impact on WWII. Hand-held rocket launchers such as the American bazooka enabled infantry to tackle tanks head on.

programme.title: Weapons of World War II
programme.desc: The machine gun did not dominate the battlefields of WWII but remained a highly potent weapon.

programme.title: Secrets of World War II
programme.desc: Four Italian frogmen place explosives on British battleships in Alexandria Harbour. They were the first of many brave men to use these unconventional weapons.

programme.title: History of Warfare
programme.desc: In a war infamous for its military disasters, there were few greater debacles than Gallipoli. Ill-conceived, poorly planned and dogged by misfortune, the offensive which was supposed to knock Turkey out of the Great War soon subsided into a bloody stalemate. As a result, places such as Anzac Cove and Suvla Bay are written large in military folklore.

programme.title: Time Team
programme.desc: The team faces one of their strangest challenges ever: digging through a church graveyard in search of what could be one of the largest Roman structures ever built in Britain. The team fan out through the village to dig up gardens and playing fields and locate the different pieces of the jigsaw. programme.title: Abandoned Engineering
programme.desc: A Liberian landmark with US origins, a desolate town in the shadow of its destroyer, and a mountaintop retreat drained of its lifeblood. Each haunted shell ready to tell its unique story.

programme.title: Ancient Powers
programme.desc: Each episode uses the very latest scientific and archaeological discoveries to reveal the tools, technologies, strategies and systems that decided the fate of the ancient world.

programme.title: Discovered by Disaster
programme.desc: Earthquakes, eruptions, and wildfires reveal artifacts and history, from the sinking of Port Royal to the Minoan civilisations resilience, offering rare insights into daily life.

programme.title: Auschwitz: One Day
programme.desc: Auschwitz is still considered synonymous with the Holocaust. This documentary tells the story of a typical day in the camp in 1944, from the viewpoints of victims and perpetrators.

programme.title: WWII: Witness To War
programme.desc: This episode remembers some of the thunderous naval battles which took place during the Pacific war. They include the Battle of the Coral Sea, the battle of Midway and the biggest naval engagement of the war - by some criterion even in world history - the battle of Leyte Gulf. The episode looks at the Guadalcanal Campaign and how the US retook the Philippines. And - featuring some very powerful footage - the appalling events on the Island of Saipan. The Japanese had to be pushed back across the Pacific Ocean inch by inch, step by step. It came to be known as island hopping as US soldiers faced an enemy dug in and determined to die rather than surrender. What was the mood in Japan as the optimism of the early years was replaced by the knowledge that the tide had turned and the US was closing in?

programme.title: Time Team
programme.sub-title: The House Of The White Queen
programme.desc: Groby Old Hall in Leicestershire was once home to the legendary White Queen: Elizabeth, the wife of Edward IV. The team is here to help the new owners, who have saved the house from dereliction, to find out what has gone on in their garden over the centuries. Its full of tantalising glimpses of archaeology: a medieval wall with a window, carved stones, and what looks like the remains of a Norman castle. Sorting this lot out is the kind of challenge the team cant resist. Over three days they discover this remarkable piece of land contains over 600 years of archaeology. It may seem run-down now, but it once belonged to one of the most powerful families in medieval Britain, the Greys. Monumental walls and grand manors emerge from the trenches as Tony is joined by historian and international bestselling author Philippa Gregory to piece together the intriguing tale of this power-hungry family. He discovers a dynasty that arrived with William the Conqueror and went on to produce two queens of England: Elizabeth and Lady Jane Grey.

programme.title: Line of Fire
programme.desc: Discover why the last major German offensive of WWII so nearly succeeded and how heroic defensive actions by American GIs thwarted their plans.

programme.title: Weapons of World War II
programme.desc: Fast patrol boats, armed with torpedoes and machine guns were the marine raiders of WWII.

programme.title: Unsolved Mysteries of WWII
programme.desc: During the war German scientists invented a range of remarkable weapons. But the most awe-inspiring of all was undoubtedly the long-range rocket known to history as the V-2. Why did the Germans spend so much time and effort developing a space age weapon only to arm it with less than one ton of conventional explosive? Did Hitler have plans to arm the rocket with a more sinister and a more deadly warhead?

programme.title: Secrets of World War II
programme.sub-title: The Real Heroes Of The Telemark
programme.desc: In 1943, as the Germans were producing heavy water to build their atomic bomb, the Norwegian resistance launched a daring raid against the Norsk Hydro plant.

programme.title: History of Warfare
programme.desc: In newly conquered England, the years which followed the Battle of Hastings were marked by violent turmoil. King William eventually responded to the constant uprisings of the Anglo-Saxon people by laying waste to the north of England. This is a the story of a brutal period in English history, a time which saw the introduction of feudalism, a proliferation of Norman churches and castles and the completion of the remarkable Domesday book.

programme.title: Bondi Rescue
programme.desc: Its the end of the season and lifeguards plot one final prank on trainee Harrison. Nicolas final challenge of the season is a sinking boat off Bondi.

programme.title: Embarrassing Bodies
programme.desc: The mobile clinic goes to the seaside resort of Scarborough, where Dr Christian meets a man with an itchy body rash. Dr Christian meets a man with a fishy smell coming from his penis, and Dr Pixie helps a woman whose nipples stick out above her bra after botched breast surgery abroad. Dr Dawn tackles an oozing leg ulcer condition thats so rare its been baffling doctors for years. A group of firemen put their balls on the line for testicular cancer. And a young woman explains why, when it comes to relationships, size doesnt matter.

programme.desc: A former New York family court judge, Judge Judy acts as a true moral compass for people seeking guidance, resolution and a little common sense.

programme.desc: This program pitches its tent at the Wakestock Music and Wakeboarding Festival in north Wales. Back in the main clinic, Dr Pixie meets a man whose tight foreskin is making sex difficult. programme.title: Embarrassing Bodies
programme.desc: Theres a fertility theme in the clinic this time as Dr Pixie investigates why one woman whos hoping to conceive has intense pain during sex, and why another woman seems to have a baby bump, although she isnt pregnant. programme.title: Kings Cross ER
programme.desc: Series two goes back inside one of the busiest and most unique emergency departments in the country to meet the extraordinary teams of doctors, nurses, and specialist consultants who pull together to perform lifesaving surgery. This time round, see how they deal with dangerous street drug overdoses like ice and ketamine, homeless victims of assault, motorcyclists who have collided with taxis, industrial accidents, skateboard injuries - and much, much more. Prepare yourself for another exhilarating look inside the relentless, fast-paced world of emergency medicine.

programme.desc: Series two goes back inside one of the busiest and most unique emergency departments in the country to meet the extraordinary teams of doctors, nurses, and specialist consultants who pull together to perform lifesaving surgery. This time round, see how they deal with dangerous street drug overdoses like ice and ketamine, homeless victims of assault, motorcyclists who have collided with taxis, industrial accidents, skateboard injuries - and much, much more. Prepare yourself for another exhilarating look inside the relentless, fast-paced world of emergency medicine.

programme.title: Embarrassing Bodies
programme.desc: Theres a fertility theme in the clinic this time as Dr Pixie investigates why one woman whos hoping to conceive has intense pain during sex, and why another woman seems to have a baby bump, although she isnt pregnant. Dr Dawn arranges a photo shoot for three gorgeous, heavily pregnant women to explore the medical myths and realities of having a baby.

programme.title: Embarrassing Bodies
programme.desc: This program pitches its tent at the Wakestock Music and Wakeboarding Festival in north Wales. At Wakestock the doctors are eager to see what conditions the temporary toilets, hot sun and mud will bring their way. Back in the main clinic, Dr Pixie meets a man whose tight foreskin is making sex difficult. Dr Christian deals with a young woman with a painful vagina, and Dr Dawn deals with an itchy leg rash - and a man who cant seem to stop staring. Dr Christian visits a group of artists at a life drawing class to discuss circumcision. And the show meets someone who has turned his gender ambiguities into his lifes work.

programme.title: Embarrassing Bodies
programme.desc: This program pitches its tent at the Wakestock Music and Wakeboarding Festival in north Wales. At Wakestock the doctors are eager to see what conditions the temporary toilets, hot sun and mud will bring their way. Back in the main clinic, Dr Pixie meets a man whose tight foreskin is making sex difficult. Dr Christian deals with a young woman with a painful vagina, and Dr Dawn deals with an itchy leg rash - and a man who cant seem to stop staring. Dr Christian visits a group of artists at a life drawing class to discuss circumcision. And the show meets someone who has turned his gender ambiguities into his lifes work.

programme.title: Embarrassing Bodies
programme.desc: Theres a fertility theme in the clinic this time as Dr Pixie investigates why one woman whos hoping to conceive has intense pain during sex, and why another woman seems to have a baby bump, although she isnt pregnant. Out on the road, Dr Christian makes a rare home visit to meet a newborn with a club foot, while the mobile clinic reaches Llandudno in North Wales where the doctors advise on a breastfeeding nipple dilemma. Dr Dawn arranges a photo shoot for three gorgeous, heavily pregnant women to explore the medical myths and realities of having a baby.

programme.title: Kings Cross ER
programme.desc: Series two goes back inside one of the busiest and most unique emergency departments in the country to meet the extraordinary teams of doctors, nurses, and specialist consultants who pull together to perform lifesaving surgery. This time round, see how they deal with dangerous street drug overdoses like ice and ketamine, homeless victims of assault, motorcyclists who have collided with taxis, industrial accidents, skateboard injuries - and much, much more. Prepare yourself for another exhilarating look inside the relentless, fast-paced world of emergency medicine.

programme.title: Vet on the Hill
programme.desc: Scott welcomes 12 rescue dogs saved from the South Korean dog meat trade, and gives them the medical care they need to find new homes. A frisky feline is giving its owner some unwanted attention.

programme.title: Bondi Rescue
programme.desc: Welcome to Bondi, home of the weird, wonderful, beautiful, deadly and dangerous.

programme.title: Embarrassing Bodies
programme.desc: Dr Pixie meets a woman with a pair of testicle-like cysts on her head. Dr Christian deals with a young woman suffering from incontinence. Dr Dawn helps a man who just cant hold on to his leaking bowels. The mobile clinic seeks out Britains biggest thrillseekers at Thorpe Park. Dr Christian goes to war on falling male fertility rates, testing a group of paintballers. The show meets a man whose cerebral palsy hasnt stopped him from carving out a career making people laugh.

programme.title: Burlesque
programme.desc: Ali is a small-town singer who moves to the big city for her chance at stardom. She is enchanted by Burlesque, a glamorous nightclub packed with dancers and sizzling music. Tess is the owner in need of a star, as she is struggling to keep the club alive and fend off wealthy developers who want to buy it. Ali has a chance to make her dreams come true, if only she could make the right choices.

programme.title: Hitch
programme.desc: Hitch is a cocky and successful date doctor for the unlucky in love, but when he falls for gossip columnist Sara, he forgets his own rules.

programme.title: Ladies in Black
programme.desc: Adapted from the bestselling novel by Madeleine St John, Ladies In Black is an alluring and tender-hearted comedy drama about the lives of a group of department store employees in 1959 Sydney.

programme.title: Easy A
programme.desc: After a little white lie about losing her virginity gets out, a clean-cut high school girl sees her life paralleling Hester Prynnes in The Scarlet Letter, which she is currently studying in school - until she decides to use the rumour mill to advance her social and financial standing.

programme.title: Turtles All the Way Down
programme.desc: When a 16-year-old struggling with obsessive-compulsive disorder reconnects with her childhood crush, she confronts the possibility of finding love and happiness in the face of mental illness.

programme.title: Sidelined: The QB and Me
programme.desc: A headstrong dancer and a cocky quarterback fight against their feelings for each other as their post-grad future threatens to keep them apart.

programme.title: Clueless
programme.desc: So you think you dont have a clue? Join the club, as high-schoolers Cher and Dionnes plan to transform a lonely misfit into a total babe backfires in the worst possible way. From the director of Fast Times at Ridgemont High comes a teenagers save the world comedy based loosely on Jane Austins Emma, that elevated Alicia Silverstone from that Aerosmith girl to a star in the making.

From the director of Fast Times at Ridgemont High comes a teenagers save the world comedy based loosely on Jane Austins Emma, that elevated Alicia Silverstone from that Aerosmith girl to a star in the making.

programme.title: Youve Got Mail
programme.desc: Two anonymous emailers fall head-over-laptops in love, unaware they are fierce rivals in the bookshop business.

programme.title: How to Lose a Guy in 10 Days
programme.desc: Two Manhattanites plot against each other in a cross-purpose love affair that is meant to be over in 10 days, but might just last a lifetime. In a screwball set-up involving a writer who goes undercover to demonstrate how women routinely put men off by crashing their poker-nights and letting our poodles pee on their pool tables, her sitting duck is a hotshot adman on a bet to demonstrate what men can do to make women fall for them in a matter of 10 days or so.

programme.title: Scent of a Woman
programme.desc: An overbearing, blind, and retired lieutenant colonel hires a young guardian to assist him. They embark on a wild weekend trip that will change the lives of both men forever.

programme.title: Bad Teacher
programme.desc: Elizabeth Halsey is a foulmouthed, ruthless and inappropriate teacher. She drinks, gets high and cant wait to marry a meal ticket to get out of her bogus day job.When shes dumped by her fiance, she sets her sights on a rich, handsome substitute while shrugging off the advances of the school gym teacher. The consequences of her wild and outrageous schemes give her students, co-workers, and even herself, an education like no other.

programme.title: Joy Ride
programme.desc: Asian American adoptee Audrey Sullivan is living the dream. Raised in the picturesque small town of White Hills, she has a successful law career, a close relationship with her parents, and her longtime best friend, Lolo, literally lives in her backyard. But Audrey is ready for more. To become a partner at her law firm and leave White Hills behind, she just needs to close one important deal with a client in China. Sounds straightforward enough, until Lolo encourages Audrey to use the trip to locate her birth mother. Oh, and Lolos eccentric cousin, Deadeye, is coming along. So is Kat, a glamorous Chinese soap opera star who roomed with Audrey in college.

programme.title: Crazy Rich Asians
programme.desc: Crazy Rich Asians follows native New Yorker Rachel Chu (Constance Wu) as she accompanies her longtime boyfriend, Nick Young (Henry Golding), to his best friends wedding in Singapore. Excited about visiting Asia for the first time but nervous about meeting Nicks family, Rachel is unprepared to learn that Nick has neglected to mention a few key details about his life. It turns out that he is not only the scion of one of the countrys wealthiest families but also one of its most sought-after bachelors. Being on Nicks arm puts a target on Rachels back, with jealous socialites and, worse, Nicks own disapproving mother (Michelle Yeoh) taking aim. And it soon becomes clear that while money cant buy love, it can definitely complicate things.

programme.title: Its Complicated
programme.desc: With a thriving bakery, a new romance and her divorce finally behind her, Jane Adler has her life all figured out, until her ex-husband Jake decides hell stop at nothing to win her back.

programme.title: Some Kind of Wonderful
programme.desc: From the director of Pretty in Pink, comes this high-school romance as a misfit whose crush on a teen queen takes him on a voyage of self discovery. Keith thinks he is in love with Amanda while tomboy Watts pines for Keith. Meanwhile, Amanda wishes she were loved by her current boyfriend, Hardy Jenns, whilst Hardy is only in love with himself.

programme.title: Flashdance
programme.desc: Alex bravely fights her way out of the welding gear, off the stripper pole, and onto the dance school floor.

programme.title: Mona Lisa Smile
programme.desc: A funny, inspiring and uplifting film about an art history professor with a lot to teach about life and much to learn about romance.

programme.desc: When a 16-year-old struggling with obsessive-compulsive disorder reconnects with her childhood crush, she confronts the possibility of finding love and happiness in the face of mental illness.

programme.title: Sidelined: The QB and Me
programme.desc: A headstrong dancer and a cocky quarterback fight against their feelings for each other as their post-grad future threatens to keep them apart.

programme.title: Clueless
programme.desc: So you think you dont have a clue? Join the club, as high-schoolers Cher and Dionnes plan to transform a lonely misfit into a total babe backfires in the worst possible way. From the director of Fast Times at Ridgemont High comes a teenagers save the world comedy based loosely on Jane Austins Emma, that elevated Alicia Silverstone from that Aerosmith girl to a star in the making.

programme.title: Youve Got Mail
programme.desc: Two anonymous emailers fall head-over-laptops in love, unaware they are fierce rivals in the bookshop business.

programme.title: How to Lose a Guy in 10 Days
programme.desc: Two Manhattanites plot against each other in a cross-purpose love affair that is meant to be over in 10 days, but might just last a lifetime. In a screwball set-up involving a writer who goes undercover to demonstrate how women routinely put men off by crashing their poker-nights and letting our poodles pee on their pool tables, her sitting duck is a hotshot adman on a bet to demonstrate what men can do to make women fall for them in a matter of 10 days or so.

programme.title: Scent of a Woman
programme.desc: An overbearing, blind, and retired lieutenant colonel hires a young guardian to assist him. They embark on a wild weekend trip that will change the lives of both men forever.

programme.title: Bad Teacher
programme.desc: Elizabeth Halsey is a foulmouthed, ruthless and inappropriate teacher. She drinks, gets high and cant wait to marry a meal ticket to get out of her bogus day job.When shes dumped by her fiance, she sets her sights on a rich, handsome substitute while shrugging off the advances of the school gym teacher. The consequences of her wild and outrageous schemes give her students, co-workers, and even herself, an education like no other.

programme.title: Joy Ride
programme.desc: Asian American adoptee Audrey Sullivan is living the dream. Raised in the picturesque small town of White Hills, she has a successful law career, a close relationship with her parents, and her longtime best friend, Lolo, literally lives in her backyard. But Audrey is ready for more. To become a partner at her law firm and leave White Hills behind, she just needs to close one important deal with a client in China. Sounds straightforward enough, until Lolo encourages Audrey to use the trip to locate her birth mother. Oh, and Lolos eccentric cousin, Deadeye, is coming along. So is Kat, a glamorous Chinese soap opera star who roomed with Audrey in college.

programme.title: Crazy Rich Asians
programme.desc: Crazy Rich Asians follows native New Yorker Rachel Chu (Constance Wu) as she accompanies her longtime boyfriend, Nick Young (Henry Golding), to his best friends wedding in Singapore. Excited about visiting Asia for the first time but nervous about meeting Nicks family, Rachel is unprepared to learn that Nick has neglected to mention a few key details about his life. It turns out that he is not only the scion of one of the countrys wealthiest families but also one of its most sought-after bachelors. Being on Nicks arm puts a target on Rachels back, with jealous socialites and, worse, Nicks own disapproving mother (Michelle Yeoh) taking aim. And it soon becomes clear that while money cant buy love, it can definitely complicate things.

programme.title: Its Complicated
programme.desc: With a thriving bakery, a new romance and her divorce finally behind her, Jane Adler has her life all figured out, until her ex-husband Jake decides hell stop at nothing to win her back.

programme.title: Some Kind of Wonderful
programme.desc: From the director of Pretty in Pink, comes this high-school romance as a misfit whose crush on a teen queen takes him on a voyage of self discovery. Keith thinks he is in love with Amanda while tomboy Watts pines for Keith. Meanwhile, Amanda wishes she were loved by her current boyfriend, Hardy Jenns, whilst Hardy is only in love with himself.

programme.title: Mona Lisa Smile
programme.desc: A funny, inspiring and uplifting film about an art history professor with a lot to teach about life and much to learn about romance.

programme.title: Belgravia
programme.desc: James Trenchard, a successful businessman known as The Magician for his ability to supply food and materials to the army on the eve of the Battle of Waterloo, uses his daughter Sophias friendship with Lord Bellasis to gain favour and he agrees to their marriage. Sophia discovers the marriage ceremony is a sham and Bellasis is killed on the battlefield. Sophia is left unmarried and pregnant. She dies during childbirth leaving a son. Twenty five years later the Trenchards move to the newly built Belgravia where they become neighbours to the Brokenhursts, who have no knowledge of their grandson.

programme.title: Wentworth
programme.desc: When Bea is sentenced to life without parole for the killing of Brayden Holt, Ferguson makes it very clear - she owns Bea now. So when Bea uses her standing as Top Dog to hit back, Ferguson takes revenge - she slots Bea and releases Liz from Protection, exposing Liz to a brutal bashing from Boomer. But Ferguson has underestimated Bea, who starts a riot amongst the prisoners. With the prison in lock-down Ferguson has to turn to Bea to quell the riot. Wentworth isnt Fergusons prison - its Beas. Battle lines are drawn.

programme.title: Belgravia
programme.desc: Anne Trenchard decides, against her husbands wishes, to confide the secret of a grandson, Charles Pope, to Lady Brockenhurst who refuses to believe her son would contrive such a deceit. Lady Brockenhurst, whose husband bemoans the fact they have no heir, arranges an after dinner party to which she invites Charles Pope who has no idea of his birth parents. The Trenchards, including their son Oliver and his wife Susan are also invited. Also at the party are Lady Brockenhursts nephew John Bellasis, the heir presumptive, and Lady Maria Grey who is expected to marry him. When Charles Pope arrives Lady Brockenhurst introduces him and discovers James Trenchard had invested in Popes business as a cotton trader, much to Anne Trenchards astonishment. John Bellasis eye takes a fancy to Susan while Pope discovers that Lady Marias is knowledgeable about the cotton trade.

programme.desc: Greyhound Racing from Geelong, Horsham, Grafton, Warragul, Bulli, Townsville, Gosford, Mandurah, Q Straight, Sheffield; Harness Racing from Albion Park, Wagga, Globe Derby, Gloucester Park, Echuca, Angers.
